 964  78BD
 965  78BD                  include "./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XX12EquNodeDotOrientation.asm
   1+ 78BD              ; We enter here with hl pointing at XX16 and bc = XX15 value
   2+ 78BD              ; so xx12 = XX15 * XX16 row
   3+ 78BD              XX12ProcessOneRow:
   4+ 78BD              XX12CalcXCell:
   5+ 78BD ED 4B A6 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkXScaled)
   6+ 78C1 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
   7+ 78C2 23           		inc		hl
   8+ 78C3 56           		ld		d,(hl)                                  ; so now e = xx16 value d = xx16 sign
   9+ 78C4 7A           		ld		a,d
  10+ 78C5 A8                   xor     b
  11+ 78C6 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit                            ; a = XX 16 sign
  12+ 78C8 DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  13+ 78CA 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  14+ 78CB E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  15+ 78CD 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  16+ 78CE E5           		push	hl
  17+ 78CF 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  18+ 78D1 60           		ld		h,b
  19+ 78D2 69           		ld		l,c
  20+ 78D3 CD 3A 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  21+ 78D6 22 58 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarResult1),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result, we only want to use high byte later
  22+ 78D9 DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  23+ 78DB 32 5F 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarSign1),a					    ; S = sign  not sign 1 and 2 are reversed in memory so that fetchign back will put 1 in high byte 2 in low byte
  24+ 78DE E1           		pop		hl
  25+ 78DF              XX12CalcYCell:
  26+ 78DF ED 4B A8 C0          ld		bc,(UBnkYScaled)
  27+ 78E3 23           		inc		hl
  28+ 78E4 5E           		ld		e,(hl)							    	; get orientation ZX
  29+ 78E5 23           		inc		hl
  30+ 78E6 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  31+ 78E7 7A           		ld		a,d
  32+ 78E8 A8                   xor     b
  33+ 78E9 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  34+ 78EB DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; XX16 orientation sign to ixh
  35+ 78ED 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  36+ 78EE E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  37+ 78F0 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  38+ 78F1 E5           		push	hl
  39+ 78F2 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  40+ 78F4 60           		ld		h,b
  41+ 78F5 69           		ld		l,c
  42+ 78F6 CD 3A 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  43+ 78F9 22 5A 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarResult2),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  44+ 78FC DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  45+ 78FE 32 5E 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarSign2),a					    ; S = sign
  46+ 7901 E1           		pop		hl
  47+ 7902              XX12CalcZCell:
  48+ 7902 ED 4B AA C0          ld		bc,(UBnkZScaled)
  49+ 7906 23           		inc		hl
  50+ 7907 5E           		ld		e,(hl)								    ; get orientation ZX
  51+ 7908 23           		inc		hl
  52+ 7909 56           		ld		d,(hl)
  53+ 790A 7A           		ld		a,d
  54+ 790B A8                   xor     b
  55+ 790C E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 790E DD 67        		ld		ixh,a								    ; orientation sign to ixh
  57+ 7910 78           		ld		a,b                                     ; now make bc abs bc
  58+ 7911 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit
  59+ 7913 47           		ld		b,a                                     ; bc = abs(bc) now
  60+ 7914 16 00                ld      d,0                                     ; d = value
  61+ 7916 60           		ld		h,b
  62+ 7917 69           		ld		l,c
  63+ 7918 CD 3A 92     		call	mulDEbyHL							    ; hl = |orientation| * |x pos)
  64+ 791B 22 5C 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarResult3),hl				    ; T = 16 bit result
  65+ 791E DD 7C        		ld		a,ixh
  66+ 7920 32 60 7D     		ld		(XX12PVarSign3),a					    ; S = sign
  67+ 7923              XX12CalcCellResult:
  68+ 7923 2A 58 7D     		ld		hl,(XX12PVarResult1)				    ; X Cell Result
  69+ 7926 ED 5B 5A 7D  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult2)				    ; Y Cell Result
  70+ 792A ED 4B 5E 7D  		ld		bc,(XX12PVarSign2)					    ; b = var 1 result sign c = var 2 result signs
  71+ 792E              XX12MSBOnly:
  72+ 792E 6C           		ld		l,h									    ; now move results into lower byte so / 256
  73+ 792F 5A           		ld		e,d									    ; for both results
  74+ 7930 AF           		xor		a									    ;
  75+ 7931 67           		ld		h,a									    ;
  76+ 7932 57           		ld		d,a									    ; so set high byte to 0
  77+ 7933 CD 77 8F     		call	ADDHLDESignBC                           ;  XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result1 + result 2 signed in a
  78+ 7936 47           		ld		b,a									    ; move sign into b ready for next calc
  79+ 7937 3A 60 7D     		ld		a,(XX12PVarSign3)					    ; result of the calcZ cell
  80+ 793A 4F           		ld		c,a									    ; goes into c to align with DE
  81+ 793B ED 5B 5C 7D  		ld		de,(XX12PVarResult3)				    ; now add result to Result 3
  82+ 793F 5A           		ld		e,d                                     ; d = result /256
  83+ 7940 16 00        		ld		d,0									    ; and only us high byte
  84+ 7942 CD 77 8F     		call	ADDHLDESignBC; XX12ProcessCalcHLPlusDESignBC		; returns with HL = result and a = sign
  85+ 7945 C9           		ret											    ; hl = result, a = sign
  86+ 7946              								    ; hl = result, a = sign
  87+ 7946
  88+ 7946              XX12EquNodeDotTransMat:							    ; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
  89+ 7946              ;...X cell
  90+ 7946 21 79 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
  91+ 7949 CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
  92+ 794C 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
  93+ 794D 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
  94+ 794E B0           		or		b
  95+ 794F 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
  96+ 7952 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
  97+ 7953 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
  98+ 7956              ;...Y cell
  99+ 7956 21 81 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 100+ 7959 CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 101+ 795C 47           		ld		b,a
 102+ 795D 7C           		ld		a,h
 103+ 795E              ;		ld		a,l
 104+ 795E B0           		or		b
 105+ 795F 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 106+ 7962 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 107+ 7963 32 AE C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 108+ 7966              ;...Z cell
 109+ 7966 21 89 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 110+ 7969 CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 111+ 796C 47           		ld		b,a
 112+ 796D 7C                   ld		a,h
 113+ 796E              ;		ld		a,l
 114+ 796E B0           		or		b
 115+ 796F 32 B1 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 116+ 7972 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 117+ 7973 32 B0 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 118+ 7976 C9                   ret
 119+ 7977
 120+ 7977              XX12EquNodeDotOrientation:							; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 121+ 7977              ;...X cell
 122+ 7977 21 79 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow0x0     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 123+ 797A CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 124+ 797D 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 125+ 797E 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 126+ 797F B0           		or		b
 127+ 7980 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 128+ 7983 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 129+ 7984 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 130+ 7987              ;...Y cell
 131+ 7987 21 81 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow1y0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 132+ 798A CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 133+ 798D 47           		ld		b,a
 134+ 798E 7C           		ld		a,h
 135+ 798F              ;		ld		a,l
 136+ 798F B0           		or		b
 137+ 7990 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 138+ 7993 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 139+ 7994 32 AE C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 140+ 7997              ;...Z cell
 141+ 7997 21 89 C0     		ld		hl,UbnkTransInvRow2z0     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 142+ 799A CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 143+ 799D 47           		ld		b,a
 144+ 799E 7C                   ld		a,h
 145+ 799F              ;		ld		a,l
 146+ 799F B0           		or		b
 147+ 79A0 32 B1 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 148+ 79A3 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 149+ 79A4 32 B0 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 150+ 79A7 C9                   ret
 151+ 79A8
 152+ 79A8              XX12EquNodeDotXX16:					         		; .LL51	\ -> &4832 \ XX12=XX15.XX16  each vector is 16-bit x,y,z **** ACTUALLY XX16 is value in low sign bit in high
 153+ 79A8              ;...X cell
 154+ 79A8 21 61 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX     			; process orientation matrix row 0
 155+ 79AB CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow                   ; hl = result, a = sign
 156+ 79AE 47           		ld		b,a                                 ; b = sign
 157+ 79AF 7C           		ld		a,h                                 ; a = high byte
 158+ 79B0 B0           		or		b
 159+ 79B1 32 AD C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12xSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 160+ 79B4 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 161+ 79B5 32 AC C0             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a						; that is result done for
 162+ 79B8              ;...Y cell
 163+ 79B8 21 67 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 164+ 79BB CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 165+ 79BE 47           		ld		b,a
 166+ 79BF 7C           		ld		a,h
 167+ 79C0              ;		ld		a,l
 168+ 79C0 B0           		or		b
 169+ 79C1 32 AF C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12ySign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 170+ 79C4 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 171+ 79C5 32 AE C0             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a						; that is result done for
 172+ 79C8              ;...Z cell
 173+ 79C8 21 6D C0     		ld		hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX     			; process orientation matrix row 1
 174+ 79CB CD BD 78             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 175+ 79CE 47           		ld		b,a
 176+ 79CF 7C                   ld		a,h
 177+ 79D0              ;		ld		a,l
 178+ 79D0 B0           		or		b
 179+ 79D1 32 B1 C0     		ld		(UBnkXX12zSign),a					; a = result with sign in bit 7
 180+ 79D4 7D           		ld		a,l                                 ; the result will be in the lower byte now
 181+ 79D5 32 B0 C0             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a						; that is result done for
 182+ 79D8 C9                   ret

 967  7A15                  ;;DEFUNCTinclude "./ModelRender/CopyXX15ToXX12.asm"
 968  7A15                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 7A15              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 7A15                      IFDEF LOGMATHS
   3+ 7A15 ~                                    ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   4+ 7A15 ~                                    ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 7A15 ~                                    MMUSelectMathsTables
   6+ 7A15 ~            .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		e,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value              ;
   7+ 7A15 ~                                    inc		hl                  ;
   8+ 7A15 ~                                    ld		a,(hl)              ;
   9+ 7A15 ~                                    ld		d,a                 ;
  10+ 7A15 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  11+ 7A15 ~                                    ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  12+ 7A15 ~                                    ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 7A15 ~                                    ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  14+ 7A15 ~                                    push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  15+ 7A15 ~                                    push	hl                  ; save HL
  16+ 7A15 ~                                    call    AEquAmul256Div197Log;
  17+ 7A15 ~                                    pop		hl
  18+ 7A15 ~                                    dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  19+ 7A15 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  20+ 7A15 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  21+ 7A15 ~                                    ld      a,ixl
  22+ 7A15 ~                                    ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  23+ 7A15 ~                                    pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  24+ 7A15 ~                                    inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  25+ 7A15 ~                                    djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  26+ 7A15 ~                                    MMUSelectROM0
  27+ 7A15 ~                                    ret
  28+ 7A15                      ELSE
  29+ 7A15 06 09                                ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
  30+ 7A17 0E C5                                ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
  31+ 7A19 21 61 C0                             ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
  32+ 7A1C 7E           .ScaleXX16Loop:         ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
  33+ 7A1D 5F                                   ld		e,a                 ;
  34+ 7A1E 23                                   inc		hl                  ;
  35+ 7A1F 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)              ;
  36+ 7A20 57                                   ld		d,a                 ;
  37+ 7A21 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  38+ 7A23 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  39+ 7A25                                      ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  39+ 7A25 CB 23       >			   sla e
  39+ 7A27 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  40+ 7A29 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  41+ 7A2A C5                                   push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  42+ 7A2B E5                                   push	hl                  ; save HL
  43+ 7A2C CD F4 94                             call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC; AEquAmul256DivD; DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  44+ 7A2F E1                                   pop		hl
  45+ 7A30 2B                                   dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  46+ 7A31 71                                   ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  47+ 7A32 23                                   inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  48+ 7A33                                  ;    ld      a,(hl)
  49+ 7A33                                  ;    and     $80
  50+ 7A33 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl
  51+ 7A35 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  52+ 7A36 C1                                   pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  53+ 7A37 23                                   inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  54+ 7A38 10 E2                                djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  55+ 7A3A C9                                   ret
  56+ 7A3B                      ENDIF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm

 970  7A3B                  include "./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 7A3B              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 7A3B              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 7A3B              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 7A3B              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 7A3B
   6+ 7A3B              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 7A3B              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 7A3B
   9+ 7A3B EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  10+ 7A3C CD C3 84                             call    doRND               ; a = random OR bit 5
  11+ 7A3F EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  12+ 7A40 F6 08                                or      8                   ; .
  13+ 7A42 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ; save to x pos
  14+ 7A43 E6 7F                                and     $7F                 ; a = abs a
  15+ 7A45 23                                   inc     hl                  ;
  16+ 7A46 77                                   ld      (hl),a              ;
  17+ 7A47 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; preserving hl
  18+ 7A48 CD C3 84                             call    doRND               ; a = -ve (random / 2)
  19+ 7A4B EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; .
  20+ 7A4C 0F                                   rrca                        ; .
  21+ 7A4D E6 80                                and     $80                 ; .
  22+ 7A4F B6                                   or      (hl)                ; or with
  23+ 7A50 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 7A51 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 7A52 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 7A53 CD C3 84                             call    doRND
  27+ 7A56 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 7A57 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 7A59 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 7A5A 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 7A5B E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 7A5D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 7A5E EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 7A5F CD C3 84                             call    doRND
  35+ 7A62 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 7A63 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 7A64 E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 7A66 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 7A67 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 7A68 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 7A69 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 7A6A CD C3 84                             call    doRND
  43+ 7A6D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 7A6E F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 7A70 77                                   ld      (hl),a

  47+ 7A72 F6 70                                or      %01110000

  49+ 7A76 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 7A77 23                                   inc     hl

  57+ 7A81 EB                                   ex      de,hl

 114+ 7AD5 FD 21 8C 7F  SaveCurrentDust:        ld          iy,varDust
 115+ 7AD9 DD 21 76 7F                          ld          ix,varDustWarpRender
 116+ 7ADD 06 0B                                ld          b, MaxNumberOfStars
 117+ 7ADF FD 7E 01     .SaveLoop               ld          a,(iy+1)
 118+ 7AE2 6F                                   ld          l,a
 119+ 7AE3 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 120+ 7AE5                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegXPt
 120+ 7AE5 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 120+ 7AE7 C2 F0 7A    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegXPt
 121+ 7AEA C6 80                                add         a,$80
 122+ 7AEC 5F                                   ld          e,a
 123+ 7AED C3 F5 7A                             jp          .StarDoneX
 124+ 7AF0 57           .StarNegXPt:            ld          d,a
 125+ 7AF1 3E 80                                ld          a,$80
 126+ 7AF3 92                                   sub         d
 127+ 7AF4 5F                                   ld          e,a
 128+ 7AF5 FD 7E 03     .StarDoneX:             ld          a,(iy+3)
 129+ 7AF8 6F                                   ld          l,a
 130+ 7AF9 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 131+ 7AFB                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,.StarNegYPt
 131+ 7AFB CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 131+ 7AFD C2 06 7B    >                        jp      nz,.StarNegYPt
 132+ 7B00 C6 60                                add         a,$60
 133+ 7B02 57                                   ld          d,a
 134+ 7B03 C3 0B 7B                             jp          .StarDoneY
 135+ 7B06 57           .StarNegYPt:            ld          d,a
 136+ 7B07 3E 60                                ld          a,$60
 137+ 7B09 92                                   sub         d
 138+ 7B0A 57                                   ld          d,a
 139+ 7B0B DD 73 00     .StarDoneY:             ld          (ix+0),e
 140+ 7B0E DD 72 01                             ld          (ix+1),d
 141+ 7B11 DD 23                                inc         ix
 142+ 7B13 DD 23                                inc         ix
 143+ 7B15 FD E5 E1                             ld          hl,iy
 144+ 7B18 3E 06                                ld          a,6
 145+ 7B1A ED 31                                add         hl,a
 146+ 7B1C E5 FD E1                             ld          iy,hl
 147+ 7B1F 10 BE                                djnz        .SaveLoop
 148+ 7B21 C9                                   ret
 149+ 7B22
 150+ 7B22              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 151+ 7B22 06 0B        DustForward:            ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars                  ; get the number of stars to process
 152+ 7B24 FD 21 8C 7F                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 153+ 7B28 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 154+ 7B29 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)                            ; e  = z high
 155+ 7B2C 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; d = 0
 156+ 7B2D 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 157+ 7B2F 3A 75 7E                             ld      a,(DELTA)                           ; a = speed
 158+ 7B32                                      JumpIfAIsNotZero .NormalSpeed               ; if we are stationary set speed
 158+ 7B32 A7          >                        and     a
 158+ 7B33 C2 37 7B    >                        jp	    nz,.NormalSpeed
 159+ 7B36 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so it is at least some dust movement
 160+ 7B37 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a                                 ;
 161+ 7B38 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 162+ 7B3A CD 80 95                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = Speed/Z , HL = remainder
 163+ 7B3D                                      ShiftHLRight1
 163+ 7B3D CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 7B3F CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 7B41                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 164+ 7B41 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 164+ 7B43 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 165+ 7B45 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 166+ 7B46 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 167+ 7B48 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 168+ 7B4A FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 168+ 7B4E 66 05
 169+ 7B50 ED 5B 76 7E                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 170+ 7B54 CD 69 90                             call    subHLDES15
 171+ 7B57                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar                  ; if z ended up negative then reset the star
 171+ 7B57 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 171+ 7B59 C2 AE 7C    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 172+ 7B5C FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl                           ; save new z pos
 172+ 7B60 74 05
 173+ 7B62 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 173+ 7B66 66 01
 174+ 7B68 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 175+ 7B69 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 176+ 7B6B 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 177+ 7B6C DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 178+ 7B6E ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 179+ 7B70 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 180+ 7B71 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 181+ 7B73 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 182+ 7B74 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 183+ 7B75 CD 9A 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 184+ 7B78 7C                                   ld      a,h
 185+ 7B79 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 186+ 7B7B                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 186+ 7B7B FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 186+ 7B7D D2 AE 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 187+ 7B80 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 187+ 7B84 74 01
 188+ 7B86 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 188+ 7B8A 66 03
 189+ 7B8C 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 190+ 7B8D E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 191+ 7B8F 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 192+ 7B90 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 193+ 7B92 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 194+ 7B94 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 195+ 7B95 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 196+ 7B97 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 197+ 7B98 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 198+ 7B99 CD 9A 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 199+ 7B9C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 200+ 7B9D E6 7F                                and     $7F
 201+ 7B9F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 201+ 7B9F FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 201+ 7BA1 D2 AE 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 202+ 7BA4 7C                                   ld      a,h
 203+ 7BA5 E6 80                                and     $80
 204+ 7BA7 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 205+ 7BA9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 206+ 7BAA                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 206+ 7BAA FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 206+ 7BAC D2 AE 7C    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 207+ 7BAF FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 207+ 7BB3 74 03
 208+ 7BB5              ; Now roll
 209+ 7BB5              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 210+ 7BB5 3A 95 7D     .XRoll:                 ld      a,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 211+ 7BB8 FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 7BBA 28 4D                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 7BBC                                   ;   break
 214+ 7BBC 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ; roll magnitude
 215+ 7BBD 3A 97 7D                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                        ; inverted roll sign
 216+ 7BC0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; sanitise sign bit
 217+ 7BC2 67                                   ld      h,a                                 ; h = roll sign
 218+ 7BC3 E5                                   push    hl                                  ; save on the stack
 219+ 7BC4 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 7BC5 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 7BC6 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 7BC9 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save signed byte
 223+ 7BCA E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                        ; a = sign only
 224+ 7BCC 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 7BCD 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e                                 ; e = abs byte
 226+ 7BCE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 227+ 7BD0 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 7BD1 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 7BD3 79                                   ld      a,c                                 ; get back sign from roll
 230+ 7BD4 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 7BD5 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 7BD6 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 7BD7 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 7BDB 66 01
 234+ 7BDD CD 69 90                             call    subHLDES15                       ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 7BE0 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 7BE4 74 01
 236+ 7BE6              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 7BE6              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 7BE6 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 7BE7 4C           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,h                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 240+ 7BE8 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 241+ 7BE9 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 242+ 7BEC 5F                                   ld      e,a
 243+ 7BED E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 244+ 7BEF 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 245+ 7BF0 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 246+ 7BF1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 247+ 7BF3 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 248+ 7BF4 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 249+ 7BF6 79                                   ld      a,c
 250+ 7BF7 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 251+ 7BF8 B2                                   or      d
 252+ 7BF9 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 253+ 7BFA FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 253+ 7BFE 66 03
 254+ 7C00 CD 9A 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 255+ 7C03 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 255+ 7C07 74 03
 256+ 7C09 3A 89 7D     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 257+ 7C0C FE 00                                cp      0
 258+ 7C0E 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 259+ 7C10              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 260+ 7C10 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 261+ 7C11 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 262+ 7C14 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 263+ 7C15 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 264+ 7C17 5F                                   ld      e,a
 265+ 7C18 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 266+ 7C1A                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 266+ 7C1A CB 23       >			   sla e
 266+ 7C1C CB 12       >			   rl  d
 267+ 7C1E 3A 8A 7D                             ld      a,(BET2)                            ; get inverted Sign
 268+ 7C21 B2                                   or      d
 269+ 7C22 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 270+ 7C23 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 270+ 7C27 66 03
 271+ 7C29 CD 9A 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignedV4
 272+ 7C2C FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 272+ 7C30 74 03
 273+ 7C32              ; now work out screen pos
 274+ 7C32              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 275+ 7C32              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 276+ 7C32              ;        pop     de
 277+ 7C32               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 278+ 7C32                                      ;pop     de
 279+ 7C32              .NoPitch:
 280+ 7C32 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 281+ 7C35 6F                                   ld      l,a
 282+ 7C36 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 7C38                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 283+ 7C38 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 283+ 7C3A C2 43 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 284+ 7C3D C6 80                                add     a,$80
 285+ 7C3F 4F                                   ld      c,a
 286+ 7C40 C3 48 7C                             jp      StarDoneX
 287+ 7C43 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 288+ 7C44 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 289+ 7C46 90                                   sub     b
 290+ 7C47 4F                                   ld      c,a
 291+ 7C48 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 292+ 7C4B 6F                                   ld      l,a
 293+ 7C4C E6 7F                                and     $7F
 294+ 7C4E                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 294+ 7C4E CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 294+ 7C50 C2 59 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 295+ 7C53 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 296+ 7C55 47                                   ld      b,a
 297+ 7C56 C3 5E 7C                             jp      StarDoneY
 298+ 7C59 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 299+ 7C5A 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 300+ 7C5C 90                                   sub     b
 301+ 7C5D 47                                   ld      b,a
 302+ 7C5E 3E 92        StarDoneY:              ld      a,L2DustColour
 303+ 7C60 C5                                   push    bc
 304+ 7C61              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 304+ 7C61 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 305+ 7C65 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 306+ 7C68 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 307+ 7C6B C1                                   pop    bc
 308+ 7C6C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 308+ 7C6C FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 308+ 7C6E D2 9E 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 309+ 7C71 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 310+ 7C73 0C                                   inc     c
 311+ 7C74 C5                                   push    bc
 312+ 7C75                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 312+ 7C75 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 313+ 7C79 CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 314+ 7C7C FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 315+ 7C7F C1                                   pop    bc
 316+ 7C80                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 316+ 7C80 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 316+ 7C82 D2 9E 7C    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 317+ 7C85 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 318+ 7C87 04                                   inc     b
 319+ 7C88 C5                                   push    bc
 320+ 7C89                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 320+ 7C89 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 321+ 7C8D CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 322+ 7C90 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 323+ 7C93 C1                                   pop    bc
 324+ 7C94 3E 92                                ld      a,L2DustColour
 325+ 7C96 0D                                   dec     c
 326+ 7C97                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 326+ 7C97 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 327+ 7C9B CD B6 E2                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 328+ 7C9E C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 329+ 7C9F FD E5        NextStarLoop3:          push    iy                                      ; +1
 330+ 7CA1 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 331+ 7CA2 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 332+ 7CA6 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 333+ 7CA7 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 334+ 7CA9 05                                   dec     b
 335+ 7CAA C2 28 7B                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 336+ 7CAD C9                                   ret
 337+ 7CAE C1           ResetStar:              pop     bc                                      ; 0
 338+ 7CAF FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1 (current star)
 339+ 7CB1 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ; 0
 340+ 7CB2 CD 3B 7A                             call    InitStarAtHL
 341+ 7CB5 C3 9F 7C                             jp      NextStarLoop3
 342+ 7CB8              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 343+ 7CB8 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 344+ 7CBB FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 345+ 7CBE 6F                                   ld      l,a
 346+ 7CBF E6 7F                                and     $7F
 347+ 7CC1 47                                   ld      b,a
 348+ 7CC2 CD 0B 95                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 349+ 7CC5 7D                                   ld      a,l
 350+ 7CC6                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 350+ 7CC6 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 350+ 7CC8 C2 D3 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 351+ 7CCB              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 352+ 7CCB 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 353+ 7CCD 26 00                                ld          h,0
 354+ 7CCF 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 355+ 7CD0 C3 DA 7C                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 356+ 7CD3              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 357+ 7CD3 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 358+ 7CD5 26 00                                ld          h,0
 359+ 7CD7                                      ClearCarryFlag
 359+ 7CD7 B7          >                        or a
 360+ 7CD8 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 361+ 7CDA              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 362+ 7CDA 7D                                   ld          a,l
 363+ 7CDB 32 E4 7F                             ld          (varStarX),a
 364+ 7CDE C9                                   ret
 365+ 7CDF
 366+ 7CDF FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 367+ 7CE2 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 368+ 7CE5 6F                                   ld          l,a
 369+ 7CE6 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 370+ 7CE8 47                                   ld          b,a
 371+ 7CE9 CD 0B 95                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 372+ 7CEC 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 373+ 7CED                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 373+ 7CED CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 373+ 7CEF C2 FA 7C    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 374+ 7CF2                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 375+ 7CF2 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 376+ 7CF4                                      ClearCarryFlag
 376+ 7CF4 B7          >                        or a
 377+ 7CF5 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 378+ 7CF7 C3 FF 7C                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 379+ 7CFA              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 380+ 7CFA 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 381+ 7CFC 26 00                                ld          h,0
 382+ 7CFE 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 383+ 7CFF              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 384+ 7CFF 7D                                   ld          a,l
 385+ 7D00 32 E5 7F                             ld          (varStarY),a
 386+ 7D03 C9                                   ret
 387+ 7D04
 388+ 7D04
# file closed: ./Universe/StarDust/StarRoutines.asm
 971  7D04              ;    include "Universe/move_object-MVEIT.asm"
 972  7D04              ;    include "./ModelRender/draw_object.asm"
 973  7D04              ;    include "./ModelRender/draw_ship_point.asm"
 974  7D04              ;    include "./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm"
 975  7D04              ;    include "./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm"

 977  7D04                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 7D04
   2+ 7D04 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 7D05 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 7D09 7D
   4+ 7D0A 04 7D        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 7D0C 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 7D0E 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 7D11 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 7D13 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 7D17              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 7D17
  11+ 7D17              memfill_dma:
  12+ 7D17              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 7D17              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 7D17 32 04 7D     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 7D1A              .set_target:
  16+ 7D1A 22 11 7D     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 7D1D              .set_length:
  18+ 7D1D ED 53 0C 7D  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 7D21              .write_dma:
  20+ 7D21 21 05 7D     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 7D24 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 7D26 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 7D28 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 7D2A C9           	ret
  25+ 7D2B
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 978  7D2B                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 7D2B
   2+ 7D2B 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 7D2F 7D
   3+ 7D30 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 7D32 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 7D34 14 10 CD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_BURST_MODE;DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 7D37 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 7D39 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 7D3D              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 7D3D
  10+ 7D3D              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 7D3D              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 7D3D              .set_target:
  13+ 7D3D 22 37 7D     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 7D40              .set_source:
  15+ 7D40 ED 53 30 7D  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 7D44              .set_length:
  17+ 7D44 ED 43 32 7D  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 7D48              .write_dma:
  19+ 7D48 21 2B 7D     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 7D4B 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 7D4D 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 7D4F ED B3        	otir
  23+ 7D51 C9           	ret
  24+ 7D52
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
 979  7D52 00 00        XX12PVarQ			DW 0
 980  7D54 00 00        XX12PVarR			DW 0
 981  7D56 00 00        XX12PVarS			DW 0
 982  7D58 00 00        XX12PVarResult1		DW 0
 983  7D5A 00 00        XX12PVarResult2		DW 0
 984  7D5C 00 00        XX12PVarResult3		DW 0
 985  7D5E 00           XX12PVarSign2		DB 0

 159+ 7E89                                                          ;      1 1  Front view , i.e. $03

 173+ 7E8C              ;              FB = Hyperspace complete

 138+ 838C              ; sets carry to true if target
 139+ 838C 3A AE 81     IsMissileLockedOn:      ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 140+ 838F CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 141+ 8391 28 07                                jr      z, .TargetSelected
 142+ 8393 E6 70                                and     $70                         ; are all upper bits set (we can ignore bit 7)
 143+ 8395 CA 9A 83                             jp      z, .TargetSelected           ; if its only bit 7 then we have a lock
 144+ 8398                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; if bitsd 6 to 4 were set then it must be unlocked status
 144+ 8398 B7          >                        or a
 145+ 8399 C9                                   ret

 146+ 839F 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)

 146+ 83A1 CA A7 83    >                        jp      z,.TargetInvalid    ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 146+ 83A4 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later

 147+ 83A5 37          >                        scf

  19+ 84A3 00 00 00 00  LaserDamagedFlag        DS  4               ; probabiliy out of 255 that it will no fire, 0 = good, 255 = will not fire
  20+ 84A7              ; dont need as static from table LaserPulseRate          DS  4               ; how many pulses can be fired before long pause
  21+ 84A7              ; dont need as static from table LaserPulsePause         DS  4               ; time before next pulse - 0 = beam
  22+ 84A7              ; dont need as static from table LaserPulseRest          DS  4               ; time before pulse count resets to 0
  23+ 84A7              ; dont need as static from table LaserDamageOutput       DS  4               ; amount of damage for a laser hit
  24+ 84A7              ; dont need as static from table LaserEnergyDrain        DS  4               ; amount of energy drained by cycle
  25+ 84A7              ; dont need as static from table LaserHeat               DS  4               ; amount of heat generated
  26+ 84A7              ; dont need as static from table LaserDurability         DS  4               ; probabability out of 255 that a hit on it unshielded will add random amount of damage
  27+ 84A7              ; dont need as static from table LaserDurabilityAmount   DS  4               ; max amount of damagage can be sustained in one damage hit
  28+ 84A7
  29+ 84A7
  30+ 84A7              QQ20                    equ CargoTonnes
  31+ 84A7 00 00 00...  EquipmentFitted         DS  EQ_ITEM_COUNT    ; Series of flags for if each item is fitted
  32+ 84C1              ECMPresent				EQU EquipmentFitted + EQ_ECM				; 0380
  33+ 84C1              FuelScoop               EQU EquipmentFitted + EQ_FUEL_SCOOPS
  34+ 84C1              EnergyBomb				EQU EquipmentFitted + EQ_ENERGY_BOMB		; 0382	Also random hyperspeace in Elite A

  36+ 84C1              DockingComputer 		EQU EquipmentFitted + EQ_DOCK_COMP    		; 0384
  37+ 84C1              GalacticHyperDrive		EQU EquipmentFitted + EQ_GAL_DRIVE   		; 0385

  39+ 84C1 01           FuelScoopsBarrelStatus	DB	1				; 0381

 993  84C2                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 84C2              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 84C2              doRND2:
   3+ 84C2 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 84C3              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 84C3              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & C)"
   6+ 84C3              ; uses a c h l registers
   7+ 84C3              doRND:                  ;exx                                     ; protect bc,de,hl
   8+ 84C3 3A 71 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   9+ 84C6 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
  10+ 84C8 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
  11+ 84C9 21 73 7D     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  12+ 84CC 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  13+ 84CD 32 71 7D     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  14+ 84D0 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  15+ 84D1 79                                   ld		a,c
  16+ 84D2 32 73 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  17+ 84D5 08                                   ex		af,af'
  18+ 84D6 3A 72 7D                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  19+ 84D9 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  20+ 84DA 21 74 7D     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  21+ 84DD 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  22+ 84DE 32 72 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  23+ 84E1 08                                   ex		af,af'
  24+ 84E2 79                                   ld		a,c
  25+ 84E3 32 74 7D                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  26+ 84E6 08                                   ex		af,af'
  27+ 84E7                                      ;exx                                     ; get bc,de,hl back
  28+ 84E7 C9                                   ret
  29+ 84E8
  30+ 84E8 21 71 7D     saveRandomSeeds:        ld      hl,RandomSeed
  31+ 84EB 11 75 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeedSave
  32+ 84EE 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  33+ 84F1 ED A0                                ldi
  34+ 84F3 ED A0                                ldi
  35+ 84F5 ED A0                                ldi
  36+ 84F7 ED A0                                ldi
  37+ 84F9 C9                                   ret
  38+ 84FA
  39+ 84FA 21 75 7D     restoreRandomSeeds:     ld      hl,RandomSeedSave
  40+ 84FD 11 71 7D                             ld      de,RandomSeed
  41+ 8500 01 04 00                             ld      bc,4
  42+ 8503 ED A0                                ldi
  43+ 8505 ED A0                                ldi
  44+ 8507 ED A0                                ldi
  45+ 8509 ED A0                                ldi
  46+ 850B C9                                   ret
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   1+ 850C 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 8510 58 59 53 45
   1+ 8514 45 44
   2+ 8516 21 0B 7F     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 8519 11 E7 7E                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 851C ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 851E ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 8520 ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 8522 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 8524 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 8526 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 8528 C9                                   ret
  11+ 8529
  12+ 8529 21 E7 7E     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 852C 11 0B 7F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 852F 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 8531
  16+ 8531 21 0B 7F     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 8534 11 FF 7E                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 8537 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 8539
  20+ 8539 21 FF 7E     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 853C 11 0B 7F                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 853F 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 8541
  24+ 8541 21 FF 7E     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 8544 11 E7 7E                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 8547 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 8549
  28+ 8549 21 E7 7E     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 854C 11 FF 7E                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 854F 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 8551
  32+ 8551              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 8551 CD 54 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 8554              .NextStep:
  35+ 8554 CD 57 85     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 8557              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 8557 3A E7 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 855A B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 855B 21 E9 7E     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 855E 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 855F 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 8560 3A E8 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 8563 21 EA 7E     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 8566 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 8567 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 8568 3A E9 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 856B 32 E7 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 856E 3A EA 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 8571 32 E8 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 8574 3A EC 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 8577 32 EA 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 857A 3A EB 7E     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 857D 32 E9 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 8580 B7           		or		a
  55+ 8581 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 8582 21 E9 7E     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 8585 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 8586 32 EB 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 8589 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 858A 21 EA 7E     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 858D 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 858E 32 EC 7E     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 8591 C9           		ret
  64+ 8592
  65+ 8592              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 8592 CD 95 85     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 8595              .NextStep:
  68+ 8595 CD 98 85     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 8598              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 8598              ; x = a + c
  71+ 8598 3A FF 7E     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 859B B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 859C 21 01 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 859F 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 85A0 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 85A1              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 85A1 3A 00 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 85A4 21 02 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 85A7 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 85A8 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 85A9 3A 01 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 85AC 32 FF 7E     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 85AF 3A 02 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 85B2 32 00 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 85B5 3A 04 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 85B8 32 02 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 85BB 3A 03 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 85BE 32 01 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 85C1 B7           		or		a
  90+ 85C2 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 85C3 21 01 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 85C6 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 85C7 32 03 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 85CA 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 85CB 21 02 7F     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 85CE 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 85CF 32 04 7F     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 85D2 C9           		ret
  99+ 85D3
 100+ 85D3 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 85D4 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 85D5 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 85D6
 104+ 85D6 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 85D7 32 80 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 85DA 3A E8 7E     .CounterLoop:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 107+ 85DD 4F                                   ld		c,a
 108+ 85DE 3A 12 7F     .calcLocaldy:           ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 109+ 85E1 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 110+ 85E2 79                                   ld		a,c
 111+ 85E3 90                                   sub		b
 112+ 85E4 CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 113+ 85E6 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedy
 114+ 85E8 ED 44        .negativedy:            neg
 115+ 85EA 32 D5 85     .positivedy:            ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 116+ 85ED ED 5B D3 85                          ld		de,(working_distX)
 117+ 85F1 BA                                   cp		d
 118+ 85F2 30 24                                jr		nc,.toofar
 119+ 85F4 3A EA 7E     .calcLocaldx:           ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 120+ 85F7 4F                                   ld		c,a
 121+ 85F8 3A 11 7F                             ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 122+ 85FB 47                                   ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 123+ 85FC 79                                   ld		a,c
 124+ 85FD 90                                   sub		b
 125+ 85FE CB 7F                                bit		7,a
 126+ 8600 28 02                                jr		z,.positivedx
 127+ 8602 ED 44        .negativedx:            neg
 128+ 8604 4F           .positivedx:            ld		c,a
 129+ 8605 BB                                   cp		e
 130+ 8606 30 10                                jr		nc,.toofar
 131+ 8608 3A D5 85     .Nearer:			    ld		a,(current_distY) 				; we have a closer system
 132+ 860B 47                                   ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 133+ 860C ED 43 D3 85                          ld		(working_distX),bc
 134+ 8610 C5                                   push	bc
 135+ 8611 CD 49 85                             call 	copy_system_to_working
 136+ 8614 C1                                   pop		bc
 137+ 8615 78                                   ld		a,b								;
 138+ 8616 B1                                   or		c								;
 139+ 8617 C8                                   ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 140+ 8618 CD 51 85     .toofar:                call	next_system_seed
 141+ 861B 3A 80 7E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 142+ 861E 3D                                   dec		a
 143+ 861F FE 00                                cp		0
 144+ 8621 C8                                   ret		z
 145+ 8622 32 80 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 146+ 8625 18 B3                                jr		.CounterLoop
 147+ 8627
 148+ 8627              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 149+ 8627 3A 00 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 150+ 862A E6 07        		and		7
 151+ 862C 32 2C 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 152+ 862F 3A 01 7F     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 153+ 8632 CB 3F        		srl	a
 154+ 8634 CB 3F        		srl	a
 155+ 8636 CB 3F        		srl	a
 156+ 8638 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 157+ 863A E6 07        		and		7
 158+ 863C 32 2D 7F     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 159+ 863F CB 3F        		srl	a
 160+ 8641 FE 00        		cp		0
 161+ 8643 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 162+ 8645              .Fedual:
 163+ 8645 3A 2C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 164+ 8648 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 165+ 864A 32 2C 7F     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 166+ 864D              .CanBeRich:
 167+ 864D 3A 2C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 168+ 8650 EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 169+ 8652 32 2E 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 170+ 8655 47           		ld		b,a
 171+ 8656 3A 02 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 172+ 8659 E6 03        		and		3
 173+ 865B 80           		add		a,b
 174+ 865C 32 2E 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 175+ 865F 3A 2D 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 176+ 8662 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 177+ 8664 47           		ld		b,a
 178+ 8665 3A 2E 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 179+ 8668 80           		add		a,b
 180+ 8669 32 2E 7F     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 181+ 866C CB 27        		sla		a
 182+ 866E CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 183+ 8670 47           		ld		b,a
 184+ 8671 3A 2C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 185+ 8674 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 186+ 8675 47           		ld		b,a
 187+ 8676 3A 2D 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 188+ 8679 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 189+ 867A 32 2F 7F     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 190+ 867D 3A 2C 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 191+ 8680 EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 192+ 8682 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 193+ 8684 57           		ld		d,a
 194+ 8685 3A 2D 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 195+ 8688 C6 04        		add		4
 196+ 868A 5F           		ld		e,a
 197+ 868B ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 198+ 868D 3A 2F 7F     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 199+ 8690 57           		ld		d,a
 200+ 8691 ED 30        		mul
 201+ 8693 CB 23        		sla		e
 202+ 8695 CB 1A        		rr		d
 203+ 8697 CB 23        		sla		e
 204+ 8699 CB 1A        		rr		d
 205+ 869B CB 23        		sla		e
 206+ 869D CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 207+ 869F ED 53 31 7F  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 208+ 86A3              .DoRadius:
 209+ 86A3 3A 02 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 210+ 86A6 4F           		ld		c,a
 211+ 86A7 3A 04 7F     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 212+ 86AA E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 213+ 86AC C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 214+ 86AE 47           		ld		b,a							;
 215+ 86AF ED 43 35 7F  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 216+ 86B3 C9           		ret

  34+ 87FA
  35+ 87FA              RankingEQHarmless	EQU 0
  36+ 87FA              RankingEQMostly		EQU 1
  37+ 87FA              RankingEQPoor		EQU 2
  38+ 87FA              RankingEQAverage	EQU 3
  39+ 87FA              RankingEQAbove		EQU 4
  40+ 87FA              RankingEQCompetent  EQU 5
  41+ 87FA              RankingEQDangerous	EQU 6
  42+ 87FA              RankingEQDeadly		EQU 7
  43+ 87FA              RankingEQElite		EQU 8
  44+ 87FA              RankingEQSkollob	EQU 9
  45+ 87FA              RankingEQNutter		EQU 10
  46+ 87FA

  49+ 87FA 85 87 8E 87  RankingNameIdx		dw RankingName1,RankingName2,RankingName3,RankingName4,RankingName5,RankingName6,RankingName7,RankingName8,RankingName9,RankingName10,RankingName11
  49+ 87FE 9E 87 A3 87
  49+ 8802 AB 87 B9 87
  49+ 8806 C3 87 CD 87
  49+ 880A D4 87 E7 87
  49+ 880E F3 87
  50+ 8810              RankingNameIdxLen EQU $ - RankingNameIdx
  51+ 8810
  52+ 8810
  53+ 8810              getTableText:
  54+ 8810              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  55+ 8810              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  56+ 8810 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  57+ 8811 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  58+ 8813 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  59+ 8815 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  60+ 8816 23           	inc		hl
  61+ 8817 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  62+ 8818 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  63+ 8819 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  64+ 881A C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  65+ 881B
  66+ 881B
  67+ 881B              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  68+ 881B              ;               -----------------------------------
  69+ 881B              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  70+ 881B              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  71+ 881B              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  72+ 881B              ;               1       1       Impossible
  73+ 881B              getRankIndex:
  74+ 881B              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  75+ 881B              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  76+ 881B 7A           	ld		a,d
  77+ 881C B3           	or		e
  78+ 881D FE 00        	cp		0
  79+ 881F C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  80+ 8820 AF           	xor 	a
  81+ 8821 21 59 87     	ld		hl,RankingTableLow
  82+ 8824              .testLoop:
  83+ 8824 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  84+ 8825 23           	inc		hl
  85+ 8826 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  86+ 8827 E5           	push	hl
  87+ 8828 60           	ld		h,b
  88+ 8829 69           	ld		l,c
  89+ 882A CD 6A 98     	call	compare16HLDE
  90+ 882D 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  91+ 882F              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  92+ 882F E1           	pop		hl
  93+ 8830 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  94+ 8831 23           	inc		hl
  95+ 8832 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  96+ 8833 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  97+ 8835              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  98+ 8835 E1           	pop		hl
  99+ 8836 C9           	ret
 100+ 8837
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 237+ 8E8A              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 238+ 8E8A              .CapLoop:
 239+ 8E8A 23           	inc		hl
 240+ 8E8B 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 241+ 8E8C FE 00        	cp		0
 242+ 8E8E C8           	ret		z
 243+ 8E8F FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 244+ 8E91 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 245+ 8E93 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 246+ 8E95 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 247+ 8E97              .LowerCase:

 249+ 8E99 77           	ld		(hl),a
 250+ 8E9A 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop

 259+ 8EAA 5E                                   ld		e,(hl)
 260+ 8EAB 23                                   inc		hl

 262+ 8EAD EB                                   ex		de,hl

 271+ 8EB6 11 69 8E     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 272+ 8EB9              .ReadLoop:
 273+ 8EB9 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 274+ 8EBA FE 00        	cp		0
 275+ 8EBC 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 276+ 8EBE E5           	push	hl
 277+ 8EBF D5           	push	de

 281+ 8EC7              .WordExpandLoop:
 282+ 8EC7 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 283+ 8EC8 FE 00        	cp		0
 284+ 8ECA 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 285+ 8ECC              ;.GetChar:
 286+ 8ECC 12           	ld		(de),a
 287+ 8ECD 13           	inc		de
 288+ 8ECE 23           	inc		hl
 289+ 8ECF 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 290+ 8ED1              .AddSpace:
 291+ 8ED1 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 292+ 8ED3 12           	ld		(de),a
 293+ 8ED4 13           	inc		de
 294+ 8ED5 E1           	pop		hl
 295+ 8ED6 23           	inc		hl
 296+ 8ED7 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 297+ 8ED9              .ReadDone:
 298+ 8ED9 1B           	dec		de
 299+ 8EDA AF           	xor		a
 300+ 8EDB 12           	ld		(de),a
 301+ 8EDC C9           	ret

 116+ 8F77              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ 8F77              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ 8F77              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ 8F77              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ 8F77              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ 8F77              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ 8F77              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ 8F77              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ 8F77              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ 8F77              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ 8F77              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ 8F77              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ 8F77              ;
 129+ 8F77              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ 8F77              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ 8F77              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ 8F77              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ 8F77              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ 8F77              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ 8F77              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ 8F77              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ 8F77              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ 8F77              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ 8F77              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ 8F77              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ 8F77              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ 8F77              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ 8F77              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ 8F77              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ 8F77              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ 8F77              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ 8F77              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ 8F77              ;C8                      INY
 149+ 8F77              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ 8F77              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ 8F77              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ 8F77              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ 8F77              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ 8F77              ;98                      TYA
 156+ 8F77              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ 8F77              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ 8F77              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ 8F77              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ 8F77              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ 8F77              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ 8F77              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ 8F77              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ 8F77              ;68                      PLA
 165+ 8F77              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ 8F77              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ 8F77              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ 8F77              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ 8F77              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ 8F77              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ 8F77              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ 8F77              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
