 178+ 8F77              ;
 179+ 8F77              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ 8F77              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ 8F77              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ 8F77              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ 8F77              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ 8F77              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ 8F77              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ 8F77              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ 8F77              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ 8F77              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ 8F77              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ 8F77              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ 8F77              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ 8F77              ;60                      RTS
 199+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ 8F77              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ 8F77              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ 8F77              ;60                      RTS
 204+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ 8F77              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ 8F77              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ 8F77              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ 8F77              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ 8F77              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ 8F77              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ 8F77              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ 8F77              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ 8F77              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ 8F77              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ 8F77              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ 8F77              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ 8F77              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ 8F77              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 8F77              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 8F77              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 8F77              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 8F77              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 8F77              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 8F77              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 8F77              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 8F77              ;
 227+ 8F77              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 8F77              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 8F77              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 8F77              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 8F77              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 8F77              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 8F77              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 8F77              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 8F77              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 8F77              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 8F77              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 8F77              ;
 239+ 8F77              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 8F77              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 8F77              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 8F77              ;
 243+ 8F77              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ 8F77              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ 8F77              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ 8F77              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 8F77              ;
 248+ 8F77              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ 8F77              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ 8F77              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ 8F77              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ 8F77              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ 8F77              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ 8F77              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ 8F77              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ 8F77              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ 8F77              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ 8F77              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ 8F77              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ 8F77              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ 8F77              ;
 262+ 8F77              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ 8F77              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ 8F77              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ 8F77              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ 8F77              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ 8F77              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ 8F77              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ 8F77              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ 8F77              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ 8F77              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ 8F77              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ 8F77              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ 8F77              ;
 275+ 8F77              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ 8F77              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ 8F77              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ 8F77              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ 8F77              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ 8F77              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ 8F77              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ 8F77              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ 8F77              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ 8F77              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ 8F77              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ 8F77              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ 8F77              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ 8F77              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ 8F77              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ 8F77              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ 8F77              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ 8F77              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ 8F77              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ 8F77              ;C8                      INY
 295+ 8F77              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ 8F77              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ 8F77              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ 8F77              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ 8F77              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ 8F77              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ 8F77              ;98                      TYA
 302+ 8F77              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ 8F77              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ 8F77              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ 8F77              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ 8F77              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ 8F77              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ 8F77              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ 8F77              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ 8F77              ;68                      PLA
 311+ 8F77              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ 8F77              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ 8F77              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ 8F77              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ 8F77              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ 8F77              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ 8F77              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ 8F77              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ 8F77              ;
 320+ 8F77              ;

   1+ 8F77              ;; calcs BHB + CDE where B and C are signs and may be 24 bit
   2+ 8F77              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3+ 8F77              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4+ 8F77
   5+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLSAHLEquBHLaddCDE:        ld      a,b
   6+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        xor     c
   7+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        and     SignOnly8Bit
   8+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative   .OppositeSigns
   9+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.SameSigns:             ld      ixh,b                      ; ixh = b
  10+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBit b                     ; b = ABS b
  11+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        add     hl,de                      ; hl = hl + de
  12+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,b                        ; a = b + c + carry
  13+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        adc     c                          ;
  14+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,a                        ;
  15+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,ixh                      ;
  16+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        SignBitOnlyA                       ;
  17+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        or      b                          ;
  18+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ret                                ;
  19+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.OppositeSigns:         ld      ixh,b                      ; save signed into ixh and ixl
  20+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      ixl,c                      ; .
  21+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBit c                     ; c = ABS C
  22+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,b                        ; a = abs b
  23+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ClearSignBitA                      ; .
  24+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        sbc     c                          ; a = a - c
  25+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative  .OppositeCDEgtBHL  ; if c is positive
  26+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        push    hl
  27+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        sbc     hl,de                      ; then subtract de from hl
  28+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        JumpIfNegative  .HLDEWasNegative   ; if sub was positive
  29+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        pop     de                         ; at this stage the stack is just junk
  30+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,a                        ; then copy results to AHL
  31+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      a,ixh                      ; by just handling sign
  32+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        SignBitOnlyA                       ; .
  33+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        or      b                          ; .
  34+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ret                                ; .
  35+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.OppositeCDEgtBHL:      ex      de,hl                      ; save hl
  36+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      c,ixh                      ; swap signs over
  37+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        ld      b,ixl                      ;
  38+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        jp      .OppositeSigns             ; and do calc again
  39+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS.HLDEWasNegative:       pop     hl                         ; get back hl swap values and try again
  40+ 8F77              ;DOES NOT WORK IF SIGNED RPLACE WITH ADDBCHTODELSIGNED CALLS                        jp      .OppositeCDEgtBHL
  41+ 8F77              ; example
  42+ 8F77              ; bhl - 00 00 06 CDE - 80 00 0B so equates to 000006 + (-00000B) or -000005 or 800005
  43+ 8F77
  44+ 8F77 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
  45+ 8F78 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  46+ 8F7A A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  47+ 8F7B                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  47+ 8F7B FA 89 8F    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
  48+ 8F7E 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
  49+ 8F7F B1                                   or      c
  50+ 8F80                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg    ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  50+ 8F80 FA 85 8F    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  51+ 8F83 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  52+ 8F84 C9                                   ret
  53+ 8F85 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  54+ 8F86 78                                   ld      a,b
  55+ 8F87 B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  56+ 8F88 C9                                   ret
  57+ 8F89              ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       ClearCarryFlag
  57+ 8F89 B7          >                        or a
  58+ 8F8A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  59+ 8F8C 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  60+ 8F8E 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry:ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  61+ 8F8F C9                                   ret
  62+ 8F90              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                               ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  62+ 8F90 AF          >                    xor a
  62+ 8F91 95          >                    sub l
  62+ 8F92 6F          >                    ld l,a
  62+ 8F93 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  62+ 8F94 94          >                    sub h
  62+ 8F95 67          >                    ld h,a
  63+ 8F96 78                                   ld      a,b
  64+ 8F97 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  65+ 8F99 C9                                   ret
  66+ 8F9A
  67+ 8F9A 7C           ADDHLDESignedV4:        ld      a,h
  68+ 8F9B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  69+ 8F9D 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  70+ 8F9E AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  71+ 8F9F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN       ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  71+ 8F9F FA B7 8F    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  72+ 8FA2 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
  73+ 8FA3 B2                                   or      d
  74+ 8FA4                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg      ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  74+ 8FA4 FA A9 8F    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  75+ 8FA7 19                                   add     hl,de
  76+ 8FA8 C9                                   ret
  77+ 8FA9 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  78+ 8FAA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  79+ 8FAC 67                                   ld      h,a
  80+ 8FAD 7A                                   ld      a,d
  81+ 8FAE E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  82+ 8FB0 57                                   ld      d,a
  83+ 8FB1 19                                   add     hl,de
  84+ 8FB2 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  85+ 8FB4 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  86+ 8FB5 67                                   ld      h,a
  87+ 8FB6 C9                                   ret
  88+ 8FB7 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  89+ 8FB8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  90+ 8FBA 67                                   ld      h,a
  91+ 8FBB 7A                                   ld      a,d
  92+ 8FBC E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  93+ 8FBE 57                                   ld      d,a
  94+ 8FBF                                      ClearCarryFlag
  94+ 8FBF B7          >                        or a
  95+ 8FC0 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  96+ 8FC2 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  97+ 8FC4 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  98+ 8FC5 B4                                   or      h
  99+ 8FC6 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 100+ 8FC7 C9                                   ret
 101+ 8FC8              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 101+ 8FC8 AF          >                    xor a
 101+ 8FC9 95          >                    sub l
 101+ 8FCA 6F          >                    ld l,a
 101+ 8FCB 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 101+ 8FCC 94          >                    sub h
 101+ 8FCD 67          >                    ld h,a
 102+ 8FCE 78                                   ld      a,b
 103+ 8FCF EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 104+ 8FD1 B4                                   or      h
 105+ 8FD2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 106+ 8FD3 C9                                   ret

 140+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLPositive:            ld      a,e                         ; else its HL + A
 141+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         add     hl,a
 142+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 143+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .HLNegative:            ClearSignBit    h                   ; Clear sign of HL
 144+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         NegHL                               ; and convert to 2's C

 146+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ClearCarryFlag
 147+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         sbc     hl,de                       ; now add a to -ve HL , add does not do 2's c
 148+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         jp      m,.FlipResult               ; if it was negative then its really positive
 149+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         SetSignBit      h
 150+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret
 151+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ? .FlipResult:            NegHL                               ; so if -hl + A => HL - A => HL - DE is negative then the actual result is +ve
 152+ 8FD4              ;; NOT USED MAY WORK ?                         ret

 155+ 8FD4              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 156+ 8FD4              ; HL = HL (signed) + A (unsigned), uses HL, DE, A
 157+ 8FD4 57           AddAusngToHLsng:        ld      d,a
 158+ 8FD5 5C                                   ld      e,h
 159+ 8FD6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 160+ 8FD7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 8FD9 67                                   ld      h,a
 162+ 8FDA 7A                                   ld      a,d
 163+ 8FDB ED 31                                add     hl,a
 164+ 8FDD 7B                                   ld      a,e
 165+ 8FDE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 166+ 8FE0 B4                                   or      h
 167+ 8FE1 C9                                   ret
 168+ 8FE2              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 169+ 8FE2              ; HL = A (unsigned) - HL (signed), uses HL, DE, BC, A
 170+ 8FE2 44           HLEequAusngMinusHLsng:  ld      b,h
 171+ 8FE3 4F                                   ld      c,a
 172+ 8FE4 78                                   ld      a,b
 173+ 8FE5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 174+ 8FE7 20 08                                jr      nz,.DoAdd
 175+ 8FE9 EB           .DoSubtract:            ex      de,hl               ; move hl into de
 176+ 8FEA 26 00                                ld      h,0                 ; hl = a
 177+ 8FEC 69                                   ld      l,c
 178+ 8FED                                      ClearCarryFlag
 178+ 8FED B7          >                        or a
 179+ 8FEE ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ; hl = a - hl
 180+ 8FF0 C9                                   ret
 181+ 8FF1 79           .DoAdd:                 ld      a,c
 182+ 8FF2 ED 31                                add hl,a
 183+ 8FF4 C9                                   ret
 184+ 8FF5              ;tested mathstestsun2
 185+ 8FF5              ; DEL = DEL + BCH signed, uses BC, DE, HL, IY, A
 186+ 8FF5 78           AddBCHtoDELsigned:      ld      a,b                 ; Are the values both the same sign?
 187+ 8FF6 AA                                   xor     d                   ; .
 188+ 8FF7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 189+ 8FF9 20 19                                jr      nz,.SignDifferent   ; .
 190+ 8FFB 78           .SignSame:              ld      a,b                 ; if they are then we only need 1 signe
 191+ 8FFC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; so store it in iyh
 192+ 8FFE FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ;
 193+ 9000 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 194+ 9001 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 195+ 9003 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 196+ 9004 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 197+ 9005 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 198+ 9007 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 199+ 9008 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; l = h + l
 200+ 9009 85                                   add     l                   ; .
 201+ 900A 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 202+ 900B 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; e = e + c + carry
 203+ 900C 8B                                   adc     e                   ; .
 204+ 900D 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 205+ 900E 78                                   ld      a,b                 ; d = b + d + carry (signed)
 206+ 900F 8A                                   adc     d                   ;
 207+ 9010 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; d = or back in sign bit
 208+ 9012 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 209+ 9013 C9                                   ret                         ; done
 210+ 9014 78           .SignDifferent:         ld      a,b                 ; bch = abs bch
 211+ 9015 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = b sign
 212+ 9017 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 213+ 9019 47                                   ld      b,a                 ; .
 214+ 901A 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; del = abs del
 215+ 901B FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a               ; iyl = d sign
 216+ 901D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 217+ 901F 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 218+ 9020 E5                                   push    hl                  ; save hl
 219+ 9021 60 69                                ld      hl,bc               ; hl = bc - de, if bc < de then there is a carry
 220+ 9023 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de               ;
 221+ 9025 E1                                   pop     hl                  ;
 222+ 9026 38 0E                                jr      c,.BCHltDEL
 223+ 9028 20 1C                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH        ; if the result was not zero then DEL > BCH
 224+ 902A 7C           .BCeqDE:                ld      a,h                 ; if the result was zero then check lowest bits
 225+ 902B                                      JumpIfALTNusng l,.BCHltDEL
 225+ 902B BD          >                        cp      l
 225+ 902C DA 36 90    >                        jp		c, .BCHltDEL
 226+ 902F 20 15                                jr      nz,.DELltBCH
 227+ 9031              ; The same so its just zero
 228+ 9031 AF           .BCHeqDEL:              xor     a                  ; its just zero
 229+ 9032 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .
 230+ 9033 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .
 231+ 9034 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .
 232+ 9035 C9                                   ret                        ; .
 233+ 9036              ;BCH is less than DEL so its DEL - BCH the sort out sign
 234+ 9036 7D           .BCHltDEL:              ld      a,l                ; l = l - h                      ; ex
 235+ 9037 94                                   sub     h                  ; .                              ;   01D70F DEL
 236+ 9038 6F                                   ld      l,a                ; .                              ;  -000028 BCH
 237+ 9039 7B                                   ld      a,e                ; e = e - c - carry              ;1.
 238+ 903A 99                                   sbc     c                  ; .                              ;
 239+ 903B 5F                                   ld      e,a                ; .                              ;
 240+ 903C 7A                                   ld      a,d                ; d = d - b - carry              ;
 241+ 903D 98                                   sbc     b                  ; .                              ;
 242+ 903E 57                                   ld      d,a                ; .                              ;
 243+ 903F FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl              ; as d was larger, take d sign
 244+ 9041 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 245+ 9043 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 246+ 9044 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 247+ 9045 C9                                   ret
 248+ 9046 7C           .DELltBCH:              ld      a,h                ; l = h - l
 249+ 9047 95                                   sub     l                  ;
 250+ 9048 6F                                   ld      l,a                ;
 251+ 9049 79                                   ld      a,c                ; e = c - e - carry
 252+ 904A 9B                                   sbc     e                  ;
 253+ 904B 5F                                   ld      e,a                ;
 254+ 904C 78                                   ld      a,b                ; d = b - d - carry
 255+ 904D 9A                                   sbc     d                  ;
 256+ 904E 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 257+ 904F FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh              ; as b was larger, take b sign into d
 258+ 9051 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit       ;
 259+ 9053 B2                                   or      d                  ;
 260+ 9054 57                                   ld      d,a                ;
 261+ 9055 C9                                   ret
 262+ 9056
 263+ 9056              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 264+ 9056              ;BHL = AHL + DE where AHL = 16 bit + A sign and DE = 15 bit signed
 265+ 9056 47           AddAHLtoDEsigned:       ld      b,a                     ; B = A , C = D (save sign bytes)
 266+ 9057 4A                                   ld      c,d                     ; .
 267+ 9058 A9                                   xor     c                       ; A = A xor C
 268+ 9059 CB BA                                res     7,d                     ; clear sign bit of D
 269+ 905B 20 02                                jr nz,  .OppositeSigns          ; if A xor C is opposite signs job to A0A1
 270+ 905D 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; HL = HL + DE
 271+ 905E C9                                   ret                             ; return
 272+ 905F ED 52        .OppositeSigns:         sbc     hl,de                   ; HL = HL -DE
 273+ 9061 D0                                   ret     nc                      ; if no carry return
 274+ 9062 19                                   add     hl,de                   ; else HL = HL + DE
 275+ 9063 EB                                   ex      de,hl                   ;      swap HL and DE
 276+ 9064 A7                                   and     a                       ;      reset carry
 277+ 9065 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                   ;      HL = DE - HL (as they were swapped)
 278+ 9067 41                                   ld      b,c                     ;      B = sign of C
 279+ 9068 C9                                   ret                             ;      ret
 280+ 9069
 281+ 9069
 282+ 9069              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 283+ 9069              ; a = value to add
 284+ 9069              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
 285+ 9069              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
 286+ 9069              ; NOT USED addINWKbasigned:
 287+ 9069              ; NOT USED 		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
 288+ 9069              ; NOT USED 		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
 289+ 9069              ; NOT USED 		ld		a,b
 290+ 9069              ; NOT USED 		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
 291+ 9069              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
 292+ 9069              ; NOT USED         and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
 293+ 9069              ; NOT USED         ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
 294+ 9069              ; NOT USED         ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
 295+ 9069              ; NOT USED         and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
 296+ 9069              ; 06 06 2022 not used
 297+ 9069              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
 298+ 9069              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
 299+ 9069              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
 300+ 9069              ; NOTUSEDaddhlcsigned:
 301+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
 302+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 303+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      d,(hl)
 304+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
 305+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
 306+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
 307+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
 308+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
 309+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        jr      z,.postivecalc
 310+ 9069              ; NOTUSED.negativecalc:
 311+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,h
 312+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 313+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
 314+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
 315+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
 316+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        sbc     hl,bc
 317+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
 318+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
 319+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      a,(hl)                      ;
 320+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        and     SignMask8Bit
 321+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
 322+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        or      $80                         ; set bit 0
 323+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
 324+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a
 325+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 326+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 327+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 328+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
 329+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 330+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
 331+ 9069              ; NOTUSED.nocarry:
 332+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        NegHL                               ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
 333+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        or      b                           ; b is still varT
 334+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
 335+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 336+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 337+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 338+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        inc     hl
 339+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
 340+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
 341+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ret
 342+ 9069              ; NOTUSED.postivecalc:
 343+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      ixl,b
 344+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      b,0
 345+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        add     hl,de
 346+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ex      de,hl
 347+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
 348+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
 349+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 350+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),d
 351+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        dec     hl
 352+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ld      (hl),e
 353+ 9069              ; NOTUSED        ret
 354+ 9069
 355+ 9069              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
 356+ 9069              ;MVT1
 357+ 9069              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
 358+ 9069              ;    A = sign bit => T
 359+ 9069              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
 360+ 9069              ;    if negative thn its not an add
 361+ 9069              ;
 362+ 9069              ;        and h, 7F
 363+ 9069              ;        b = 0
 364+ 9069              ;        c = varS
 365+ 9069              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
 366+ 9069              ;        retain carry
 367+ 9069              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
 368+ 9069              ;        and 7F
 369+ 9069              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
 370+ 9069              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
 371+ 9069              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
 372+ 9069              ;
 373+ 9069              ;    else
 374+ 9069              ;MV10.
 375+ 9069              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
 376+ 9069              ;        or      sign bit
 377+ 9069
 378+ 9069
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_add.asm
1001  9069                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_subtract.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_subtract.asm
   1+ 9069              ;...subtract routines
   2+ 9069              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
   3+ 9069 7C           subHLDES15:             ld      a,h
   4+ 906A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   5+ 906C 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
   6+ 906D AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7+ 906E                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
   7+ 906E FA 9C 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
   8+ 9071 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
   9+ 9072 B2                                   or      d
  10+ 9073                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10+ 9073 FA 7D 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
  11+ 9076                                      ClearCarryFlag
  11+ 9076 B7          >                        or a
  12+ 9077 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  13+ 9079                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  13+ 9079 FA 90 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  14+ 907C C9                                   ret
  15+ 907D 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  16+ 907E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  17+ 9080 67                                   ld      h,a
  18+ 9081 7A                                   ld      a,d
  19+ 9082 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  20+ 9084 57                                   ld      d,a
  21+ 9085                                      ClearCarryFlag
  21+ 9085 B7          >                        or a
  22+ 9086 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  23+ 9088                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  23+ 9088 FA 90 90    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  24+ 908B 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  25+ 908C F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
  26+ 908E 67                                   ld      h,a
  27+ 908F C9                                   ret
  28+ 9090              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
  28+ 9090 AF          >                    xor a
  28+ 9091 95          >                    sub l
  28+ 9092 6F          >                    ld l,a
  28+ 9093 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  28+ 9094 94          >                    sub h
  28+ 9095 67          >                    ld h,a
  29+ 9096 78                                   ld      a,b
  30+ 9097 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  31+ 9099 B4                                   or      h
  32+ 909A 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  33+ 909B C9                                   ret
  34+ 909C B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
  35+ 909D 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  36+ 909E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  37+ 90A0 67                                   ld      h,a
  38+ 90A1 7A                                   ld      a,d
  39+ 90A2 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  40+ 90A4 57                                   ld      d,a
  41+ 90A5 19                                   add     hl,de
  42+ 90A6 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  43+ 90A7 B4                                   or      h
  44+ 90A8 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  45+ 90A9 C9                                   ret
  46+ 90AA
  47+ 90AA

   1+ 90AA              ; Note its big endian
   2+ 90AA 2A 88 84     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ 90AD 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ 90AE 22 88 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ 90B1 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ 90B4 2A 8A 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 90B7 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 90B9 22 8A 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 90BC C9                                   ret
  10+ 90BD
  11+ 90BD 2A 88 84     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ 90C0 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ 90C1 B5                                   or      l
  14+ 90C2 2A 8A 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 90C5 B4                                   or      h
  16+ 90C6 B5                                   or      l
  17+ 90C7 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ 90C8 B7                                   or      a
  19+ 90C9 2A 88 84                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ 90CC ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ 90CE 22 88 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ 90D1 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ 90D4 2A 8A 84                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ 90D7 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 90D9 22 8A 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ 90DC                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ 90DC CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ 90DE C2 E2 90    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 90E1 C9                                   ret
  28+ 90E2 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ 90E5 22 88 84                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ 90E8 22 8A 84                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ 90EB C9                                   ret
