1003  90EC                  INCLUDE "./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
   1+ 90EC              ;INPUTS: ahl = dividend cde = divisor
   2+ 90EC              ;OUTPUTS: cde = quotient ahl = remainder
   3+ 90EC 47           Div24by24:              ld b,a
   4+ 90ED E5                                   push hl
   5+ 90EE DD E1                                pop ix
   6+ 90F0 2E 18                                ld l,24
   7+ 90F2 E5                                   push hl
   8+ 90F3 AF                                   xor a
   9+ 90F4 67                                   ld h,a
  10+ 90F5 6F                                   ld l,a
  11+ 90F6 DD 29        .Div24by24loop:         add ix,ix
  12+ 90F8 CB 10                                rl b
  13+ 90FA ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
  14+ 90FC 17                                   rla
  15+ 90FD B9                                   cp c
  16+ 90FE 38 0C                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  17+ 9100 20 05                                jr nz,.Div24by24setbit
  18+ 9102 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
  19+ 9104 19                                   add hl,de
  20+ 9105 38 05                                jr c,.Div24by24skip
  21+ 9107 ED 52        .Div24by24setbit:       sbc hl,de
  22+ 9109 99                                   sbc a,c
  23+ 910A DD 23                                inc ix
  24+ 910C E3           .Div24by24skip:         ex (sp),hl
  25+ 910D 2D                                   dec l
  26+ 910E E3                                   ex (sp),hl
  27+ 910F 20 E5                                jr nz,.Div24by24loop
  28+ 9111 D1                                   pop de
  29+ 9112 48                                   ld c,b
  30+ 9113 DD E5                                push ix
  31+ 9115 D1                                   pop de
  32+ 9116 C9                                   ret
  33+ 9117
  34+ 9117 FD 67        Div24by24ASigned:       ld      iyh,a
  35+ 9119 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  36+ 911B CD EC 90                             call    Div24by24
  37+ 911E F5                                   push    af
  38+ 911F FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
  39+ 9121 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  40+ 9123 B1                                   or      c
  41+ 9124 4F                                   ld      c,a
  42+ 9125 F1                                   pop     af
  43+ 9126 C9                                   ret
  44+ 9127
  45+ 9127                                      ; CDE = AHL/CDE, AHL = remainder
  46+ 9127 FD 67        Div24by24LeadSign:      ld      iyh,a           ; Preserve signed in IYL
  47+ 9129 A9                                   xor     c               ; flip sign if negative
  48+ 912A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit    ; .
  49+ 912C FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a           ; .
  50+ 912E 79                                   ld      a,c             ; make both values ABS
  51+ 912F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  52+ 9131 4F                                   ld      c,a             ; .
  53+ 9132 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; .
  54+ 9134 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; .
  55+ 9136 CD EC 90                             call    Div24by24       ; do abs divide
  56+ 9139 FD B5                                or      iyl             ; bring in sign bit
  57+ 913B FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save a
  58+ 913D 79                                   ld      a,c             ; sort sign for c
  59+ 913E FD B5                                or      iyl             ;
  60+ 9140 4F                                   ld      c,a             ;
  61+ 9141 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; sort sign of a
  62+ 9143 C9                                   ret
  63+ 9144
  64+ 9144              ; --------------------------------------------------------------
  65+ 9144              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  66+ 9144              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  67+ 9144              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  68+ 9144 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
  69+ 9145 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 9147 16 00                                ld      d,0
  71+ 9149 3A 7B 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  72+ 914C 5F                                   ld      e,a
  73+ 914D 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
  74+ 9150 78                                   ld      a,b
  75+ 9151 06 10                                ld      b,16
  76+ 9153 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
  77+ 9155 17                                   rla             ; ...
  78+ 9156 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
  79+ 9158 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
  80+ 915A 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
  81+ 915C 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
  82+ 915D 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
  83+ 915E 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
  84+ 9160 79                                   ld      a,c
  85+ 9161 32 7C 7E                             ld      (varR),a
  86+ 9164 C9                                   ret
  87+ 9165
  88+ 9165
  89+ 9165
  90+ 9165
# file closed: ./Maths/DIVD3B2.asm
1004  9165                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ 9165              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 9165 2A 7C 7E                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 9168 3A 7B 7E                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 916B C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 916D 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 9170 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 9171                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 9171 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 9173 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 9175 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 9177 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 9179 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 917A 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 917B EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 917C              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 917C CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 917E CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 9180 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 9182 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 9184 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 9186 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 9187 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 9189 C9                                   ret
  20+ 918A
  21+ 918A
  22+ 918A              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ 918A ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ 918A ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ 918A ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ 918A ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ 918A ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ 918A ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ 918A ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ 918A ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ 918A ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ 918A ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ 918A ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ 918A ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ 918A ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ 918A ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ 918A ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ 918A ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ 918A                                      ENDM
  40+ 918A
  41+ 918A
  42+ 918A
  43+ 918A                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ 918A              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ 918A 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ 918B 3A 7B 7E    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ 918E 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ 918F AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ 9190 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ 9192 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ 9193 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ 9194 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 9196 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ 9197 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ 9198 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ 919A 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ 919B ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ 919D 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ 919E B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ 919F 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ 91A0 2A 7C 7E                             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ 91A3 CD CB 91                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ 91A6 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ 91A7                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ 91A7 B7          >                        or a
  49+ 91A8 DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ 91AA 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ 91AB C9                                   ret
  52+ 91AC
  53+ 91AC              madDEequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  53+ 91AC 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  53+ 91AD 3A 7B 7E    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  53+ 91B0 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  53+ 91B1 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  53+ 91B2 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  53+ 91B4 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  53+ 91B5 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  53+ 91B6 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  53+ 91B8 57          >                        ld      d,a
  53+ 91B9 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  53+ 91BA E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  53+ 91BC 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  53+ 91BD ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  53+ 91BF 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  53+ 91C0 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  53+ 91C1 57          >                        ld      d,a
  54+ 91C2 2A 7C 7E                             ld		hl,(varR)
  55+ 91C5 CD CB 91                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  56+ 91C8 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  57+ 91C9                                      ClearCarryFlag
  57+ 91C9 B7          >                        or a
  58+ 91CA C9                                   ret
  59+ 91CB
  60+ 91CB 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  61+ 91CC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  62+ 91CE 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  63+ 91CF AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  64+ 91D0                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  64+ 91D0 FA E8 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  65+ 91D3 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  66+ 91D4 B2                                   or      d
  67+ 91D5                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  67+ 91D5 FA DA 91    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  68+ 91D8 19                                   add     hl,de
  69+ 91D9 C9                                   ret
  70+ 91DA 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  71+ 91DB E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  72+ 91DD 67                                   ld      h,a
  73+ 91DE 7A                                   ld      a,d
  74+ 91DF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  75+ 91E1 57                                   ld      d,a
  76+ 91E2 19                                   add     hl,de
  77+ 91E3 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  78+ 91E5 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  79+ 91E6 67                                   ld      h,a
  80+ 91E7 C9                                   ret
  81+ 91E8 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  82+ 91E9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  83+ 91EB 67                                   ld      h,a
  84+ 91EC 7A                                   ld      a,d
  85+ 91ED E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  86+ 91EF 57                                   ld      d,a
  87+ 91F0 B7                                   or      a
  88+ 91F1 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  89+ 91F3 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  90+ 91F5 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  91+ 91F6 B4                                   or      h
  92+ 91F7 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  93+ 91F8 C9                                   ret
  94+ 91F9              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  94+ 91F9 AF          >                    xor a
  94+ 91FA 95          >                    sub l
  94+ 91FB 6F          >                    ld l,a
  94+ 91FC 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  94+ 91FD 94          >                    sub h
  94+ 91FE 67          >                    ld h,a
  95+ 91FF 78                                   ld      a,b
  96+ 9200 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  97+ 9202 B4                                   or      h
  98+ 9203 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  99+ 9204 C9                                   ret
 100+ 9205
 101+ 9205
 102+ 9205                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
 103+ 9205                  ;
 104+ 9205                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
 105+ 9205                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 106+ 9205                  ;
 107+ 9205                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 108+ 9205                  ;         carry reset
 109+ 9205                  ;
 110+ 9205                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 111+ 9205 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 112+ 9206 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 113+ 9207 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 114+ 9209 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ 920A ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 116+ 920C
 117+ 920C 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 118+ 920D 85                                   add a,l
 119+ 920E 57                                   ld  d,a
 120+ 920F EB                                   ex de,hl
 121+ 9210
 122+ 9210 7A                                   ld  a,d
 123+ 9211 CE 00                                adc a,0
 124+ 9213 C9                                   ret
 125+ 9214
 126+ 9214 54           HLE0quH0mulE:           ld      d,h                 ; .
 127+ 9215 63                                   ld      h,e                 ; .
 128+ 9216 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; de = xh * yl
 129+ 9218 EB                                   ex      de,hl
 130+ 9219 C9                                   ret
 131+ 921A
 132+ 921A                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 133+ 921A                 ;
 134+ 921A                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 135+ 921A                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 136+ 921A                 ;
 137+ 921A                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 138+ 921A                 ;         carry reset
 139+ 921A                 ;
 140+ 921A                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 141+ 921A
 142+ 921A
 143+ 921A
 144+ 921A 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 145+ 921B 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 146+ 921C 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 147+ 921D 6A                                   ld l,d
 148+ 921E E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 149+ 921F 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 150+ 9220              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 151+ 9220 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 152+ 9222 EB                                   ex de,hl
 153+ 9223 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 154+ 9225
 155+ 9225 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 156+ 9226 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 157+ 9227 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 158+ 9228
 159+ 9228 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 160+ 9229 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 161+ 922A ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 162+ 922C
 163+ 922C 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 164+ 922D 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 165+ 922E
 166+ 922E 7A                                   ld a,d
 167+ 922F 85                                   add a,l
 168+ 9230 67                                   ld h,a
 169+ 9231 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 170+ 9232
 171+ 9232 D1                                   pop de
 172+ 9233 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 173+ 9235
 174+ 9235 EB                                   ex de,hl
 175+ 9236 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 176+ 9238 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 177+ 9239
 178+ 9239 C9                                   ret
 179+ 923A
 180+ 923A              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 181+ 923A              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 182+ 923A              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 183+ 923A              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 184+ 923A              ;         carry reset
 185+ 923A              ; maths is
 186+ 923A              ;        hl = y , de= x
 187+ 923A              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 188+ 923A              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 189+ 923A              ;
 190+ 923A              ;
 191+ 923A              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 192+ 923A C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 193+ 923B 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 194+ 923C 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 195+ 923D 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 196+ 923E 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 197+ 923F 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 198+ 9240 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 199+ 9242 EB                                   ex de,hl
 200+ 9243 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 201+ 9245 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 202+ 9246 59                                   ld e,c
 203+ 9247 50                                   ld d,b
 204+ 9248 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 205+ 924A 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 206+ 924B 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 207+ 924C 67                                   ld h,a
 208+ 924D 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 209+ 924E                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 210+ 924E AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 211+ 924F C1                                   pop     bc
 212+ 9250 C9                                   ret
 213+ 9251
 214+ 9251
 215+ 9251              ; CHL = multiplicand D = multiplier
 216+ 9251              ; DCHL = CHL * D
 217+ 9251 7A           mulCHLbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 218+ 9252 AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 219+ 9253 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 220+ 9255 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 221+ 9257 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; now CHL = ABS (CHL)
 222+ 9258 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 223+ 925A 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; .
 224+ 925B 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 225+ 925C E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 226+ 925E              ; At this point CHL = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 227+ 925E 57           .mul1:                  ld      d,a                 ; first do D * L
 228+ 925F 5D                                   ld      e,l                 ; .
 229+ 9260 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; DE = L * D
 230+ 9262 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save multiplier
 231+ 9263 6B                                   ld      l,e                 ; L = p0
 232+ 9264 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; carry byte
 233+ 9265 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; retrieve muliplier and save carry byte along with flags
 234+ 9266 5C           .mul2:                  ld      e,h                 ; byte 2 of multiplicand
 235+ 9267 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; and multiplier
 236+ 9268 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; now its D & L
 237+ 926A 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte with flags
 238+ 926B 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; add low byte carry to result and retain carry too through next instructions
 239+ 926C 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; h = P1
 240+ 926D 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; a = carry byte
 241+ 926E 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; save carry byte and get back multiplier with flags
 242+ 926F 59           .mul3:                  ld      e,c                 ; byte 3 of multiplicand
 243+ 9270 57                                   ld      d,a                 ;
 244+ 9271 ED 30                                mul     de                  ;
 245+ 9273 08                                   ex      af,af'              ; get back carry byte and carry prior to first add
 246+ 9274 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ;
 247+ 9275 FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; recover saved resultant sign
 248+ 9277 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; c byte 3. Note the value range allowed can never cause a byte 3 carry
 249+ 9278 C9                                   ret
 250+ 9279
 251+ 9279              ;  CHL = 53456 D = 1E
 252+ 9279              ;  56 * 1E = A14 L = 14 carry = 0A
 253+ 9279              ;  34 * 1E = 618 H = 18 +A = 22 carry = 6
 254+ 9279              ;  5  * 1E = 096 C = 96 + 6 = 9C
 255+ 9279              ;  CHL = 9C2214
 256+ 9279              ;mult3
 257+ 9279              ; DELC = HLE * D, uses HL, DE, C , A , IYH
 258+ 9279              ; HLE = multiplicand D = multiplier
 259+ 9279              ; tested by mathstestsun.asm all passed
 260+ 9279              ; Algorithm
 261+ 9279              ; AC =  E * D   (save carry)         H    L    E
 262+ 9279              ; DE =  L * D                                  D
 263+ 9279              ;  L =  A + E + carry                         E*D (lo)
 264+ 9279              ; DE =  H * D                             L*D+ ^ (hi)
 265+ 9279              ;  E =  A + E + carry                H*D (lo) + carry
 266+ 9279              ;
 267+ 9279              ;
 268+ 9279 7A           mulHLbyDE2sc:           ld      a,d
 269+ 927A AC                                   xor     h
 270+ 927B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 271+ 927D FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; save sign bit for result
 272+ 927F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 273+ 9280 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 274+ 9282 28 06                                jr      z,.HLPositive
 275+ 9284              .HLNegative:            NegHL
 275+ 9284 AF          >                    xor a
 275+ 9285 95          >                    sub l
 275+ 9286 6F          >                    ld l,a
 275+ 9287 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 275+ 9288 94          >                    sub h
 275+ 9289 67          >                    ld h,a
 276+ 928A 7A           .HLPositive:            ld      a,d
 277+ 928B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 278+ 928D 28 06                                jr      z,.DEPositive
 279+ 928F              .DENegative:            NegDE
 279+ 928F AF          >                    xor a
 279+ 9290 93          >                    sub e
 279+ 9291 5F          >                    ld e,a
 279+ 9292 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 279+ 9293 92          >                    sub d
 279+ 9294 57          >                    ld d,a
 280+ 9295 CD 3A 92     .DEPositive:            call    mulDEbyHL           ; now do calc
 281+ 9298 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh
 282+ 929A A7                                   and     a                   ; if its 0 then we are good
 283+ 929B C8                                   ret     z
 284+ 929C
 285+ 929C
 286+ 929C
 287+ 929C 7A           mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 288+ 929D AC                                   xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 289+ 929E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 290+ 92A0 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 291+ 92A2 7C                                   ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 292+ 92A3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 293+ 92A5 67                                   ld      h,a                 ; .
 294+ 92A6 7A                                   ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 295+ 92A7 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 296+ 92A9 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .
 297+ 92AA B7           .testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 298+ 92AB 28 24                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 299+ 92AD 7C                                   ld      a,h
 300+ 92AE B5                                   or      l
 301+ 92AF B3                                   or      e
 302+ 92B0 28 1F                                jr      z,.ResultZero
 303+ 92B2              ; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 304+ 92B2 42                                   ld      b,d                 ; save Quotient
 305+ 92B3 ED 30        .mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 306+ 92B5 4B                                   ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 307+ 92B6 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save carry (p1)
 308+ 92B8 5D           .mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 309+ 92B9 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 310+ 92BA ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 311+ 92BC FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl               ; get back p1
 312+ 92BE 83           .carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 313+ 92BF 6F                                   ld      l,a                 ; .
 314+ 92C0 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d               ; save new carry byte
 315+ 92C2 5C           .mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 316+ 92C3 50                                   ld      d,b                 ; .
 317+ 92C4 ED 30                                mul     de                  ; .
 318+ 92C6 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl
 319+ 92C8 8B                                   adc     a,e                 ; .
 320+ 92C9 5F                                   ld      e,a                 ; .
 321+ 92CA 7A           .ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 322+ 92CB CE 00                                adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 323+ 92CD FD B4                                or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 324+ 92CF 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 325+ 92D0 C9                                   ret
 326+ 92D1 11 00 00     .ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 327+ 92D4                                      ZeroA
 327+ 92D4 AF          >                        xor a
 328+ 92D5 4F                                   ld      c,a
 329+ 92D6 6F                                   ld      l,a
 330+ 92D7 C9                                   ret
 331+ 92D8
 332+ 92D8              ;;;
 333+ 92D8              ;;;
 334+ 92D8              ;;;mulHLEbyDSigned:        ld      a,d                 ; get sign from d
 335+ 92D8              ;;;                        xor     h                   ; xor with h to get resultant sign
 336+ 92D8              ;;;                        and     SignOnly8Bit        ; .
 337+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      iyh,a               ; iyh = copy of sign
 338+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      a,h                 ; now HLE = ABS (HLE)
 339+ 92D8              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 340+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      h,a                 ; .
 341+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; d = ABS D
 342+ 92D8              ;;;                        and     SignMask8Bit        ; .
 343+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 344+ 92D8              ;;;.testEitherSideZero:    or      a
 345+ 92D8              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 346+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      a,h
 347+ 92D8              ;;;                        or      l
 348+ 92D8              ;;;                        or      e
 349+ 92D8              ;;;                        jr      z,.ResultZero
 350+ 92D8              ;;;; At this point HLE = ABS (HLE), A = ABS(D)
 351+ 92D8              ;;;.mul1:                  mul     de                  ; C = E * D
 352+ 92D8              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save mulitplier
 353+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      c,e                 ; C = p0
 354+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      a,d                 ; save carry (p1)
 355+ 92D8              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 356+ 92D8              ;;;.mul2:                  ld      e,l                 ; L = L * D
 357+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 358+ 92D8              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 359+ 92D8              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 360+ 92D8              ;;;.carrybyte1:            add     a,e                 ; L = L + E
 361+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      l,a                 ; .
 362+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      a,d
 363+ 92D8              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; save new carry byte
 364+ 92D8              ;;;.mul3:                  ld      e,h                 ; E = H * D
 365+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; .
 366+ 92D8              ;;;                        mul     de                  ; .
 367+ 92D8              ;;;                        ex      af,af'              ; .
 368+ 92D8              ;;;                        adc     a,e                 ; .
 369+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      e,a                 ; .
 370+ 92D8              ;;;.ItsNotZero:            ld      a,d                 ;
 371+ 92D8              ;;;                        adc     a,0                 ; final carry bit
 372+ 92D8              ;;;                        or      iyh                 ; bring back sign
 373+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      d,a                 ; s = sign
 374+ 92D8              ;;;                        ret
 375+ 92D8              ;;;.ResultZero:            ld      de,0
 376+ 92D8              ;;;                        ZeroA
 377+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      c,a
 378+ 92D8              ;;;                        ld      l,a
 379+ 92D8              ;;;                        ret
 380+ 92D8
 381+ 92D8              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 382+ 92D8              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 383+ 92D8              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 384+ 92D8              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 385+ 92D8              ;         carry reset
 386+ 92D8              ;
 387+ 92D8              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 388+ 92D8 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 389+ 92D9 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 390+ 92DA 32 D8 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 391+ 92DD 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 392+ 92DE ED 27 80                             test    $80
 393+ 92E1 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 394+ 92E3 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 395+ 92E5 57                                   ld      d,a
 396+ 92E6 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 397+ 92E8 32 D8 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 398+ 92EB 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 399+ 92EC ED 27 80                             test    $80
 400+ 92EF 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 401+ 92F1 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 402+ 92F3 67                                   ld      h,a
 403+ 92F4 3A D8 92                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 404+ 92F7 EE 80                                xor     $80
 405+ 92F9 32 D8 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 406+ 92FC CD 3A 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 407+ 92FF 3A D8 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 408+ 9302 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 409+ 9305 C8                                   ret     z
 410+ 9306 AF           .Negateghl: 			xor 	a
 411+ 9307 95                                   sub 	l
 412+ 9308 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 413+ 9309 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 414+ 930A 94                                   sub 	h
 415+ 930B 67                                   ld 		h,a
 416+ 930C C9                                   ret
 417+ 930D
 418+ 930D AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 419+ 930E 32 D8 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 420+ 9311 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 421+ 9312 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 422+ 9315 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 423+ 9317 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 424+ 9319 57                                   ld      d,a
 425+ 931A 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 426+ 931C 32 D8 92                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 427+ 931F CD 3A 92     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 428+ 9322 3A D8 92     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 429+ 9325 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 430+ 9328 C8                                   ret     z

1005  9330                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ 9330              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 9330              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ 9330
   4+ 9330              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ 9330 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ 9330 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ 9330 ~            			mul
   8+ 9330              			ENDM
   9+ 9330
  10+ 9330              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ 9330 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ 9330 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ 9330 ~            			mul
  14+ 9330 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ 9330              			ENDM
  16+ 9330

1006  9330                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ 9330              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ 9330              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ 9330              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ 9330              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ 9330              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ 9330              asm_sqrt:
   7+ 9330 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ 9333 61           	ld h,c
   9+ 9334 69           	ld l,c
  10+ 9335              .sqrloop:
  11+ 9335 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ 9337 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ 9339 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ 933A EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 933B ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ 933D 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ 933F EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ 9340 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ 9341 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ 9343              .sqrbit:
  21+ 9343 19           	add hl,de
  22+ 9344 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ 9345 B7           	or a
  24+ 9346 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ 9348              .sqrfi:
  26+ 9348 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ 934A CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ 934C CB 38        	srl b
  29+ 934E CB 19        	rr c
  30+ 9350 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ 9352 C9           	ret
  32+ 9353
  33+ 9353
  34+ 9353              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ 9353 3A 7B 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ 9356 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ 9357 3A 7C 7E     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ 935A 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ 935B CD 30 93     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ 935E 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ 935F 32 7B 7E     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ 9362 C9           	ret
  43+ 9363
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
1007  9363                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ 9363              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ 9363              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ 9363                      ; Input:
   4+ 9363                      ;       HL = value
   5+ 9363                      ; Output:
   6+ 9363                      ;       HL = -value
   7+ 9363                      ; Destroys:
   8+ 9363                      ;       AF
   9+ 9363                      ;
  10+ 9363              negate16:
  11+ 9363 AF           negate16hl:         xor 	a
  12+ 9364 95                               sub 	l
  13+ 9365 6F                               ld 		l,a
  14+ 9366 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  15+ 9367 94                               sub 	h
  16+ 9368 67                               ld 		h,a
  17+ 9369 C9                               ret
  18+ 936A
  19+ 936A AF           negate16de:         xor 	a
  20+ 936B 93                               sub 	e
  21+ 936C 5F                               ld 		e,a
  22+ 936D 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  23+ 936E 92                               sub 	d
  24+ 936F 57                               ld 		d,a
  25+ 9370 C9                               ret
  26+ 9371
  27+ 9371 AF           negate16bc:         xor 	a
  28+ 9372 91                               sub 	c
  29+ 9373 4F                               ld 		c,a
  30+ 9374 9F                               sbc 	a,a
  31+ 9375 90                               sub 	b
  32+ 9376 47                               ld 		b,a
  33+ 9377 C9                               ret
  34+ 9378
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
1008  9378                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ 9378
   2+ 9378
   3+ 9378
   4+ 9378              ;
   5+ 9378              ;   Set flags E to 11111110
   6+ 9378              ;   Loop:   A << 2
   7+ 9378              ;           if carry was 0
   8+ 9378              ;               if a >= D
   9+ 9378              ;                   A = A - D
  10+ 9378              ;                   clear carry (probably irrelevant really)
  11+ 9378              ;           else
  12+ 9378
  13+ 9378              ;               sla flags << bringing in carry of 1
  14+ 9378              ;               if bit 7 of flag was set then loop
  15+ 9378              ;                                        elase a = e and exit
  16+ 9378              ;
  17+ 9378              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
  18+ 9378              ;
  19+ 9378              ;INPUTS: hl = dividend dbc = divisor
  20+ 9378              ;OUTPUTS: hl/de -> AHL = quotient CDE = remainder, Carryflag set if divide by 0
  21+ 9378
  22+ 9378 57           DVIDT:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
  23+ 9379 3A 7B 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  24+ 937C 4F                                   ld      c,a                     ; C = var Q
  25+ 937D 3A 7C 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
  26+ 9380 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
  27+ 9381                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
  28+ 9381 7A           BAequDEdivC:            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
  29+ 9382 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
  30+ 9383 28 2A                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
  31+ 9385 79                                   ld      a,c                     ; Fast exit is divide by 0
  32+ 9386 A7                                   and     a                       ;
  33+ 9387 28 29                                jr      z,.ResultIsFFFF         ;
  34+ 9389 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
  35+ 938A A9                                   xor     c                       ;
  36+ 938B E6 80                                and     $80
  37+ 938D 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
  38+ 938E 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  39+ 9390 06 10                                ld      b,16
  40+ 9392                                      ShiftDELeft1
  40+ 9392 CB 23       >			   sla e
  40+ 9394 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  41+ 9396 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
  42+ 9398 CB 39                                srl     c
  43+ 939A CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
  44+ 939C                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
  44+ 939C B9          >                        cp      c
  44+ 939D DA A3 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
  45+ 93A0                                      ClearCarryFlag
  45+ 93A0 B7          >                        or a
  46+ 93A1 99                                   sbc     c
  47+ 93A2                                      ClearCarryFlag
  47+ 93A2 B7          >                        or a
  48+ 93A3 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
  49+ 93A4 CB 13                                rl      e
  50+ 93A6 CB 12                                rl      d
  51+ 93A8 05                                   dec     b
  52+ 93A9 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
  53+ 93AB 7B                                   ld      a,e
  54+ 93AC B5                                   or      l
  55+ 93AD 42                                   ld      b,d
  56+ 93AE C9                                   ret
  57+ 93AF              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
  57+ 93AF AF          >                        xor a
  58+ 93B0 47                                   ld      b,a
  59+ 93B1 C9                                   ret
  60+ 93B2 3E FF        .ResultIsFFFF:          ld      a,$FF
  61+ 93B4 47                                   ld      b,a
  62+ 93B5 C9                                   ret
  63+ 93B6
  64+ 93B6 57           DIV96:                  ld      d,a                     ; D = var P+1
  65+ 93B7 3A 7B 7E                             ld      a,(varQ)
  66+ 93BA 0E 60                                ld      c,96                    ; C = var Q
  67+ 93BC 3A 7C 7D                             ld      a,(varP)
  68+ 93BF 5F                                   ld      e,a                     ; E = var P
  69+ 93C0                                      ; Need fast exists on ABS values
  70+ 93C0 7A           BAequDEdiv96            ld      a,d                     ; Fast exit is value is 0
  71+ 93C1 B3                                   or      e                       ; .
  72+ 93C2 28 26                                jr      z,.ResultIsZero         ; .
  73+ 93C4 7A           .SavSign:               ld      a,d                     ; preserve sign of result in var T
  74+ 93C5 A9                                   xor     c                       ;
  75+ 93C6 E6 80                                and     $80
  76+ 93C8 6F                                   ld      l,a                     ; l = var T
  77+ 93C9 3E 00                                ld      a,0
  78+ 93CB 06 10                                ld      b,16
  79+ 93CD                                      ShiftDELeft1
  79+ 93CD CB 23       >			   sla e
  79+ 93CF CB 12       >			   rl  d
  80+ 93D1 CB 21                                sla     c                       ; c = abs c
  81+ 93D3 CB 39                                srl     c
  82+ 93D5 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl      a
  83+ 93D7                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .SkipSubtract
  83+ 93D7 B9          >                        cp      c
  83+ 93D8 DA DE 93    >                        jp		c, .SkipSubtract
  84+ 93DB                                      ClearCarryFlag
  84+ 93DB B7          >                        or a
  85+ 93DC 99                                   sbc     c
  86+ 93DD                                      ClearCarryFlag
  86+ 93DD B7          >                        or a
  87+ 93DE 3F           .SkipSubtract:          ccf
  88+ 93DF CB 13                                rl      e
  89+ 93E1 CB 12                                rl      d
  90+ 93E3 05                                   dec     b
  91+ 93E4 20 EF                                jr      nz,.DivideLoop
  92+ 93E6 7B                                   ld      a,e
  93+ 93E7 B5                                   or      l
  94+ 93E8 42                                   ld      b,d
  95+ 93E9 C9                                   ret
  96+ 93EA              .ResultIsZero:          ZeroA
  96+ 93EA AF          >                        xor a
  97+ 93EB 47                                   ld      b,a
  98+ 93EC C9                                   ret
  99+ 93ED
 100+ 93ED 14           Div16by24usgn:          inc     d                           ; can we fast retu
 101+ 93EE 15                                   dec     d
 102+ 93EF 20 13                                jr      nz,.ResultZero
 103+ 93F1 50 59                                ld      de,bc                       ; so prep for bc/de
 104+ 93F3 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl
 105+ 93F5 7A           .div16by16usng:         ld      a,d
 106+ 93F6 B3                                   or      e
 107+ 93F7 28 10                                jr      z,.DivideByZero
 108+ 93F9 14                                   inc     d
 109+ 93FA 15                                   dec     d
 110+ 93FB CD 80 95                             call    BC_Div_DE
 111+ 93FE                                      ZeroA
 111+ 93FE AF          >                        xor a
 112+ 93FF EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = remainder (need to fix c after hl = nothing of worth)
 113+ 9400 60 69                                ld      hl,bc                       ; hl = result (a is zero from above)
 114+ 9402 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; now fix c
 115+ 9403 C9                                   ret
 116+ 9404 AF           .ResultZero:            xor     a                           ; set AHL to 0 as d was 0 so h is zero
 117+ 9405 4F                                   ld      c,a                         ; c = 0
 118+ 9406 67                                   ld      h,a
 119+ 9407 6F                                   ld      l,a
 120+ 9408 C9                                   ret
 121+ 9409 3E FF        .DivideByZero:          ld      a,$FF
 122+ 940B 67                                   ld      h,a
 123+ 940C 6F                                   ld      l,a
 124+ 940D                                      SetCarryFlag
 124+ 940D 37          >                        scf
 125+ 940E C9                                   ret
 126+ 940F
 127+ 940F              ;DIVD4 P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
 128+ 940F 06 08        HLEquAmul256DivD:       ld		b,8							; counter
 129+ 9411 CB 27                                sla		a							;
 130+ 9413 67                                   ld		h,a							; r a * 2 we will build result in hl
 131+ 9414 CB 17        .DivideLoop:            rl		a							; a = a * 2
 132+ 9416 38 03                                jr      c,.StraightToSubtraction    ; jump on carry to subtraction
 133+ 9418 BA                                   cp      d                           ; what was var Q
 134+ 9419 38 03                                jr		c,.SkipSubtraction	        ; if a < d skip subtraction, note this will come to skip subtraction with carry the wrong way round
 135+ 941B              .StraightToSubtraction: ClearCarryFlag                      ; in 6502 the borrow flag is inverted carry, z80 just uses carry so we need to clear it
 135+ 941B B7          >                        or a
 136+ 941C 9A                                   sbc     a,d                         ; a = a - q
 137+ 941D                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; set carry so it gets shifted into bit 0 of b. we do this as we have to flip carry due to jr c from earlier cp d
 137+ 941D B7          >                        or a
 138+ 941E 3F           .SkipSubtraction:       ccf                                 ; we need to do this as 6502 does opposite on carry, i.e. if we jumped direct here then carry would be set in z80
 139+ 941F CB 14                                rl      h                           ; roll d left bringing in carry if there was an sbc performed
 140+ 9421 10 F1                                djnz    .DivideLoop                 ; 8 cycles
 141+ 9423 BA           .CalculateRemainder:    cp      d                           ; calulate 256 * a / d if q >= q then answer will not fit in one byte d is still set, a holds remainder to be subtracted
 142+ 9424 30 19                                jr      nc, .RemainderTooBig
 143+ 9426                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; remove carry as the previous cp will have set it and mess up the sla in the remainder loop
 143+ 9426 B7          >                        or a
 144+ 9427 06 FE        .InitRemainderLoop:     ld      b,%11111110                 ; loop for bits 1 to 7
 145+ 9429 68                                   ld      l,b                         ; and set l to capture result bits (R)
 146+ 942A CB 27        .RemainderLoop:         sla     a                           ; shift a left
 147+ 942C 38 0A                                jr      c, .RemainderSubtraction    ; if there was a carry go to subtraction
 148+ 942E BA                                   cp      d                           ; if a < d then skip subtraction
 149+ 942F 38 01                                jr      c,.RemainderSkipSubtract    ; .
 150+ 9431 9A                                   sbc     d                           ; a > q so a = a - q, carry will be clear here
 151+ 9432 3F           .RemainderSkipSubtract: ccf                                 ; as the jr used z80 we need to flip the carry to behave like 6502
 152+ 9433 CB 15                                rl      l                           ; rotate counter to the left
 153+ 9435 38 F3                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; if there was a bit pushed to carry then loop
 154+ 9437 C9                                   ret
 155+ 9438 9A           .RemainderSubtraction:  sbc     d                           ; as the carry came from an sla we want to retain it
 156+ 9439                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; roll in a carry bit to result
 156+ 9439 37          >                        scf
 157+ 943A CB 15                                rl      l                           ;
 158+ 943C 38 EC                                jr      c, .RemainderLoop           ; and loop if there was a carry bit that came out
 159+ 943E C9                                   ret
 160+ 943F 2E FF        .RemainderTooBig:       ld      l,$FF                       ; now hl = result
 161+ 9441 C9                                   ret
 162+ 9442
 163+ 9442 BA           AEquAmul256DivD:        cp      d
 164+ 9443 28 1D                                jr      z,.BothSame
 165+ 9445 30 1E                                jr      nc,.DgtA
 166+ 9447 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
 167+ 9449 CB 27        .DivideLoop:            sla     a
 168+ 944B 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
 169+ 944D                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
 169+ 944D BA          >                        cp      d
 169+ 944E DA 53 94    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
 170+ 9451 92                                   sub     d
 171+ 9452                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
 171+ 9452 B7          >                        or a
 172+ 9453              .SkipSub:               FlipCarryFlag                       ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
 172+ 9453 3F          >                        ccf
 173+ 9454 CB 13                                rl      e
 174+ 9456 38 F1                                jr      c,.DivideLoop
 175+ 9458 7B                                   ld      a,e
 176+ 9459 C9                                   ret
 177+ 945A 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
 178+ 945B                                      SetCarryFlag                        ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
 178+ 945B 37          >                        scf
 179+ 945C CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
 180+ 945E 38 E9                                jr      c,.DivideLoop               ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
 181+ 9460 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
 182+ 9461 C9                                   ret
 183+ 9462 3E 01        .BothSame:              ld  a,1
 184+ 9464 C9                                   ret
 185+ 9465 3E FF        .DgtA:                  ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
 186+ 9467 C9                                   ret
 187+ 9468
 188+ 9468
 189+ 9468              ; Divide 8-bit values
 190+ 9468              ; In: Divide E by divider C
 191+ 9468              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
 192+ 9468              ;
 193+ 9468              ;;;Div8:
 194+ 9468              ;;;    xor a
 195+ 9468              ;;;    ld b,8
 196+ 9468              ;;;Div8_Loop:
 197+ 9468              ;;;    rl e
 198+ 9468              ;;;    rla
 199+ 9468              ;;;    sub c
 200+ 9468              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
 201+ 9468              ;;;    add a,c
 202+ 9468              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
 203+ 9468              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
 204+ 9468              ;;;    ld b,a0
 205+ 9468              ;;;    ld a,e
 206+ 9468              ;;;    rla
 207+ 9468              ;;;    cpl
 208+ 9468              ;;;    ret
 209+ 9468
 210+ 9468              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
 211+ 9468              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
 212+ 9468              ;;         A is a copy of E
 213+ 9468              ;;         HL is the remainder
 214+ 9468              ;;         BC is not changed
 215+ 9468              ;; so DE = DE /BC
 216+ 9468              ;140 bytes
 217+ 9468              ;145cc
 218+ 9468
 219+ 9468              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
 220+ 9468 ~                                rla
 221+ 9468 ~                                adc     hl,hl
 222+ 9468 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
 223+ 9468 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
 224+ 9468 ~                                add     hl,bc
 225+ 9468                                  ENDM
 226+ 9468
 227+ 9468 AF           DEequDEDivBC:       xor a
 228+ 9469 ED 62                            sbc hl,hl
 229+ 946B 7A                               ld a,d
 230+ 946C                                  MacroDEDivBC
 230+ 946C 17          >                    rla
 230+ 946D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 230+ 946F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 230+ 9471 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 230+ 9473 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 231+ 9474                                  MacroDEDivBC
 231+ 9474 17          >                    rla
 231+ 9475 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 231+ 9477 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 231+ 9479 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 231+ 947B 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 232+ 947C                                  MacroDEDivBC
 232+ 947C 17          >                    rla
 232+ 947D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 232+ 947F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 232+ 9481 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 232+ 9483 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 233+ 9484                                  MacroDEDivBC
 233+ 9484 17          >                    rla
 233+ 9485 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 233+ 9487 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 233+ 9489 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 233+ 948B 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 234+ 9493 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 235+ 9499 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 235+ 949B 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 236+ 949C 17          >                    rla
 236+ 949D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl

 236+ 94A1 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 236+ 94A3 09          >                    add     hl,bc

 237+ 94A5 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
 237+ 94A7 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
 237+ 94A9 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
 237+ 94AB 09          >                    add     hl,bc
 238+ 94AC 17                               rla
 239+ 94AD 2F                               cpl
 240+ 94AE 57                               ld d,a

 242+ 94AF 7B                               ld a,e
 243+ 94B0                                  MacroDEDivBC
 243+ 94B0 17          >                    rla
 243+ 94B1 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl

 255+ 94F4              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 256+ 94F4              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 257+ 94F4              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 258+ 94F4              ; Our use
 259+ 94F4              ; BC = A0
 260+ 94F4              ; DE = 0C
 261+ 94F4              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
 262+ 94F4              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
 262+ 94F4 B9          >                        cp     c
 262+ 94F5 D2 20 95    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
 263+ 94F8 47                                   ld      b,a
 264+ 94F9 59                                   ld      e,c
 265+ 94FA 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 266+ 94FC 16 00                                ld      d,0
 267+ 94FE C3 0B 95                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
 268+ 9501 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
 269+ 9502 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 270+ 9504 21 7B 7E                             ld      hl,varQ
 271+ 9507 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 272+ 9508 16 00                                ld      d,0
 273+ 950A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 274+ 950B              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
 275+ 950B 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
 276+ 950E 78                                   ld      a,b
 277+ 950F 06 10                                ld      b,16
 278+ 9511 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
 279+ 9513 17                                   rla			; ...
 280+ 9514 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
 281+ 9516 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
 282+ 9518 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
 283+ 951A 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 284+ 951B 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 285+ 951C 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 286+ 951E 47                                   ld   b,a
 287+ 951F C9                                   ret
 288+ 9520 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 289+ 9523 C9                                   ret
 290+ 9524              ; switch to logarithm version
 291+ 9524              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 292+ 9524 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 293+ 9526 AF                                   xor a
 294+ 9527 CB 21        .div8_loop:	            sla c
 295+ 9529 17                                   rla
 296+ 952A BA                                   cp d
 297+ 952B 38 02                                jr c,.div8_skip
 297+ 952D
 298+ 952D 0C                                   inc c
 299+ 952E 92                                   sub d
 300+ 952F 10 F6        .div8_skip:	            djnz .div8_loop
 301+ 9531 C9                                   ret
 302+ 9532              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 303+ 9532 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 304+ 9534 AF                                   xor a
 305+ 9535 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 306+ 9537 CB 14                                rl	h
 307+ 9539              ;    add hl,hl
 308+ 9539 17                                   rla
 309+ 953A B9                                   cp c
 310+ 953B 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 311+ 953D 2C                                   inc l
 312+ 953E 91                                   sub c
 313+ 953F 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 314+ 9541 C9                                   ret
 315+ 9542              ;
 316+ 9542              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 317+ 9542              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 318+ 9542              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 319+ 9542              ;
 320+ 9542              HLDivC_Iteration: 	    MACRO
 321+ 9542 ~                                    add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 322+ 9542 ~                                    rla				; ...
 323+ 9542 ~                                    cp	c			; ...
 324+ 9542 ~                                    jr	1F
 325+ 9542 ~                                    sub	c			; ...
 326+ 9542 ~            1:
 327+ 9542 ~                                    inc	l			; ...
 328+ 9542                                      ENDM
 329+ 9542
 330+ 9542              EDivC_Iteration:        MACRO
 331+ 9542 ~                                    rl  e
 332+ 9542 ~                                    rla
 333+ 9542 ~                                    sub c
 334+ 9542 ~                                    jr  nc,.Div8_NoAdd
 335+ 9542 ~                                    add a,c
 336+ 9542 ~            .Div8_NoAdd:
 337+ 9542                                      ENDM

 357+ 9580              BCDIVDE_Iteration:      MACRO

 366+ 9580
 367+ 9580              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 368+ 9580              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 369+ 9580              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 370+ 9580              ;min: 738cc
 371+ 9580              ;max: 898cc
 372+ 9580              ;avg: 818cc
 373+ 9580              ;144 bytes
 374+ 9580 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 375+ 9581 67                                   ld h,a
 376+ 9582 6F                                   ld l,a
 377+ 9583 93                                   sub e
 378+ 9584 5F                                   ld e,a
 379+ 9585 9F                                   sbc a,a
 380+ 9586 92                                   sub d
 381+ 9587 57                                   ld d,a
 382+ 9588 78                                   ld a,b

 405+ 960F              ; BC = BC / DE
 406+ 960F              ; HL = BC % DE
 407+ 960F              ; if HL > 0 BC -= 1
 408+ 960F 7A           Floor_DivQ:             ld      a,d
 409+ 9610 B3                                   or      e
 410+ 9611 28 22                                jr      z, .divideBy0
 411+ 9613 D5                                   push    de
 412+ 9614 CD 80 95     .DoDivide:              call    BC_Div_DE       ; bc(q0) = bc / de , hl(r0) = bc %de
 413+ 9617 D1                                   pop     de              ; get divisor back to test
 414+ 9618 CB 7A                                bit     7,d             ; if divisor <0 or = 0 goto else branch
 415+ 961A C2 2A 96                             jp      nz,.deLTE0
 416+ 961D 7A                                   ld      a,d
 417+ 961E B3                                   or      e
 418+ 961F CA 2A 96                             jp      z,.deLTE0
 419+ 9622 CB 7C        .deGT0:                 bit     7,h             ; if remainder >=0 return with no adjustment
 420+ 9624 C8                                   ret     z               ; if remainder was not negative then all done
 421+ 9625 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 422+ 9626                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 422+ 9626 B7          >                        or a
 423+ 9627 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 424+ 9629 C9                                   ret
 425+ 962A CB 7C        .deLTE0:                bit     7,h             ; if remainder <= 0 retun with no adjustment
 426+ 962C C8                                   ret     z               ; (return if negative)
 427+ 962D 7C                                   ld      a,h
 428+ 962E B5                                   or      l               ; (return if zero)
 429+ 962F C8                                   ret     z
 430+ 9630 0B                                   dec     bc              ; else q --
 431+ 9631                                      ClearCarryFlag          ;      r += b
 431+ 9631 B7          >                        or a
 432+ 9632 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de           ;      .
 433+ 9634 C9                                   ret
 434+ 9635
 435+ 9635
 436+ 9635 21 00 00     .divideBy0:             ld      hl,0
 437+ 9638 01 01 00                             ld      bc,1
 438+ 963B C9                                   ret
 439+ 963C
 440+ 963C
 441+ 963C              L_DIV_0_ITERATION:      MACRO
 442+ 963C ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 443+ 963C ~                                    ex      de,hl
 444+ 963C ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 445+ 963C ~                                    ex      de,hl
 446+ 963C ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 447+ 963C ~                                    jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 448+ 963C ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 449+ 963C ~            .skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 450+ 963C ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 451+ 963C ~                                    ex      de,hl
 452+ 963C ~                                    rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 453+ 963C ~                                    ex      de,hl
 454+ 963C ~                                    sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 455+ 963C ~                                    jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 456+ 963C ~                                    add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 457+ 963C ~            .skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 458+ 963C                                      ENDM
