 466+ 96E0 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 466+ 96E1 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 466+ 96E5 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 466+ 96E6 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 466+ 96EA EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 466+ 96EB B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 466+ 96EE D2 F2 96    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 466+ 96F1 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 466+ 96F2 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 467+ 96F3                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 467+ 96F3 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 467+ 96F7 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 467+ 96F8 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 467+ 96FC EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 467+ 96FD B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 467+ 9700 D2 04 97    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 467+ 9703 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 467+ 9704 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 467+ 9705 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 467+ 9709 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 467+ 970A CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 467+ 970E EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 467+ 970F B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 467+ 9712 D2 16 97    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 467+ 9715 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 467+ 9716 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 468+ 9717                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 468+ 9717 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 468+ 971B EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 468+ 971C CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 468+ 9720 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 468+ 9721 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 468+ 9724 D2 28 97    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 468+ 9727 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 468+ 9728 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 468+ 9729 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 468+ 972D EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 468+ 972E CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 468+ 9732 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 468+ 9733 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 468+ 9736 D2 3A 97    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 468+ 9739 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 468+ 973A 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 469+ 973B                                      L_DIV_0_ITERATION
 469+ 973B CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 469+ 973F EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 469+ 9740 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 469+ 9744 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 469+ 9745 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 469+ 9748 D2 4C 97    >                        jp      nc,.skip_revert0 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 469+ 974B 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 469+ 974C 3F          >.skip_revert0:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 469+ 974D CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 469+ 9751 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 469+ 9752 CB 13 CB 12 >                        rl      de              ;left shift remainder + dividend carry
 469+ 9756 EB          >                        ex      de,hl
 469+ 9757 B7 ED 42    >                        sub     hl,bc           ;substract divisor from remainder
 469+ 975A D2 5E 97    >                        jp      NC,.skip_revert1 ;if remainder < divisor, add back divisor
 469+ 975D 09          >                        add     hl,bc           ;revert subtraction of divisor
 469+ 975E 3F          >.skip_revert1:          ccf                     ;complement carry
 470+ 975F CB 13 CB 12                          rl      de              ;left shift dividend + quotient carry
 471+ 9763 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ;dividend<>remainder
 472+ 9764 C9                                   ret
 473+ 9765
 474+ 9765
 475+ 9765
 476+ 9765 11 FE FF     LLHLdivC:               ld      de,$FFFE                    ; set XY to &FFFE at start, de holds XY
 477+ 9768              .LL130:                 ShiftHLLeft1                        ; RS *= 2
 477+ 9768 CB 25       >			   sla l
 477+ 976A CB 14       >			   rl  h
 478+ 976C 7C                                   ld      a,h
 479+ 976D 38 04                                jr      c,.LL131                    ; if S overflowed skip Q test and do subtractions
 480+ 976F                                      JumpIfALTNusng c, .LL132            ; if S <  Q = 256/gradient skip subtractions
 480+ 976F B9          >                        cp      c
 480+ 9770 DA 7B 97    >                        jp		c, .LL132
 481+ 9773 3F           .LL131:                 ccf                                 ; compliment carry
 482+ 9774 99                                   sbc     a,c                         ; q
 483+ 9775 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; h (s)
 484+ 9776 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ; r
 485+ 9777 DE 00                                sbc     a,0                         ; 0 - so in effect SR - Q*256
 486+ 9779 37                                   scf                                 ; set carry for next rolls
 487+ 977A 3F                                   ccf
 488+ 977B              .LL132:                 RollDELeft1                         ; Rotate de bits left
 488+ 977B CB 13       >               rl  e
 488+ 977D CB 12       >               rl  d
 489+ 977F 38 E7                                jr      c,.LL130                    ;
 490+ 9781 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = result
 491+ 9782 C9                                   ret
 492+ 9783
 493+ 9783
 494+ 9783 AF           div_hl_c:               xor	a
 495+ 9784 06 10                                ld	b, 16
 496+ 9786 29           .loop:                  add	hl, hl
 497+ 9787 17                                   rla
 498+ 9788 38 03                                jr	c, $+5
 499+ 978A B9                                   cp	c
 500+ 978B 38 02                                jr	c, $+4
 501+ 978D 91                                   sub	c
 502+ 978E 2C                                   inc	l
 503+ 978F 10 F5                                djnz	.loop
 504+ 9791 C9                                   ret
 505+ 9792              ;l_div, signed division
 506+ 9792              ; comes in with DE and HL
 507+ 9792              ; HL = DE / HL, DE = DE % HL
 508+ 9792 4A           l_div:                  ld      c,d             ;sign of dividend
 509+ 9793 44                                   ld      b,h             ;sign of divisor
 510+ 9794 C5                                   push    bc              ;save signs
 511+ 9795 4D                                   ld      c,l             ;divisor to bc
 512+ 9796 7A                                   ld      a,d
 513+ 9797 B7                                   or      a
 514+ 9798 F2 A1 97                             jp      p,.NotDENeg
 515+ 979B              .DeNegate:              macronegate16de
 515+ 979B AF          >					xor 	a
 515+ 979C 93          >                    sub 	e
 515+ 979D 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 515+ 979E 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 515+ 979F 92          >                    sub 	d
 515+ 97A0 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 516+ 97A1 78           .NotDENeg:              ld      a,b
 517+ 97A2 B7                                   or      a
 518+ 97A3 F2 AC 97                             jp      p,.NotBCNeg     ; if signs are opposite them flip
 519+ 97A6                                      macronegate16bc
 519+ 97A6 AF          >					xor 	a
 519+ 97A7 91          >                    sub 	c
 519+ 97A8 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
 519+ 97A9 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 519+ 97AA 90          >                    sub 	b
 519+ 97AB 47          >                    ld 		b,a
 520+ 97AC CD 3C 96     .NotBCNeg:              call    l_div_0         ;unsigned HL = DE / BC, DE = DE % BC
 521+ 97AF                                      ; C standard requires that the result of division satisfy a = (a/b)*b + a%b emainder takes sign of the dividend
 522+ 97AF C1                                   pop     bc              ;restore sign info
 523+ 97B0 78                                   ld      a,b
 524+ 97B1 A9                                   xor     c               ;quotient, sign of dividend^divisor
 525+ 97B2 F2 BB 97                             jp      p,.NotHLNeg
 526+ 97B5                                      macronegate16hl
 526+ 97B5 AF          >					xor 	a
 526+ 97B6 95          >					sub 	l
 526+ 97B7 6F          >					ld 		l,a
 526+ 97B8 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
 526+ 97B9 94          >					sub 	h
 526+ 97BA 67          >					ld 		h,a
 527+ 97BB 79           .NotHLNeg:              ld      a,c
 528+ 97BC B7                                   or      a,a             ;remainder, sign of dividend
 529+ 97BD F0                                   ret     p
 530+ 97BE                                      macronegate16de
 530+ 97BE AF          >					xor 	a
 530+ 97BF 93          >                    sub 	e
 530+ 97C0 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
 530+ 97C1 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
 530+ 97C2 92          >                    sub 	d
 530+ 97C3 57          >                    ld 		d,a
 531+ 97C4 C9                                   ret
 532+ 97C5
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
1009  97C5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ 97C5              asm_tis2:
   2+ 97C5              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ 97C5              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ 97C5 F5           	push af
   5+ 97C6 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ 97C8 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ 97C9 3A 7B 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ 97CC 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ 97CD 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ 97CE BB           	cp e
  11+ 97CF 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ 97D1 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ 97D3 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ 97D5 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ 97D6 3A 7B 7E     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ 97D9 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ 97DA CD 32 95     	call asm_div16
  18+ 97DD F1           	pop af
  19+ 97DE E6 80        	and $80
  20+ 97E0 B5           	or l
  21+ 97E1 C9           	ret
  22+ 97E2              .tis2_set96:
  23+ 97E2 F1           	pop af
  24+ 97E3 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ 97E5 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ 97E7 C9           	ret
  27+ 97E8
  28+ 97E8
  29+ 97E8              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ 97E8              squareregfx:
  31+ 97E8 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ 97EB 57           	ld d,a
  33+ 97EC 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ 97ED ED 30        	mul
  35+ 97EF EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ 97F0              squareregfy:
  37+ 97F0 3A A8 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ 97F3 57           	ld d,a
  39+ 97F4 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ 97F5 ED 30        	mul
  41+ 97F7 19           	add hl,de
  42+ 97F8              squareregfz:
  43+ 97F8 3A AA C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ 97FB 57           	ld d,a
  45+ 97FC 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ 97FD ED 30        	mul
  47+ 97FF 19           	add hl,de
  48+ 9800 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ 9801              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ 9801 CD 30 93     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ 9804 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ 9805 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ 9806 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ 9807              normfx:
  55+ 9807 3A A6 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ 980A E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ 980B 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ 980C 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ 980D CD C5 97     	call asm_tis2
  60+ 9810 32 A6 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ 9813              normfy:
  62+ 9813 3A A8 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ 9816 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ 9817 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ 9818 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ 9819 CD C5 97     	call asm_tis2
  67+ 981C 32 A8 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ 981F              normfz:
  69+ 981F 3A AA C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ 9822 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ 9823 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ 9824 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ 9825 CD C5 97     	call asm_tis2
  74+ 9828 32 AA C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ 982B              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ 982B C9           	ret
  77+ 982C
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
1010  982C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ 982C              ; Input:
   2+ 982C              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ 982C              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ 982C              ; Output:
   5+ 982C              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ 982C              ;
   7+ 982C              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ 982C              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ 982C              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ 982C              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ 982C              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ 982C              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ 982C              ;
  14+ 982C
  15+ 982C
  16+ 982C E5           CompareBCDESigned:  push    hl
  17+ 982D A7                               and     a
  18+ 982E 60 69                            ld      hl,bc
  19+ 9830 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  20+ 9832 E1                               pop     hl
  21+ 9833 C9                               ret
  22+ 9834
  23+ 9834 E5           CompareDEBCSigned:  push    hl
  24+ 9835 A7                               and     a
  25+ 9836 62 6B                            ld      hl,de
  26+ 9838 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  27+ 983A E1                               pop     hl
  28+ 983B C9                               ret
  29+ 983C
  30+ 983C
  31+ 983C              ;### CMPGTE -> test if A>=B
  32+ 983C              ;### Input      HL=A, DE=B if hl=> de no carry else de > hl and set carry
  33+ 983C 7C           CompareHLDESgn:     ld a,h
  34+ 983D AA                               xor d
  35+ 983E FA 48 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  36+ 9841 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
  37+ 9843 30 09                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  38+ 9845 19           .cmpgte1            add hl,de
  39+ 9846                                  SetCarryFlag
  39+ 9846 37          >                        scf
  40+ 9847 C9                               ret
  41+ 9848 CB 7A        .cmpgte2            bit 7,d
  42+ 984A 28 05                            jr z,.cmpgte4
  43+ 984C              .cmpgte5:           ClearCarryFlag
  43+ 984C B7          >                        or a
  44+ 984D C9                               ret
  45+ 984E 19           .cmpgte3            add hl,de
  46+ 984F                                  ClearCarryFlag
  46+ 984F B7          >                        or a
  47+ 9850 C9                               ret
  48+ 9851              .cmpgte4:           SetCarryFlag
  48+ 9851 37          >                        scf
  49+ 9852 C9                               ret
  50+ 9853
  51+ 9853              ; Compares HL and DE sets z flag if same, else nz
  52+ 9853 7C           CompareHLDESame:    ld  a,h
  53+ 9854 BA                               cp  d
  54+ 9855 C0                               ret nz
  55+ 9856 7D                               ld  a,l
  56+ 9857 BB                               cp  e
  57+ 9858 C9                               ret
  58+ 9859
  59+ 9859
  60+ 9859
  61+ 9859 7C           CompareHLBCSgn:     ld a,h
  62+ 985A A8                               xor b
  63+ 985B FA 64 98                         jp m, .cmpgte2
  64+ 985E ED 42                            sbc hl,bc
  65+ 9860 30 06                            jr nc, .cmpgte3
  66+ 9862              .cmpgte1            SetCarryFlag
  66+ 9862 37          >                        scf
  67+ 9863 C9                               ret
  68+ 9864 CB 78        .cmpgte2            bit 7,b
  69+ 9866 28 FA                            jr z,.cmpgte1
  70+ 9868              .cmpgte3            ClearCarryFlag
  70+ 9868 B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9869 C9                               ret
  72+ 986A
  73+ 986A              CompareHLDESigned:
  74+ 986A E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  75+ 986B A7                               and     a
  76+ 986C ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  77+ 986E E1                               pop     hl
  78+ 986F C9                               ret
  79+ 9870              CompareHLBCSigned:
  80+ 9870 E5           CompareHLBC:        push    hl
  81+ 9871 A7                               and     a
  82+ 9872 ED 42                            sbc     hl,bc
  83+ 9874 E1                               pop     hl
  84+ 9875 C9                               ret
  85+ 9876
  86+ 9876              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  87+ 9876              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  88+ 9876
  89+ 9876 E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  90+ 9878 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  91+ 9879 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  92+ 987B 67                               ld      h,a
  93+ 987C 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  94+ 987D E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  95+ 987F 57                               ld      d,a
  96+ 9880 A7                               and     a
  97+ 9881 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  98+ 9883 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  99+ 9885 C9                               ret

# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
1011  9886                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ 9886              ; a equal a / d * 96
   2+ 9886
   3+ 9886
   4+ 9886
   5+ 9886              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
   6+ 9886 3A A6 C0     normaliseXX1596S7:      ld		a,(XX15VecX)	    ; XX15+0
   7+ 9889 DD 67                                ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
   8+ 988B E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit        ; a = unsigned version
   9+ 988D              .n96SQX:	            inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
   9+ 988D 5F          >			ld	e,a
   9+ 988E 57          >			ld  d,a
   9+ 988F ED 30       >			mul
  10+ 9891 62                                   ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  11+ 9892 6B                                   ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  12+ 9893 3A A7 C0     .n96SQY:                ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  13+ 9896 DD 6F                                ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  14+ 9898 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  15+ 989A                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  15+ 989A 5F          >			ld	e,a
  15+ 989B 57          >			ld  d,a
  15+ 989C ED 30       >			mul
  16+ 989E 19                                   add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  17+ 989F 3A A8 C0     .n96SQZ:                ld		a,(XX15VecZ)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  18+ 98A2 FD 67                                ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  19+ 98A4 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  20+ 98A6                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  20+ 98A6 5F          >			ld	e,a
  20+ 98A7 57          >			ld  d,a
  20+ 98A8 ED 30       >			mul
  21+ 98AA 19           .n96SQADD:              add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  22+ 98AB EB                                   ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  23+ 98AC CD 30 93     .n96SQRT:               call	asm_sqrt			; hl = de = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  24+ 98AF 3A A6 C0     .n96NORMX:              ld		a,(XX15VecX)
  25+ 98B2 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  26+ 98B4 4F                                   ld		c,a
  27+ 98B5 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  28+ 98B6 CD 49 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  29+ 98B9 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  30+ 98BA DD 7C                                ld		a,ixh			    ;++SGN
  31+ 98BC E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  32+ 98BE B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  33+ 98BF 32 A6 C0                             ld		(XX15VecX),a
  34+ 98C2 3A A7 C0     .n96NORMY:              ld		a,(XX15VecY)
  35+ 98C5 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  36+ 98C7 4F                                   ld		c,a
  37+ 98C8 55                                   ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  38+ 98C9 CD 49 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  39+ 98CC 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  40+ 98CD DD 7D                                ld		a,ixl			    ;++SGN
  41+ 98CF E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  42+ 98D1 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  43+ 98D2 32 A7 C0                             ld		(XX15VecY),a
  44+ 98D5 3A A8 C0     .n96NORMZ:              ld		a,(XX15VecZ)
  45+ 98D8 E6 7F                                and		SignMask8Bit
  46+ 98DA 4F                                   ld		c,a
  47+ 98DB 55                                   ld		d,l				; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  48+ 98DC CD 49 9A                             call	AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  49+ 98DF 47                                   ld		b,a				    ;++SGN
  50+ 98E0 FD 7C                                ld		a,iyh			    ;++SGN
  51+ 98E2 E6 80                                and		$80				    ;++SGN
  52+ 98E4 B0                                   or		b				    ;++SGN
  53+ 98E5 32 A8 C0                             ld		(XX15VecZ),a
  54+ 98E8 C9                                   ret
  55+ 98E9
  56+ 98E9              ; Normalise vector
  57+ 98E9              ; scale Q = Sqrt (X^2 + Y^2 + Z^2)
  58+ 98E9              ; X = X / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e X = X / Q * 3/8
  59+ 98E9              ; Y = Y / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Y = Y / Q * 3/8
  60+ 98E9              ; Z = Z / Q with 96 = 1 , i.e Z = Z / Q * 3/8
  61+ 98E9
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
1012  98E9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ 98E9              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ 98E9              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ 98E9              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ 98E9              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ 98E9              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ 98E9              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ 98E9              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ 98E9 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ 98EC CD 02 99     	call	Num1
  10+ 98EF 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ 98F2 CD 02 99     	call	Num1
  12+ 98F5 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ 98F8 CD 02 99     	call	Num1
  14+ 98FB 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ 98FD CD 02 99     	call	Num1
  16+ 9900 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ 9902              Num1:
  18+ 9902 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ 9904              .Num2:
  20+ 9904 3C           	inc	a
  21+ 9905 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ 9906 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ 9908 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ 990A 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ 990B 13           	inc	de
  26+ 990C C9           	ret
  27+ 990D
  28+ 990D              DispAtoDE:
  29+ 990D 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ 990F 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ 9910 C3 E9 98     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ 9913
  33+ 9913              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ 9913 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ 9915 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ 9916 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ 9919 CD 29 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ 991C 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ 991E CD 02 99     	call	Num1
  40+ 9921 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ 9923 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ 9924 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ 9925 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ 9927 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ 9929              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ 9929 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ 992B              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ 992B 3C           	inc	a
  49+ 992C 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ 992D 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ 992F FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ 9931 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ 9933              .Blank:
  54+ 9933 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ 9935              .DontBlank:
  56+ 9935 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ 9937 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ 9938 13           	inc	de
  59+ 9939 C9           	ret
  60+ 993A
  61+ 993A              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ 993A FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ 993C 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ 993E 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ 9940 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ 9941 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ 9944 CD 50 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ 9947 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ 9949 CD 50 99     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ 994C 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ 994E 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ 9950              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ 9950 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ 9952              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ 9952 3C           	inc	a
  76+ 9953 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ 9954 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ 9956 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ 9958 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ 995A              .Blank:
  81+ 995A 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ 995C              .DontBlank:
  83+ 995C ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ 995E 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ 995F 13           	inc	de
  86+ 9960 C9           	ret
  87+ 9961              .NoStock:
  88+ 9961 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ 9963 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ 9964 13           	inc	de
  91+ 9965 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ 9966 13           	inc	de
  93+ 9967 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ 9969 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ 996A 13           	inc de
  96+ 996B C9           	ret
  97+ 996C
  98+ 996C
  99+ 996C              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ 996C              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ 996C              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ 996C              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ 996C 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ 9970 0A 00 00 00
 103+ 9974 64 00 00 00
 103+ 9978 E8 03 00 00
 103+ 997C 10 27 00 00
 104+ 9980 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ 9984 40 42 0F 00
 104+ 9988 80 96 98 00
 104+ 998C 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ 9990 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ 9994 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ 9998
 107+ 9998              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ 9998 CD A7 99     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ 999B FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ 999E FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ 99A1 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ 99A3 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ 99A6 C9                                   ret
 114+ 99A7
 115+ 99A7 DD 22 94 99  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ 99AB ED 53 96 99                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ 99AF DD 21 90 99                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ 99B3 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ 99B5 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ 99B7 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ 99B9 B7                                   or a
 122+ 99BA DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ 99BD DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ 99C0 2A 94 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ 99C3 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ 99C5 22 94 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ 99C8 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ 99CB DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ 99CE 2A 96 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ 99D1 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ 99D3 22 96 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ 99D6 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ 99D8 0C                                   inc c
 134+ 99D9 3C                                   inc a
 135+ 99DA 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ 99DC DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ 99DF DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ 99E2 2A 94 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ 99E5 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ 99E6 22 94 99                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ 99E9 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ 99EC DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ 99EF 2A 96 99                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ 99F2 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ 99F4 22 96 99                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ 99F7 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ 99FA DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ 99FC 0C                                   inc c
 149+ 99FD 0D                                   dec c
 150+ 99FE 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ 9A00 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ 9A03 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ 9A05 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ 9A07 3A 94 99                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ 9A0A C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ 9A0C FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ 9A0F FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ 9A13 C9                                   ret

1013  9A14                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ 9A14              AequAdivQmul96ABS:      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   1+ 9A14 BA          >                        cp     d
   1+ 9A15 D2 30 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
   2+ 9A18 06 FE                                ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
   3+ 9A1A CB 27        .TIS2RollTLoop:			sla			a
   4+ 9A1C                                      JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
   4+ 9A1C BA          >                        cp      d
   4+ 9A1D DA 33 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
   5+ 9A20 9A                                   sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
   6+ 9A21 37                                   scf
   7+ 9A22 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
   8+ 9A24 38 F4                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
   9+ 9A26 78           .TIS2SKIPCont:	        ld			a,b							; T
  10+ 9A27 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 2
  11+ 9A29 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
  12+ 9A2B 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  13+ 9A2C CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
  14+ 9A2E 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  15+ 9A2F C9                                   ret
  16+ 9A30 3E 60        .TIS2AccGTEQ:           ld			a,$60							; unity
  17+ 9A32 C9                                   ret
  18+ 9A33 B7           .TIS2SkipSub:           or			a
  19+ 9A34 CB 10                                rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  20+ 9A36 38 E2                                jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  21+ 9A38 C3 26 9A                             jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  22+ 9A3B
  23+ 9A3B
  24+ 9A3B              ; USES 			A DE BC
  25+ 9A3B              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
  26+ 9A3B              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
  27+ 9A3B CB 7F        	bit			7,a
  28+ 9A3D 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
  29+ 9A3F ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
  30+ 9A41 CB FF        	set			7,a
  31+ 9A43              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  32+ 9A43              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  33+ 9A43              TIS2:
  34+ 9A43 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  35+ 9A44 3A 7B 7E     	ld			a,(varQ)
  36+ 9A47 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  37+ 9A48 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  38+ 9A49              AequAdivDmul967Bit:
  39+ 9A49 4F               ld          c,a
  40+ 9A4A 7A               ld          a,d
  41+ 9A4B CB 27            sla         a
  42+ 9A4D 30 10            jr          nc, .OKToDivide
  43+ 9A4F              .ScaleDown:
  44+ 9A4F B7               or          a
  45+ 9A50 CB 3A            srl         d
  46+ 9A52
  47+ 9A52 79               ld          a,c
  48+ 9A53 E6 7F            and         SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9A55 CB 3F            srl         a
  50+ 9A57 47               ld          b,a
  51+ 9A58 79               ld          a,c
  52+ 9A59 E6 80            and         $80
  53+ 9A5B B0               or          b
  54+ 9A5C C3 60 9A         jp          AequAdivDmul96
  55+ 9A5F              .OKToDivide:
  56+ 9A5F 79               ld          a,c
  57+ 9A60              AequAdivDmul96:
  58+ 9A60 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  59+ 9A61 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  60+ 9A63              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, .TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  60+ 9A63 BA          >                        cp     d
  60+ 9A64 D2 84 9A    >                        jp		nc,.TIS2AccGTEQ
  61+ 9A67 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  62+ 9A69              .TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  63+ 9A69 CB 27        	sla			a
  64+ 9A6B              	JumpIfALTNusng d,.TIS2SkipSub           ; a < d so don;t subtract
  64+ 9A6B BA          >                        cp      d
  64+ 9A6C DA 8A 9A    >                        jp		c, .TIS2SkipSub
  65+ 9A6F 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  66+ 9A70 37           	scf                                     ; set carrry to roll into b
  67+ 9A71 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  68+ 9A73 38 F4        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  69+ 9A75              .TIS2SKIPCont:
  70+ 9A75 78           	ld			a,b							; A = T = 4 / 4
  71+ 9A76 CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  72+ 9A78 CB 3F        	srl			a							; .
  73+ 9A7A 47           	ld			b,a							; .
  74+ 9A7B CB 3F        	srl			a							; A = A / 2 (i.e. T /8)
  75+ 9A7D 80           	add			a,b							; A = T/8 + T/4 (3T/8)
  76+ 9A7E 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  77+ 9A7F 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  78+ 9A80 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  79+ 9A82 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  80+ 9A83 C9           	ret
  81+ 9A84              .TIS2AccGTEQ:
  82+ 9A84              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  83+ 9A84 79           	ld			a,c
  84+ 9A85 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  85+ 9A87 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  86+ 9A89 C9           	ret
  87+ 9A8A              .TIS2SkipSub:
  88+ 9A8A              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; Clear carry as it needs to be empty to roll in 0
  88+ 9A8A B7          >                        or a
  89+ 9A8B CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  90+ 9A8D 38 DA        	jr			c,.TIS2RollTLoop			; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  91+ 9A8F C3 75 9A     	jp			.TIS2SKIPCont
  92+ 9A92
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
1014  9A92                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ 9A92              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   2+ 9A92              fmltu:
   3+ 9A92 57           AequAmulQdiv256:        ld	d,a
   4+ 9A93 3A 7B 7E                             ld	a,(varQ)
   5+ 9A96 5F                                   ld	e,a
   6+ 9A97 ED 30                                mul
   7+ 9A99 7A                                   ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   8+ 9A9A C9                                   ret
   9+ 9A9B
  10+ 9A9B 5F           AequAmulDdiv256:        ld  e,a
  11+ 9A9C ED 30                                mul
  12+ 9A9E 7A                                   ld  a,d
  13+ 9A9F C9                                   ret
  14+ 9AA0

1015  9AA0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ 9AA0              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ 9AA0              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ 9AA0 21 12 80     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ 9AA3 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ 9AA5 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ 9AA7 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ 9AA8 C3 B4 9A     		jp		DV41
   8+ 9AAB              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ 9AAB 21 12 80     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ 9AAE 3A 66 7D     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ 9AB1 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ 9AB3 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ 9AB4              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ 9AB4 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ 9AB5 3A 75 7E     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ 9AB8              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ 9AB8 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ 9ABA CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ 9ABC 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ 9ABD AF           		xor		a
  21+ 9ABE              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ 9ABE CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ 9AC0 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ 9AC2 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ 9AC3 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ 9AC5              DV8:
  27+ 9AC5 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ 9AC6 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ 9AC7              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ 9AC7 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ 9AC9 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ 9ACB              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ 9ACB              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ 9ACB 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ 9ACD 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ 9ACE              .RollRemainder:
  37+ 9ACE CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ 9AD0 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ 9AD2 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ 9AD3 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ 9AD5              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ 9AD5 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ 9AD6              .DontSBC:
  44+ 9AD6 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ 9AD8 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ 9ADA 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ 9ADB 32 7C 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ 9ADE 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ 9ADF 32 7C 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ 9AE2 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ 9AE3              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ 9AE3 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ 9AE4 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ 9AE5 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ 9AE7 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ 9AE9 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ 9AEA 32 7C 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ 9AED 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ 9AEE 32 7C 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ 9AF1 C9           		ret
  61+ 9AF2              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ 9AF2 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ 9AF4 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ 9AF5 32 7C 7E     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ 9AF8 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ 9AF9 32 7C 7D     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ 9AFC C9           		ret
  68+ 9AFD
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
1016  9AFD                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ 9AFD
   2+ 9AFD              asm_defmutl:
   3+ 9AFD              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ 9AFD              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ 9AFD ED 30        	mul
   6+ 9AFF 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ 9B00 C9           	ret

1017  9B01
1018  9B01                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ 9B01              APequQmulA:
   2+ 9B01              asm_mult1:
   3+ 9B01              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ 9B01 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ 9B03 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ 9B05 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ 9B06 3A 7B 7E     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ 9B09 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ 9B0A FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ 9B0C 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ 9B0E AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ 9B0F E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ 9B11 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ 9B12 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ 9B13 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ 9B15 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ 9B16 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ 9B17 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ 9B19 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ 9B1A ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ 9B1C 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ 9B1D 32 7C 7D     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ 9B20 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ 9B21 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ 9B22 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ 9B23 C9           	ret
  27+ 9B24              .mul0:
  28+ 9B24 AF           	xor	a
  29+ 9B25 32 7C 7D     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ 9B28 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ 9B29 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ 9B2A C9           	ret
  33+ 9B2B
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
1019  9B2B                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ 9B2B              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ 9B2B              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ 9B2B              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ 9B2B              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ 9B2B              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ 9B2B              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ 9B2B              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ 9B2B              LL38:
   9+ 9B2B              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ 9B2B              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ 9B2B              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ 9B2B              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ 9B2B              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ 9B2B              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ 9B2B              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ 9B2B              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ 9B2B              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ 9B2B              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ 9B2B              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ 9B2B              ;	ret
  21+ 9B2B              ; calculation table
  22+ 9B2B              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ 9B2B              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ 9B2B              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ 9B2B              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ 9B2B              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ 9B2B              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ 9B2B              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ 9B2B              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ 9B2B              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ 9B2B
  32+ 9B2B              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ 9B2B              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ 9B2B              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ 9B2B              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ 9B2B
  37+ 9B2B
  38+ 9B2B              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ 9B2B 21 7D 7E     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ 9B2E AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ 9B2F FA 3A 9B     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ 9B32 3A 7B 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ 9B35 21 7C 7E     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ 9B38 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ 9B39 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ 9B3A              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ 9B3A 3A 7C 7E     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ 9B3D 21 7B 7E     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ 9B40              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ 9B40              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ 9B40 B7          >                        or a
  51+ 9B41 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ 9B42 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ 9B44              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ 9B44              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ 9B44              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ 9B44 C9           	ret
  57+ 9B45              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ 9B45 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ 9B47 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ 9B49 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ 9B4B 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ 9B4C 3A 7D 7E     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ 9B4F EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ 9B51 32 7D 7E     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ 9B54 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ 9B55                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ 9B55 B7          >                        or a
  67+ 9B56 C9           	ret
  68+ 9B57              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ 9B57 32 7D 7E         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ 9B5A                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ 9B5A B7          >                        or a
  71+ 9B5B C9               ret
  72+ 9B5C              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ 9B5C              ;--	push	bc
  74+ 9B5C              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ 9B5C              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ 9B5C              ;--	sub		b
  77+ 9B5C              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ 9B5C              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ 9B5C              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ 9B5C              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ 9B5C              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ 9B5C              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ 9B5C              ;--	ret
  84+ 9B5C
  85+ 9B5C              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ 9B5C              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ 9B5C              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ 9B5C              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ 9B5C              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ 9B5C              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ 9B5C              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ 9B5C              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ 9B5C              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ 9B5C              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ 9B5C              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ 9B5C              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ 9B5C              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ 9B5C              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ 9B5C              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ret
 109+ 9B5C              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ 9B5C              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ 9B5C              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ret
 117+ 9B5C              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ 9B5C              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ 9B5C              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ 9B5C              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ 9B5C              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ 9B5C              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ 9B5C              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ 9B5C              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ 9B5C              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ret
 134+ 9B5C              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ 9B5C              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ 9B5C              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ 9B5C              ;;;;	ret
 141+ 9B5C
 142+ 9B5C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm

1022  9B5C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ 9B5C              ;;;LL28:
   2+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ 9B5C              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ 9B5C              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ 9B5C              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ 9B5C              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ 9B5C              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ 9B5C              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ 9B5C              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ 9B5C              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ 9B5C              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ 9B5C              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ 9B5C              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ 9B5C              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ 9B5C              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ 9B5C              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ 9B5C              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ 9B5C              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ 9B5C              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ 9B5C              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ 9B5C              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ 9B5C              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ 9B5C              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ 9B5C              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ 9B5C              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ 9B5C              ;;;	ret
  34+ 9B5C              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ 9B5C              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ 9B5C              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ 9B5C              ;;;	ret
  39+ 9B5C
  40+ 9B5C              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ 9B5C 59             ld    e,c
  42+ 9B5D 67             ld    h,a
  43+ 9B5E 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ 9B60              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ 9B60 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ 9B61 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ 9B62 C8             ret z
  48+ 9B63 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ 9B66 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ 9B68              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ 9B68 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ 9B6A 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ 9B6B 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ 9B6D C9             ret
  55+ 9B6E
  56+ 9B6E              HL_Div_C:
  57+ 9B6E              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ 9B6E              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ 9B6E              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ 9B6E 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ 9B70 AF                   xor a
  62+ 9B71              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ 9B71 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ 9B72 17                   rla
  65+ 9B73 B9                   cp c
  66+ 9B74 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ 9B76 91                   sub c
  68+ 9B77 2C                   inc l
  69+ 9B78              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ 9B78 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ 9B7A 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ 9B7B 32 7C 7E             ld  (varR),a
  73+ 9B7E C9                   ret
  74+ 9B7F
  75+ 9B7F
  76+ 9B7F
  77+ 9B7F              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ 9B7F              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ 9B7F              BFRDIV:
  80+ 9B7F F5           		push	af
  81+ 9B80 3A 7B 7E     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ 9B83 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ 9B84 F1           		pop		af
  84+ 9B85 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ 9B87 CA 9E 9B     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ 9B8A              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ 9B8A 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ 9B8C 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ 9B8D              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ 9B8D 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ 9B8F AF           		xor a
  92+ 9B90              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ 9B90 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ 9B91 17           		rla
  95+ 9B92 B9           		cp c
  96+ 9B93 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ 9B95 2C           		inc l
  98+ 9B96 91           		sub c
  99+ 9B97              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ 9B97 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ 9B99 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ 9B9A 32 7C 7E     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ 9B9D C9           		ret
 104+ 9B9E              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ 9B9E 32 7C 7E     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ 9BA1 C9           		ret
 107+ 9BA2              ;	push	af
 108+ 9BA2              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ 9BA2              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ 9BA2              ;	pop		af
 111+ 9BA2              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ 9BA2              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ 9BA2              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ 9BA2              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ 9BA2              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ 9BA2              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ 9BA2              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ 9BA2              ;	sla		a
 119+ 9BA2              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ 9BA2              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ 9BA2              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ 9BA2              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ 9BA2              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ 9BA2              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ 9BA2              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ 9BA2              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ 9BA2              ;	scf
 128+ 9BA2              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ 9BA2              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ 9BA2              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ 9BA2              ;LL2:
 132+ 9BA2              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ 9BA2              ;LL2Good:
 134+ 9BA2              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ 9BA2              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ 9BA2              ;	ret
 137+ 9BA2
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
1023  9BA2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ 9BA2              RequAdivQ:
   2+ 9BA2              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ 9BA2              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ 9BA2 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ 9BA3 3A 7B 7E     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ 9BA6 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ 9BA8 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ 9BAA 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ 9BAB 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ 9BAD AF               xor a
  11+ 9BAE              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ 9BAE CB 21            sla c
  13+ 9BB0 17               rla
  14+ 9BB1 BA               cp d
  15+ 9BB2 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ 9BB4 0C               inc c
  17+ 9BB5 92               sub d
  18+ 9BB6              LL64:
  19+ 9BB6 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ 9BB8 32 7A 7E     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ 9BBB 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ 9BBC 32 7C 7E     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ 9BBF C9               ret
  24+ 9BC0              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ 9BC0 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ 9BC2 32 7C 7E     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ 9BC5 32 7A 7E     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ 9BC8 C9           	ret
  29+ 9BC9
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
1024  9BC9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ 9BC9              asm_mult12:
   2+ 9BC9              RSequQmulA:
   3+ 9BC9              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ 9BC9 CD 01 9B     	call APequQmulA
   5+ 9BCC 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ 9BCD 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ 9BCE 32 7D 7E     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ 9BD1 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ 9BD2 32 7C 7E     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ 9BD5 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ 9BD6 C9           	ret
  12+ 9BD7
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm

   1+ 9C67              ;rotmap0xLo: DB	0				; INWK +9
   2+ 9C67              ;rotmap0xHi: DB	0				; INWK +10

   4+ 9C67              ;rotmat0yHi: DB	0				; INWK +12
   5+ 9C67              ;rotmat0zLo:	DB 	0				; INWK +13
   6+ 9C67              ;rotmat0zHi:	DB 	0				; INWK +14

   8+ 9C67              ;rotmap1xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +16
   9+ 9C67              ;rotmat1yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +17
  10+ 9C67              ;rotmat1yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +18
  11+ 9C67              ;rotmat1zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +19
  12+ 9C67              ;rotmat1zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +20
  13+ 9C67              ;rotmat2xLo: DB	0				; INWK +21
  14+ 9C67              ;rotmat2xHi:	DB	0				; INWK +22
  15+ 9C67              ;rotmat2yLo:	DB	0				; INWK +23
  16+ 9C67              ;rotmat2yHi:	DB	0				; INWK +24
  17+ 9C67              ;rotmat2zLo:	DB	0				; INWK +25
  18+ 9C67              ;rotmat2zHi:	DB	0				; INWK +26

  28+ 9C67
  29+ 9C67
  30+ 9C67
  31+ 9C67
  32+ 9C67              ; Divide that sets value to FFFF if divide by 0 unless main value is 0, then 0
  33+ 9C67
  34+ 9C67              ; (P+1 A) = (A P) / Q
  35+ 9C67              ;  B A    = (A P) / Q
  36+ 9C67              ; TESTED OK
  37+ 9C67
  38+ 9C67
  39+ 9C67 2A A6 C0     NormalizeXX15:          ld      hl, (XX15VecX)              ; h= VecX, l = VecY
  40+ 9C6A 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,  (XX15VecZ)              ; a = VecZ, d we don't care
  41+ 9C6D E6 7F        .ABSZ:                  and     SignMask8Bit
  42+ 9C6F FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = abs z
  43+ 9C71 57           .ZSquared:              ld      d,a
  44+ 9C72 5F                                   ld      e,a
  45+ 9C73 ED 30                                mul     de
  46+ 9C75 42 4B                                ld      bc,de                       ; bc = z squared
  47+ 9C77 7D           .ABSX:                  ld      a,l
  48+ 9C78 E6 7F        .XSquared:              and     SignMask8Bit
  49+ 9C7A DD 67                                ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = abs x
  50+ 9C7C 57                                   ld      d,a
  51+ 9C7D 5F                                   ld      e,a
  52+ 9C7E ED 30                                mul     de
  53+ 9C80 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = x squared
  54+ 9C81 7A           .ABSY:                  ld      a,d                         ; as h was swapped into d
  55+ 9C82 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  56+ 9C84 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                       ; ixl = abs y
  57+ 9C86 5F           .YSquared:              ld      e,a
  58+ 9C87 57                                   ld      d,a
  59+ 9C88 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; de = y squared
  60+ 9C8A 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de + bc
  61+ 9C8B 09                                   add     hl,bc                       ;
  62+ 9C8C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  63+ 9C8D CD 30 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; d = iyl =hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
  64+ 9C90 55                                   ld      d,l
  65+ 9C91 FD 6A                                ld      iyl,d
  66+ 9C93 DD 7C        .NormaliseX:            ld      a,ixh                       ; normalise x
  67+ 9C95 CD 49 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  68+ 9C98 57                                   ld      d,a
  69+ 9C99 3A A6 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecX)
  70+ 9C9C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  71+ 9C9E B2                                   or      d
  72+ 9C9F 32 A6 C0                             ld      (XX15VecX),a
  73+ 9CA2 DD 7D        .NormaliseY:            ld      a,ixl                       ; normalise y
  74+ 9CA4 55                                   ld      d,l
  75+ 9CA5 CD 49 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  76+ 9CA8 57                                   ld      d,a
  77+ 9CA9 3A A7 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecY)
  78+ 9CAC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  79+ 9CAE B2                                   or      d
  80+ 9CAF 32 A7 C0                             ld      (XX15VecY),a
  81+ 9CB2 FD 7C        .NormaliseZ:            ld      a,iyh                       ; normalise z
  82+ 9CB4 55                                   ld      d,l
  83+ 9CB5 CD 49 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit
  84+ 9CB8 57                                   ld      d,a
  85+ 9CB9 3A A8 C0                             ld      a,(XX15VecZ)
  86+ 9CBC E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  87+ 9CBE B2                                   or      d
  88+ 9CBF 32 A8 C0                             ld      (XX15VecZ),a
  89+ 9CC2 C9                                   ret
  90+ 9CC3
  91+ 9CC3              TidyNormaliseNoseV:     MACRO
  92+ 9CC3 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15	    ; copy over matrix row 3 (Nosev)
  93+ 9CC3 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			    ; normalise z hi, its really TIS3 and write back to matrix
  94+ 9CC3 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV       ; .
  95+ 9CC3                                      ENDM
  96+ 9CC3              TidyNormaliseRoofV:     MACRO
  97+ 9CC3 ~                                    call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15
  98+ 9CC3 ~                                    call	NormalizeXX15			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  99+ 9CC3 ~                                    call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 100+ 9CC3                                      ENDM

 106+ 9CCF E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if X is not small then we go straigth to roofx
 107+ 9CD1 C2 69 9D                             jp      nz,.ProcessRoofX            ; .
 108+ 9CD4 3A 38 C0     .TidyXIsSmall:          ld      a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; Else we test Y on to using
 109+ 9CD7 E6 60                                and     %01100000                   ; if Y is not small we process roofz
 110+ 9CD9 20 47                                jr      nz,.ProcessRoofZ            ; .
 111+ 9CDB              ;...roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y

 129+ 9D03 20 0E                                jr      nz,.SkipYZeroTest

 176+ 9D66 C3 AD 9D                             jp      .DoneRoof

 178+ 9D69 3A 38 C0     .ProcessRoofX:          ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)      ; so we set Q to Nose Y

 209+ 9DB3 CD 2D 9C    >                        call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV
 210+ 9DB6              ;...sidex = ((nosez * roofy) - nosey * roofz) / 96
 211+ 9DB6 3A 3A C0     .DoSidevX:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)      ;  -(-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96

 223+ 9DD7              ;...sidey = ((nosex * roofz) - nosez * roofx) / 96
 224+ 9DD7 3A 36 C0     .DoSidevY:              ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)      ; -(-nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96

 227+ 9DDF 3A 34 C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	    ; roov z
 228+ 9DE2 CD C9 9B                             call	RSequQmulA                  ; rs = nosex * roofz
 229+ 9DE5 3A 3A C0                             ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 230+ 9DE8 32 7B 7E                             ld		(varQ),a					; b = regX for now

 233+ 9DF1 CD C0 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96
 234+ 9DF4 78                                   ld      a,b

 238+ 9DFB EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit

 246+ 9E12 CD C0 93                             call    BAequDEdiv96

 256+ 9E24              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
 257+ 9E24              		; b = regX on entry
 258+ 9E24              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
 259+ 9E24 08           		ex		af,af'
 260+ 9E25 78           		ld		a,b
 261+ 9E26 32 7B 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 262+ 9E29 08           		ex		af,af'
 263+ 9E2A EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
 264+ 9E2C CD 8A 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
 265+ 9E2F              ; USES 				A BC E
 266+ 9E2F              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
 267+ 9E2F              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
 268+ 9E2F 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
 269+ 9E30 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
 270+ 9E32 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
 271+ 9E33 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
 272+ 9E34 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
 273+ 9E36 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
 274+ 9E38              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
 275+ 9E38 CB 27        		sla		a
 276+ 9E3A              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
 276+ 9E3A FE 60       >                        cp      $60
 276+ 9E3C DA 49 9E    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
 277+ 9E3F DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
 278+ 9E41 37           		scf
 279+ 9E42 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
 280+ 9E44 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
 281+ 9E46              TIS1KIPCont:
 282+ 9E46 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
 283+ 9E47 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
 284+ 9E48 C9           		ret
 285+ 9E49              TIS1SkipSub:
 286+ 9E49 B7           	or			a
 287+ 9E4A CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
 288+ 9E4C 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
 289+ 9E4E C3 46 9E     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
 290+ 9E51
 291+ 9E51              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
 292+ 9E51              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
 293+ 9E51
 294+ 9E51
 295+ 9E51
 296+ 9E51
 297+ 9E51              TidyRotYSmall:
 298+ 9E51 CD 7A 9F     		call	CalcRoofvZ
 299+ 9E54 32 34 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
 300+ 9E57 C3 8B 9E     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
 301+ 9E5A
 302+ 9E5A              TidyRotXSmall:
 303+ 9E5A AF           		xor		a
 304+ 9E5B 47           		ld		b,a
 305+ 9E5C 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
 306+ 9E5F E6 60        		and		%01100000
 307+ 9E61 CA 51 9E     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
 308+ 9E64 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 309+ 9E67 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 310+ 9E68 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 311+ 9E6B CD 40 9F     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
 312+ 9E6E 32 32 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
 313+ 9E71 C3 8B 9E     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
 314+ 9E74              ; TIDY is broken
 315+ 9E74
 316+ 9E74
 317+ 9E74              TIDY:
 318+ 9E74
 319+ 9E74              ORTHOGALISE:
 320+ 9E74              ;-- NormaliseNosev
 321+ 9E74 CD D7 9B     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
 322+ 9E77 CD 86 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
 323+ 9E7A CD 10 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
 324+ 9E7D              .CheckNXSmall:
 325+ 9E7D 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 326+ 9E80 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 327+ 9E82 CA 5A 9E     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 328+ 9E85              .RotXIsBig:
 329+ 9E85 CD 06 9F             call	CalcRoofvX
 330+ 9E88 32 30 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 331+ 9E8B              NormaliseRoofV:
 332+ 9E8B CD EA 9B     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 333+ 9E8E CD 86 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 334+ 9E91              ;calc sidev x
 335+ 9E91 CD 2D 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 336+ 9E94 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 337+ 9E97 32 7B 7E     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 338+ 9E9A 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 339+ 9E9D CD C9 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 340+ 9EA0 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 341+ 9EA3 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 342+ 9EA4 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 343+ 9EA7 CD 24 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 344+ 9EAA                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideXNoNeg
 344+ 9EAA A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 344+ 9EAB CA B0 9E    >                        jp	    z, NormSideXNoNeg
 345+ 9EAE EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 346+ 9EB0              NormSideXNoNeg:
 347+ 9EB0 32 2A C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 348+ 9EB3              ;calc sidev y
 349+ 9EB3 3A 3A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 350+ 9EB6 32 7B 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 351+ 9EB9 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 352+ 9EBC CD C9 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 353+ 9EBF 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 354+ 9EC2 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 355+ 9EC3 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 356+ 9EC6 CD 24 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 357+ 9EC9                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideYNoNeg
 357+ 9EC9 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 357+ 9ECA CA CF 9E    >                        jp	    z, NormSideYNoNeg
 358+ 9ECD EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 359+ 9ECF              NormSideYNoNeg:
 360+ 9ECF 32 38 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 361+ 9ED2              ;calc sidev z
 362+ 9ED2 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 363+ 9ED5 32 7B 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
 364+ 9ED8 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
