 366+ 9EDE 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 367+ 9EE1 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 368+ 9EE2 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 369+ 9EE5 CD 24 9E     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 370+ 9EE8                      JumpIfAIsZero NormSideZNoNeg
 370+ 9EE8 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 370+ 9EE9 CA EE 9E    >                        jp	    z, NormSideZNoNeg
 371+ 9EEC EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 372+ 9EEE              NormSideZNoNeg:
 373+ 9EEE 32 2C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 374+ 9EF1              .ClearLoBytes:
 375+ 9EF1 21 35 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ 9EF4 06 09        		ld		b,9
 377+ 9EF6 AF                   xor     a
 378+ 9EF7              .ClearLoLoop:
 379+ 9EF7 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 380+ 9EF8 23           		inc		hl
 381+ 9EF9 23           		inc		hl
 382+ 9EFA 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 383+ 9EFC CD FD 9B     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 384+ 9EFF CD 86 98     		call	normaliseXX1596S7			; normalise roof
 385+ 9F02              ;calc sidev x
 386+ 9F02 CD 4A 9C     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 387+ 9F05
 388+ 9F05 C9           		ret
 389+ 9F06
 390+ 9F06
 391+ 9F06              CalcRoofvX:
 392+ 9F06              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x = -(nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_x
 393+ 9F06              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 393+ 9F06 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 393+ 9F09 32 7B 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 394+ 9F0C 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 395+ 9F0F CD C9 9B     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 396+ 9F12              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 396+ 9F12 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 396+ 9F15 32 7B 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 397+ 9F18 3A 32 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 398+ 9F1B CD 8A 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 399+ 9F1E 7A           		ld		a,d
 400+ 9F1F E6 80        		and 	$80
 401+ 9F21 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 402+ 9F23              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 403+ 9F23 3A 36 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 404+ 9F26 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 405+ 9F27 E6 80        		and		$80
 406+ 9F29 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 407+ 9F2B FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 408+ 9F2D 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 409+ 9F2E E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 410+ 9F30 42           		ld		b,d
 411+ 9F31 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 412+ 9F32 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 413+ 9F33 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 414+ 9F35 CD 80 95     		call	BC_Div_DE
 415+ 9F38 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 416+ 9F3A EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 417+ 9F3C E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 418+ 9F3E B0           		or		b
 419+ 9F3F C9           		ret
 420+ 9F40
 421+ 9F40
 422+ 9F40              CalcRoofvY:
 423+ 9F40              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y
 424+ 9F40              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 424+ 9F40 3A 3A C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 424+ 9F43 32 7B 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 425+ 9F46 3A 34 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 426+ 9F49 CD C9 9B     		call	RSequQmulA
 427+ 9F4C              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 427+ 9F4C 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 427+ 9F4F 32 7B 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 428+ 9F52 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 429+ 9F55 CD 8A 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 430+ 9F58 7A           		ld		a,d
 431+ 9F59 E6 80        		and 	$80
 432+ 9F5B FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 433+ 9F5D 3A 38 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 434+ 9F60 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 435+ 9F61 E6 80        		and		$80
 436+ 9F63 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 437+ 9F65 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 438+ 9F67 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 439+ 9F68 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 440+ 9F6A 42           		ld		b,d
 441+ 9F6B 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z
 442+ 9F6C 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 443+ 9F6D 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 444+ 9F6F CD 80 95     		call	BC_Div_DE

 446+ 9F74 EE 80        		xor		$80
 447+ 9F76 E6 80        		and		$80
 448+ 9F78 B0           		or		b
 449+ 9F79 C9           		ret
 450+ 9F7A
 451+ 9F7A              CalcRoofvZ:
 452+ 9F7A              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z = -(nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_y * roofv_y) / nosev_z
 453+ 9F7A              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 453+ 9F7A 3A 38 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)

 456+ 9F86              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 456+ 9F86 3A 36 C0    >                        ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 456+ 9F89 32 7B 7E    >                        ld       (varQ),a
 457+ 9F8C 3A 30 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 458+ 9F8F CD 8A 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 459+ 9F92 7A           		ld		a,d

 470+ 9FA5 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y * roofv_y + nosev_z * roofv_z

 475+ 9FAE EE 80        		xor		$80
 476+ 9FB0 E6 80        		and		$80

1029  9FB4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ 9FB4
   2+ 9FB4              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ 9FB4 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ 9FB5 D2 D3 9F    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ 9FB8 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ 9FBA CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ 9FBC 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ 9FBE                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ 9FBE BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ 9FBF DA C4 9F    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ 9FC2 92                                   sub     d
   8+ 9FC3                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ 9FC3 B7          >                        or a
   9+ 9FC4 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ 9FC5 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ 9FC7 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ 9FC9 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ 9FCA C9                                   ret
  14+ 9FCB 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ 9FCC 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ 9FCD CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ 9FCF 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ 9FD1 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ 9FD2 C9                                   ret
  20+ 9FD3 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ 9FD5 C9                                   ret
  22+ 9FD6
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
1030  9FD6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ 9FD6              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ 9FD6              TIS1:
   3+ 9FD6 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ 9FD7 3A 65 7D     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ 9FDA 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ 9FDB 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ 9FDC              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ 9FDC 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ 9FDD 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ 9FDE 32 7B 7E     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ 9FE1 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ 9FE2 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ 9FE4 CD 8A 91     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ 9FE7              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ 9FE7              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ 9FE7              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ 9FE7 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ 9FE8 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ 9FEA 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ 9FEB 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ 9FEC E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ 9FEE 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ 9FF0 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ 9FF1              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ 9FF1 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ 9FF3 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ 9FF5 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ 9FF7 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ 9FF9              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ 9FF9 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ 9FFB 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ 9FFD 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ 9FFE B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ 9FFF C9           		ret
  35+ A000
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm

  30+ A004 30 A0 31 A0
  30+ A008 32 A0
  31+ A00A 33 A0 34 A0                        DW    ThargoidAI, NoAI,       NoAI,       NoAI,       NoAI
  31+ A00E 34 A0 34 A0
  31+ A012 34 A0
  32+ A014              ShipAiJumpTableMax:   EQU ($ - ShipAIJumpTable)/2
  33+ A014
  34+ A014
  35+ A014
  36+ A014              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  37+ A014              ; Main entry point to tactics. Every time it will do a a tidy and the do AI logic
  38+ A014              UpdateShip:             ;  call    DEBUGSETNODES ;       call    DEBUGSETPOS
  39+ A014 21 2D 68                            ld      hl,TidyCounter
  40+ A017 35                                  dec     (hl)
  41+ A018                                     ;call     z,TidyUbnK  ;TODO SEE IF THIS IS AN ISSUE
  42+ A018                                     ; This shoudl be a call nz to tidy *****ret     nz
  43+ A018 3E 10                               ld      a,16
  44+ A01A 32 2D 68                            ld      (TidyCounter),a
  45+ A01D                                     ;call    TidyUbnK
  46+ A01D                                     ; add AI in here too
  47+ A01D 3A 0D C4                            ld       a,(ShipTypeAddr)
  48+ A020                                     ReturnIfAGTEusng ShipAiJumpTableMax              ; TODO capture duff jumps whilst debugging in case a new shjip type code is added
  48+ A020 FE 0A       >                        cp    ShipAiJumpTableMax
  48+ A022 D0          >                        ret	 nc
  49+ A023 21 00 A0                            ld       hl,ShipAIJumpTable
  50+ A026 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  51+ A028 ED 31                               add      hl,a
  52+ A02A 7E                                  ld       a,(hl)                                  ; contrary to the name
  53+ A02B 23                                  inc      hl                                      ; jp (hl) is really
  54+ A02C 66                                  ld       h,(hl)                                  ; jp hl
  55+ A02D 6F                                  ld       l,a                                     ;
  56+ A02E E9                                  jp       hl                                      ; Follow the AI Jump Table
  57+ A02F C9                                  ret                                              ; not needed as jp handles this
  58+ A030
  59+ A030
  60+ A030
  61+ A030              ; used  when no pre-checks are requrired, e.g. if forcing a space station from main loop
  62+ A030
  63+ A030
  64+ A030 C9           StationAI:              ret
  65+ A031 C9           JunkAI:                 ret
  66+ A032 C9           ScoopableAI:            ret
  67+ A033 C9           ThargoidAI:             ret
  68+ A034 C9           NoAI:                   ret
  69+ A035              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  70+ A035              CalculateAgression:     IFDEF   ALWAYSANGRY
  71+ A035 ~                                        jp  UltraHostile
  72+ A035                                      ENDIF
  73+ A035 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
  74+ A038 47                                   ld      b,a
  75+ A039 E6 02                                and     %00000010
  76+ A03B 20 20                                jr      nz,.UltraHostile
  77+ A03D 78                                   ld      a,b
  78+ A03E E6 F0                                and     %11110000                               ; if it can can anger a fighter bay then generally more hostile as implies its a large ship
  79+ A040 21 5C C0                             ld      hl,UBnKMissilesLeft                     ; more missiles more agression
  80+ A043 B6                                   or      (hl)
  81+ A044 47                                   ld      b,a
  82+ A045 3A 0E C4                             ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)
  83+ A048 E6 4E                                and     %01001110                               ; We look at if its a bounty hunter, hostile already, pirate and cop
  84+ A04A B0                                   or      b
  85+ A04B 47                                   ld      b,a
  86+ A04C 3A 53 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKShipAggression)
  87+ A04F                                      JumpIfALTNusng 64,.NotAlreadyAgressive
  87+ A04F FE 40       >                        cp      64
  87+ A051 DA 58 A0    >                        jp		c, .NotAlreadyAgressive
  88+ A054 78                                   ld      a,b
  89+ A055 F6 80                                or      %10000000                               ; if its already at least 64 agressive then likley to stay so
  90+ A057 47                                   ld      b,a
  91+ A058 78           .NotAlreadyAgressive:   ld      a,b
  92+ A059 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  93+ A05C C9                                   ret
  94+ A05D 3E FF        .UltraHostile:          ld      a,$FF
  95+ A05F 32 53 C0                             ld      (UBnKShipAggression),a
  96+ A062 C9                                   ret
  97+ A063              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  98+ A063              ; set angry if possible, if its an innocent then flag the space station to get angry
  99+ A063 3A 0E C4     MakeHostile:            ld      a,(ShipNewBitsAddr)                     ; Check bit 5 of newb flags
 100+ A066                                      ;break
 101+ A066                                      JumpIfMemEqNusng ShipTypeAddr, ShipTypeStation, .SetNewbHostile
 101+ A066 3A 0D C4    >                        ld  a,(ShipTypeAddr)
 101+ A069 FE 02       >                        cp  ShipTypeStation
 101+ A06B CA 8A A0    >                        jp  z,.SetNewbHostile
 102+ A06E E6 20        .ItsNotAStation:        and     ShipIsBystander                         ; check if space station present if its a bystander
 103+ A070 C4 C4 A0                             call    nz, SetStationHostile                   ; Set Space Station if present, Angry
 104+ A073 3A 54 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkaiatkecm)                        ; get AI data
 105+ A076                                      ReturnOnBitClear a, ShipAIEnabledBitNbr         ; if 0 then no AI attached so it can't get angry
 105+ A076 CB 7F       >                        bit 	ShipAIEnabledBitNbr,a
 105+ A078 C8          >                        ret		z
 106+ A079 4F                                   ld      c,a                                     ; Copy to c in case we need it later
 107+ A07A                                      SetMemToN UBnKAccel, 2                          ; set accelleration to 2 to speed up
 107+ A07A 3E 02       >                        ld      a,2
 107+ A07C 32 47 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 108+ A07F CB 27                                sla     a                                       ; set pitch to 4
 109+ A081 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                     ; .
 110+ A084 3A 0F C4                             ld      a,(ShipAIFlagsAddr)
 111+ A087                                      ReturnIfBitMaskClear ShipCanAnger
 111+ A087 E6 80       >                        and     ShipCanAnger
 111+ A089 C8          >                        ret     z
 112+ A08A CD 1A C6     .SetNewbHostile:        call    SetShipHostile
 113+ A08D C9                                   ret
 114+ A08E
 115+ A08E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 116+ A08E C9           MissileDidHitUs:        ret ; TODO
 117+ A08F
 118+ A08F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 119+ A08F              PlayerHitByMissile:     MMUSelectLayer1
 119+ A08F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 120+ A093 3E 05                                ld      a,L1ColourInkCyan
 121+ A095 CD B4 E0                             call    l1_set_border
 122+ A098 3A 3C C0                             ld      a,(UBnKMissileBlastDamage)
 123+ A09B 47                                   ld      b,a                                     ; b = damage
 124+ A09C 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 125+ A09F E6 80                                and     $80
 126+ A0A1 20 0A                                jr      nz,.HitRear
 127+ A0A3 3A A9 81     .HitFront:              ld      a,(ForeShield)
 128+ A0A6 CD E7 63                             call    ApplyDamage
 129+ A0A9 32 A9 81                             ld      (ForeShield),a
 130+ A0AC C9                                   ret
 131+ A0AD 3A AA 81     .HitRear:               ld      a,(AftShield)
 132+ A0B0 CD E7 63                             call    ApplyDamage
 133+ A0B3 32 AA 81                             ld      (AftShield),a
 134+ A0B6 C9                                   ret; TODO , do hit set up blast radius etc
 135+ A0B7              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 136+ A0B7              MissileHitShipA:        MMUSelectLayer1
 136+ A0B7 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 137+ A0BB 3E 02                                ld      a,L1ColourInkRed
 138+ A0BD CD B4 E0                             call    l1_set_border
 139+ A0C0 CD 45 C7                             call    UnivExplodeShip
 140+ A0C3 C9                                   ret; TODO hit ship do explosion, check for near by and if player is near and missile type logic, e.g. AP or HE
 141+ A0C4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 142+ A0C4 CD 54 84     SetStationHostile:      call    IsSpaceStationPresent                   ; only if present
 143+ A0C7 D8                                   ret     c
 144+ A0C8 3A 40 C0                             ld      a,(UbnKShipUnivBankNbr)                     ; save current bank
 145+ A0CB FD 67                                ld      iyh,a
 146+ A0CD                                      MMUSelectUniverseN 0                            ; space station is always 0
 146+ A0CD ED 91 56 46 >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       BankUNIVDATA0+0
 147+ A0D1 CD 1A C6                             call    SetShipHostile
 148+ A0D4 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                                   ; get prev bank back
 149+ A0D6                                      MMUSelectUniverseA                              ;
 149+ A0D6 C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 149+ A0D8 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 150+ A0DB C9                                   ret
 151+ A0DC
 152+ A0DC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 153+ A0DC              CheckMissileBlastInit:  ZeroA
 153+ A0DC AF          >                        xor a
 154+ A0DD 32 38 80                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 155+ A0E0 21 20 C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxlo                      ; Copy Blast Coordinates
 156+ A0E3 01 0C 00                             ld      bc,12                           ; and Damage stats
 157+ A0E6 11 3F 7F                             ld      de,MissileXPos
 158+ A0E9 ED B0                                ldir
 159+ A0EB                                      ZeroA                                   ; we have processd enque request
 159+ A0EB AF          >                        xor a
 160+ A0EC 32 44 C0                             ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a      ;
 161+ A0EF CD AC A1                             call    CheckIfBlastHitUs               ; If we are in Range
 162+ A0F2 DC 8E A0                             call    c, MissileDidHitUs              ; Then we get hit
 163+ A0F5 C9                                   ret
 164+ A0F6
 165+ A0F6              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 166+ A0F6              CheckPointRange:        MACRO   ShipPos, ShipSign, MissilePos, MissileSign
 167+ A0F6 ~                                    ld      a,(MissilePos)                      ; check X Coord
 168+ A0F6 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipSign)
 169+ A0F6 ~                                    xor     (hl)
 170+ A0F6 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
 171+ A0F6 ~                                    ld      hl,(ShipPos)
 172+ A0F6 ~                                    ld      de,(MissilePos)
 173+ A0F6 ~                                    jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 174+ A0F6 ~            .XSame:                 and     a
 175+ A0F6 ~                                    sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 176+ A0F6 ~                                    JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 177+ A0F6 ~                                    NegHL
 178+ A0F6 ~                                    jp      .CheckDiff
 179+ A0F6 ~            .SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 180+ A0F6 ~                                    ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 181+ A0F6 ~            .CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 182+ A0F6 ~                                    ReturnIfANotZero
 183+ A0F6 ~                                    ld      a,l
 184+ A0F6 ~                                    and     a
 185+ A0F6 ~                                    ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 186+ A0F6                                      ENDM
 187+ A0F6              ;...................................................................
 188+ A0F6              ; We only do one test per loop for spreading the load of work
 189+ A0F6 3A 38 80     CheckMissileBlastLoop:  ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 190+ A0F9                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng   UniverseSlotListSize
 190+ A0F9 FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 190+ A0FB D0          >                        ret	 nc
 191+ A0FC FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 192+ A0FE 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; update for next slot so re can fast return on distance checks
 193+ A0FF 32 38 80                             ld      (CurrentMissileCheck),a
 194+ A102                                      ReturnIfSlotAEmpty
 194+ A102 21 3A 80    >                        ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
 194+ A105 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 194+ A107 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 194+ A108 3C          >                        inc     a
 194+ A109 C8          >                        ret     z           ; if slot was ff inc would make it 0
 194+ A10A 3D          >                        dec     a           ; get original value back for later
 195+ A10B CD 54 84                             call    IsSpaceStationPresent               ; If its a station its imune to missiles
 196+ A10E D8                                   ret     c                                   ; if we have a special mission to kill a staion then its type won't be space station for game logic
 197+ A10F 3A 51 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKexplDsp)                     ; Don't explode a ship twice
 198+ A112 E6 20                                and     ShipExploding                       ;
 199+ A114                                      ReturnIfNotZero                             ;
 199+ A114 C0          >                        ret     nz
 200+ A115 3A 60 7F                             ld      a,(CurrentMissileBlastRange)
 201+ A118 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                               ; iyh = missile blast depending on type
 202+ A11A FD 7D        .CheckRange:            ld      a,iyl                               ; now page in universe data
 203+ A11C                                      MMUSelectUniverseA
 203+ A11C C6 46       >                     add    a,BankUNIVDATA0
 203+ A11E ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 204+ A121                                      CheckPointRange UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn, MissileXPos, MissileXSgn  ; its a square but its good enough
 204+ A121 3A 3F 7F    >                        ld      a,(MissileXPos)                      ; check X Coord
 204+ A124 2A 22 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxsgn)
 204+ A127 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 204+ A128 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 204+ A12A 2A 20 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 204+ A12D ED 5B 3F 7F >                        ld      de,(MissileXPos)
 204+ A131 28 0F       >                        jr      z,.SignsDiffernt
 204+ A133 A7          >.XSame:                 and     a
 204+ A134 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de                               ; distance = Ship X - Missile X
 204+ A136             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 204+ A136 F2 44 A1    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
 204+ A139             >                        NegHL
 204+ A139 AF          >                    xor a
 204+ A13A 95          >                    sub l
 204+ A13B 6F          >                    ld l,a
 204+ A13C 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 204+ A13D 94          >                    sub h
 204+ A13E 67          >                    ld h,a
 204+ A13F C3 44 A1    >                        jp      .CheckDiff
 204+ A142 19          >.SignsDiffernt:         add     hl,de
 204+ A143             >                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 204+ A143 F8          >                        ret     m
 204+ A144 7C          >.CheckDiff:             ld      a,h                                 ; if we have an h outside blast raidus
 204+ A145             >                        ReturnIfANotZero
 204+ A145 A7          >                        and     a
 204+ A146 C0          >                        ret     nz
 204+ A147 7D          >                        ld      a,l
 204+ A148 A7          >                        and     a
 204+ A149             >                        ReturnIfAGTEMemusng   CurrentMissileBlastRange
 204+ A149 21 60 7F    >                        ld      hl,CurrentMissileBlastRange
 204+ A14C BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 204+ A14D D0          >                        ret	    nc
 205+ A14E                                      CheckPointRange UBnKylo, UBnKysgn, MissileYPos, MissileYSgn
 205+ A14E 3A 42 7F    >                        ld      a,(MissileYPos)                      ; check X Coord
 205+ A151 2A 25 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKysgn)

 205+ A155 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 205+ A157 2A 23 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)

 205+ A163             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 205+ A163 F2 71 A1    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff
 205+ A166             >                        NegHL

 205+ A170             >                        ReturnIfNegative                            ; if we overflowed then return
 205+ A170 F8          >                        ret     m

 205+ A17A D0          >                        ret	    nc
 206+ A17B                                      CheckPointRange UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn, MissileZPos, MissileZSgn
 206+ A17B 3A 45 7F    >                        ld      a,(MissileZPos)                      ; check X Coord
 206+ A17E 2A 28 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzsgn)
 206+ A181 AE          >                        xor     (hl)
 206+ A182 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 206+ A184 2A 26 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 206+ A187 ED 5B 45 7F >                        ld      de,(MissileZPos)
 206+ A18B 28 0F       >                        jr      z,.SignsDiffernt

 206+ A190             >                        JumpIfPositive      .CheckDiff              ; if result was -ve
 206+ A190 F2 9E A1    >                        jp		p, .CheckDiff

 117++A37C              ; if or ABS all high bytes is <> 0
 118++A37C              .CheckDistance:         IFDEF MISSILEDOHIT
 119++A37C 2A 2C A2                                 ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX+1)              ; test if high bytes are set (value is assumed to be 24 bit, though calcs are only 16 so this is uneeded)
 120++A37F 7C                                       ld      a,h                                ; .
 121++A380 ED 5B 30 A2                              ld      de,(TacticsVectorY+1)              ; .
 122++A384 B2                                       or      d                                  ; .
 123++A385 ED 4B 34 A2                              ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ+1)              ; .
 124++A389 B0                                       or      b                                  ; .
 125++A38A                                          ClearSignBitA                              ; .
 125++A38A E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 126++A38C                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 126++A38C C2 9B A3    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 127++A38F B5                                       or      l                                    ; test for low byte bit 7, i.e high of 16 bit values
 128++A390 B3                                       or      e                                  ; .
 129++A391 B1                                       or      c                                  ; .
 130++A392                                          JumpIfNotZero       .FarAway               ; .
 130++A392 C2 9B A3    >                        jp	nz,.FarAway
 131++A395                                      ELSE
 132++A395 ~                                        jp                  .FarAway
 133++A395                                      ENDIF
 134++A395              ; If we get here its close enough to detonate
 135++A395 3A 45 C0     .CloseMissileExplode:   ld      a,(UBnKMissileTarget)
 136++A398 C3 B7 A0                             jp      MissileHitShipA
 137++A39B              ;   *far away ** TODO need to set memory read write on page 0
 138++A39B              .FarAway:               SelectTargetBank
 138++A39B FD 7D       >                        ld      a,iyl
 138++A39D             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 138++A39D ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 139++A3A0                                      JumpIfMemFalse      UBnKECMFitted, .NoECM                   ; if target has ECM and enough energy to use it
 139++A3A0 3A 5A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKECMFitted)

 139++A3A4 C2 C1 A3    >                        jp      nz, .NoECM

 140++A3A7 3A 58 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKEnergy)
 140++A3AA FE 80       >                        cp      ECMCounterMax
 140++A3AC DA C1 A3    >                        jp	  c,.NoECM

 142++A3B6 3A 73 7D     .TestIfUsingECM:        ld      a,(RandomSeed2)                                             ; if random < 16
 143++A3B9                                      JumpIfAGTENusng     16, .UpdateMissilePos                           ;   then fire ECM destroying missile
 143++A3B9 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 143++A3BB D2 C1 A3    >                        jp		nc,.UpdateMissilePos
 144++A3BE              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in to fire ECM
 145++A3BE C3 42 C6     .ZeroPageFireECM:       jp      FireECM                                             ; with an implicit return
 146++A3C1              ;                       implicit ret
 147++A3C1              ;. If we get here then target is still paged in with no ECM
 148++A3C1              .NoECM:
 149++A3C1                                    ;;;         ** can do 16 bit maths as we can take teh view that once a object/space station is 24 bit value away then
 150++A3C1                                    ;;;         ** targeting computer looses track and destructs missiles
 151++A3C1              ;--- Now we can actually update the missile AI
 152++A3C1              .UpdateMissilePos:      ;break
 153++A3C1                                      SelectMissileBank
 153++A3C1 FD 7C       >                        ld      a,iyh
 153++A3C3             >                        MMUSelectUnivBankA
 153++A3C3 ED 92 56    >                     nextreg UniverseMMU,       a
 154++A3C6                                      ;break
 155++A3C6                                      ;call    ORTHOGALISE
 156++A3C6              .NormaliseDirection:    IFDEF MISSILEBREAK
 157++A3C6 ~                                        break
 158++A3C6                                      ENDIF
 159++A3C6 CD 25 A9                             call    NormalizeTactics                    ; Normalise vector down to 7 bit + sign byte (.TA19->TAS2)
 160++A3C9                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 161++A3C9 CD EC A7                                 call DebugTacticsCopy
 162++A3CC                                      ENDIF
 163++A3CC              .NegateDirection:       FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 163++A3CC 3A 2D A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 163++A3CF EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 163++A3D1 32 2D A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 164++A3D4                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 164++A3D4 3A 31 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 164++A3D7 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A3D9 32 31 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 165++A3DC                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 165++A3DC 3A 35 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 165++A3DF EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A3E1 32 35 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 166++A3E4 CD FB A3                             call    SeekingLogic
 167++A3E7 C9                                   ret
 168++A3E8 3A 38 80     .ProcessMissileHit:     ld      a,(CurrentMissileCheck)
 169++A3EB                                      ReturnIfAGTENusng UniverseSlotListSize  ; need to wait another loop
 169++A3EB FE 0C       >                        cp    UniverseSlotListSize
 169++A3ED D0          >                        ret	 nc
 170++A3EE C3 DC A0     .ActivateNewExplosion:  jp  CheckMissileBlastInit               ; initialise
 171++A3F1                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return by using jp
 172++A3F1 CD 45 C7     .ECMIsActive:           call    UnivExplodeShip                 ; ECM detonates missile
 173++A3F4                                      SetMemTrue  UBnKMissleHitToProcess      ; Enque an explosion
 173++A3F4 AF          >                        xor     a
 173++A3F5 32 44 C0    >                        ld      (UBnKMissleHitToProcess),a
 174++A3F8 C3 E8 A3                             jp      .ProcessMissileHit              ; lets see if we can enqueue now
 175++A3FB                                      ; DUMMY RET get a free return as activenewexplosion does jp to init with a free ret
 176++A3FB
 177++A3FB CD 31 A8     SeekingLogic:           call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 178++A3FE 32 EE A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 179++A401 3A 7D 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 180++A404 32 F2 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A407 CD 87 A8     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 182++A40A 32 F1 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 183++A40D 3A 7D 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 184++A410 32 F2 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 185++A413 CD 1D A4                             call    SimplifiedShipPitchv3
 186++A416 CD 41 A4                             call    SimplifiedShipRollv3
 187++A419 CD 6F A4                             call    SimplifiedShipSpeedv3
 188++A41C C9                                   ret
 189++A41D
 190++A41D              SimplifiedShipPitchv3:  ;break
 191++A41D 2A F1 A1                             ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 192++A420 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 193++A421 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 194++A423 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 195++A425 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 196++A426 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 197++A427 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 198++A429                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 198++A429 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 198++A42B D2 37 A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 199++A42E                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 199++A42E AF          >                        xor a
 200++A42F B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 201++A430 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 202++A433                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 203++A433 32 7E A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 204++A436                                      ENDIF
 205++A436 C9                                   ret
 206++A437 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 207++A439 B4                                   or      h
 208++A43A 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 209++A43D                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 210++A43D 32 7E A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 211++A440                                      ENDIF
 212++A440 C9                                   ret
 213++A441
 214++A441              ;Direct on dot product nose is $24
 215++A441              ; Position                  Pitch   Roll    Speed
 216++A441              ; Top left forwards         up      -ve     +
 217++A441              ; Top right forwards        up      +ve     +
 218++A441              ; Bottom left forwards      down    -ve     +
 219++A441              ; Bottom right forwards     down    +ve     +
 220++A441              ; Top left rear             up      -ve     -
 221++A441              ; Top right rear            up      +ve     -
 222++A441              ; Bottom left rear          down    -ve     -
 223++A441              ; Bottom right rear         down    +ve     -
 224++A441
 225++A441
 226++A441
 227++A441              SimplifiedShipRollv3:  ; ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)               ; get current roll
 228++A441                                     ; sla     a                                 ; * 2 to also abs
 229++A441                                     ; ReturnIfAGTENusng 32                      ; and so if >32 skip
 230++A441 CD 8D A8                             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 231++A444 32 F4 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 232++A447 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 233++A448 3A 7D 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 234++A44B 32 F5 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 235++A44E 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 236++A44F 3A F2 A1                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 237++A452                                      ;xor     $80                               ; .
 238++A452                                      ;xor     h                                 ; b = flip against pitch sign
 239++A452                                      ;and     $80                               ; .
 240++A452                                      ;xor $80
 241++A452 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 242++A453 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 243++A454 CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 244++A456                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 244++A456 FE 10       >                        cp     16
 244++A458 D2 64 A4    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 245++A45B                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 245++A45B AF          >                        xor a
 246++A45C B0                                   or      b
 247++A45D 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 248++A460                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 249++A460 32 7C A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 250++A463                                      ENDIF
 251++A463 C9                                   ret
 252++A464 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 253++A466 B4                                   or      h
 254++A467 A8                                   xor     b
 255++A468 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 256++A46B                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 257++A46B 32 7C A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 258++A46E                                      ENDIF
 259++A46E C9                                   ret
 260++A46F
 261++A46F 2A EE A1     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3:  ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 262++A472 7C                                   ld      a,h
 263++A473 A7                                   and     a
 264++A474 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 265++A476 ED 5B F1 A1                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 266++A47A 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267++A47B                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 267++A47B FE 16       >                        cp      22
 267++A47D DA 89 A4    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 268++A480 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 269++A482 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 270++A485                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 271++A485 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 272++A488                                      ENDIF
 273++A488 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 274++A489              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 274++A489 FE 12       >                        cp      18
 274++A48B DA 97 A4    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 275++A48E 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 276++A490 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 277++A493                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 278++A493 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 279++A496                                      ENDIF
 280++A496 C9                                   ret
 281++A497              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 281++A497 AF          >                        xor a
 282++A498 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 283++A49B                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 284++A49B 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 285++A49E                                      ENDIF
 286++A49E C9                                   ret
 287++A49F
 288++A49F
 289++A49F CD DE A4     SimplifiedShipSpeedv3b:  call    GetDistance                         ;
 290++A4A2 7C                                   ld      a,h
 291++A4A3 A7                                   and     a
 292++A4A4 06 16                                ld      b,22
 293++A4A6 20 08                                jr      nz,.NotSlow
 294++A4A8 7D           .CloseSlowTest:         ld      a,l
 295++A4A9                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 30, .NotSlow
 295++A4A9 FE 1E       >                        cp     30
 295++A4AB D2 B0 A4    >                        jp		nc,.NotSlow
 296++A4AE 06 3C                                ld      b,60
 297++A4B0 2A EE A1     .NotSlow:               ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)             ; if nosedir is negative (pointing the wrong way)
 298++A4B3 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ; or nosedir < 22 (very far off)
 299++A4B4 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ; do decelleration test
 300++A4B6 C2 C7 A4                             jp      nz,.DecelTest                       ; .
 301++A4B9 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ; .
 302++A4BA                                      JumpIfALTNusng b, .DecelTest                ; .
 302++A4BA B8          >                        cp      b
 302++A4BB DA C7 A4    >                        jp		c, .DecelTest
 303++A4BE 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 304++A4C0 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 305++A4C3                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 306++A4C3 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 307++A4C6                                      ENDIF
 308++A4C6 C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 309++A4C7 7D           .DecelTest:             ld      a,l                                 ; if abs acelleration > 18
 310++A4C8                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 18 ,.Deccelerate             ;    decelerate by 2
 310++A4C8 FE 12       >                        cp     18
 310++A4CA D2 D5 A4    >                        jp		nc,.Deccelerate
 311++A4CD              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 311++A4CD AF          >                        xor a
 312++A4CE 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 313++A4D1                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 314++A4D1 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 315++A4D4                                      ENDIF
 316++A4D4 C9                                   ret
 317++A4D5 3E FE        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-2
 318++A4D7 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 319++A4DA                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 320++A4DA 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 321++A4DD                                      ENDIF
 322++A4DD C9                                   ret
 323++A4DE
 324++A4DE 2A 2B A2     GetDistance:            ld      hl,(TacticsVectorX)
 325++A4E1 ED 5B 2F A2                          ld      de,(TacticsVectorY)
 326++A4E5 ED 4B 33 A2                          ld      bc,(TacticsVectorZ)
 327++A4E9 7C                                   ld      a,h
 328++A4EA E6 7F                                and     $7F
 329++A4EC 67                                   ld      h,a
 330++A4ED 78                                   ld      a,b
 331++A4EE E6 7F                                and     $7F
 332++A4F0 47                                   ld      b,a
 333++A4F1 7A                                   ld      a,d
 334++A4F2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 335++A4F4 57                                   ld      d,a
 336++A4F5 09                                   add     hl,bc
 337++A4F6 19                                   add     hl,de
 338++A4F7                                      ShiftHLRight1
 338++A4F7 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 338++A4F9 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 339++A4FB                                      ShiftHLRight1
 339++A4FB CB 3C       >			   srl h
 339++A4FD CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 340++A4FF C9                                   ret

 159++A693 E6 FE                                and     %11111110
 160++A695 28 26                                jr      z,.ShipTurnAway

 163++A69A 21 53 C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnKShipAggression
 163++A69D BE          >                        cp      (hl)
 163++A69E D2 BD A6    >                        jp		nc,.ShipTurnAway
 164++A6A1                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorX+2                ; negate vector in XX15 so it points opposite direction
 164++A6A1 3A 2D A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorX+2)
 164++A6A4 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 164++A6A6 32 2D A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 165++A6A9                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorY+2                ; we have already negated the dot product above
 165++A6A9 3A 31 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorY+2)
 165++A6AC EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 165++A6AE 32 31 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 166++A6B1                                      FlipSignMem TacticsVectorZ+2                ; .
 166++A6B1 3A 35 A2    >                        ld  a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 166++A6B4 EE 80       >                        xor SignOnly8Bit
 166++A6B6 32 35 A2    >                        ld  (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 167++A6B9 CD C1 A6                             call    ShipSeekingLogic            ;    seek as per missile
 168++A6BC C9                                   ret
 169++A6BD CD C1 A6     .ShipTurnAway:          call    ShipSeekingLogic            ; move away (ie.. as per missile but dot products not reversed)
 170++A6C0                                      ;              consider a random roll
 171++A6C0 C9                                   ret
 172++A6C1
 173++A6C1 CD 31 A8     ShipSeekingLogic:       call    XX12EquTacticsDotNosev              ; SA = nose . XX15                           (     ->TAS3)
 174++A6C4 32 EE A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct1),a              ; CNT = A (high byte of dot product)
 175++A6C7 3A 7D 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; get sign from dot product
 176++A6CA 32 F2 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 177++A6CD CD 87 A8     .RoofDotProduct:        call    XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv              ; Now tran the roof for rotation
 178++A6D0 32 F1 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2),a              ; so if its +ve then the roof is similar so pull up to head towards it
 179++A6D3 3A 7D 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; .
 180++A6D6 32 F2 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct2+1),a            ; Note here its direction not dir
 181++A6D9 CD E3 A6                             call    ShipPitchv3
 182++A6DC CD 07 A7                             call    ShipRollv3
 183++A6DF CD 35 A7                             call    ShipSpeedv3
 184++A6E2 C9                                   ret
 185++A6E3
 186++A6E3 2A F1 A1     ShipPitchv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct2)            ; pitch counter sign = opposite sign to roofdir sign
 187++A6E6 7C                                   ld      a,h                                ; .
 188++A6E7 EE 80                                xor     $80                                ; .
 189++A6E9 E6 80                                and     $80                                ; .
 190++A6EB 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 191++A6EC 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 192++A6ED CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 193++A6EF                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 193++A6EF FE 10       >                        cp     16
 193++A6F1 D2 FD A6    >                        jp		nc,.skipPitchZero
 194++A6F4                                      ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 194++A6F4 AF          >                        xor a
 195++A6F5 B4                                   or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 196++A6F6 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .
 197++A6F9                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 198++A6F9 32 7E A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 199++A6FC                                      ENDIF
 200++A6FC C9                                   ret
 201++A6FD 3E 02        .skipPitchZero:         ld      a,2
 202++A6FF B4                                   or      h
 203++A700 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a
 204++A703                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 205++A703 32 7E A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotZ),a
 206++A706                                      ENDIF
 207++A706 C9                                   ret
 208++A707
 209++A707 CD 8D A8     ShipRollv3:             call    XX12EquTacticsDotSidev             ; calculate side dot protuct
 210++A70A 32 F4 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3),a             ; .
 211++A70D 6F                                   ld      l,a                                ; .
 212++A70E 3A 7D 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                           ; .
 213++A711 32 F5 A1                             ld      (TacticsDotProduct3+1),a           ; .
 214++A714 67                                   ld      h,a                                ; h = sign sidev
 215++A715 3A F2 A1                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2+1)           ; get flipped pitch counter sign
 216++A718 47                                   ld      b,a                                ; b = roof product
 217++A719 7D                                   ld      a,l                                ; a = abs sidev  * 2
 218++A71A CB 27                                sla     a                                  ;
 219++A71C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 16,.skipRollZero           ;
 219++A71C FE 10       >                        cp     16
 219++A71E D2 2A A7    >                        jp		nc,.skipRollZero
 220++A721                                      ZeroA                                      ; if its zoer then set rotx to zero
 220++A721 AF          >                        xor a
 221++A722 B0                                   or      b
 222++A723 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 223++A726                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 224++A726 32 7C A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 225++A729                                      ENDIF
 226++A729 C9                                   ret
 227++A72A 3E 02        .skipRollZero:          ld      a,2
 228++A72C B4                                   or      h
 229++A72D A8                                   xor     b
 230++A72E 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 231++A731                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 232++A731 32 7C A2                                 ld  (TacticsRotX),a
 233++A734                                      ENDIF
 234++A734 C9                                   ret
 235++A735
 236++A735 2A EE A1     ShipSpeedv3:            ld      hl,(TacticsDotProduct1)
 237++A738 7C                                   ld      a,h
 238++A739 A7                                   and     a
 239++A73A 20 13                                jr      nz,.SlowDown
 240++A73C ED 5B F1 A1                          ld      de,(TacticsDotProduct2)             ; dot product is +ve so heading at each other
 241++A740 7D                                   ld      a,l
 242++A741                                      JumpIfALTNusng  22,.SlowDown                                  ; nose dot product <
 242++A741 FE 16       >                        cp      22
 242++A743 DA 4F A7    >                        jp		c, .SlowDown
 243++A746 3E 03        .Accelerate:            ld      a,3                                 ; else
 244++A748 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a                       ;  accelleration = 3
 245++A74B                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 246++A74B 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 247++A74E                                      ENDIF
 248++A74E C9                                   ret                                         ;  .
 249++A74F              .SlowDown:              JumpIfALTNusng 18, .NoSpeedChange
 249++A74F FE 12       >                        cp      18
 249++A751 DA 5D A7    >                        jp		c, .NoSpeedChange
 250++A754 3E FF        .Deccelerate:           ld      a,-1
 251++A756 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 252++A759                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 253++A759 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 254++A75C                                      ENDIF
 255++A75C C9                                   ret
 256++A75D              .NoSpeedChange:         ZeroA                                       ; else no change
 256++A75D AF          >                        xor a
 257++A75E 32 47 C0                             ld      (UBnKAccel),a
 258++A761                                      IFDEF MISSILEDEBUG
 259++A761 32 80 A2                                 ld  (TacticsSpeed),a
 260++A764                                      ENDIF
 261++A764 C9                                   ret
 262++A765              ;;;ShipPitchv2:  ;break

 264++A765              ;;;                        ld      a,h                                ; .
 265++A765              ;;;                        xor     $80                                ; .
 266++A765              ;;;                        and     $80                                ; .
 267++A765              ;;;                        ld      h,a                                ; h  = flipped sign
 268++A765              ;;;                        ld      a,l                                ; a = value * 2
 269++A765              ;;;                        sla     a                                  ;
 270++A765              ;;;                        JumpIfAGTENusng 16, .skipPitchZero         ; if its > 16 then update pitch
 271++A765              ;;;                        ZeroA                                      ; else we zero pitch but
 272++A765              ;;;                        or      h                                  ; we need to retain the sign
 273++A765              ;;;                        ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a                ; .

 276++A765              ;;;                        ENDIF

 283++A765              ;;;                        ENDIF

 401++A765              ;;;                        ENDIF

 403++A765              ;;;

 266+ A765
 267+ A765              ; On Entry A = TacticsDotProduct2 sign (i.e. roof direction)
 268+ A765              ; on exit a == new roll
 269+ A765 EE 80        calcNPitch:             xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; c = sign flipped of dot product only
 270+ A767 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit                    ; .
 271+ A769 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; . (varT in effect)
 272+ A76A F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH                 ; a = flipped sign max pitch
 273+ A76C 3A 49 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)             ; b = abs (currentz pitch)
 274+ A76F C9                                   ret
 275+ A770
 276+ A770 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; . which will initially be 0
 277+ A772 47                                   ld      b,a                             ; .
 278+ A773 3A F1 A1                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; a = abs roof dot product
 279+ A776                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXPITCH+1, .calcNPitch2    ; if a >= roll threshold
 279+ A776 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXPITCH+1
 279+ A778 DA 85 A7    >                        jp		c, .calcNPitch2
 280+ A77B 78                                   ld      a,b
 281+ A77C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 282+ A77E                                      ;jr      z,.NPitchPositive
 283+ A77E                                     ; ld      a,
 284+ A77E 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXPITCH                         ;    z rot = z rot * dot product flipped sign
 285+ A780 B1                                   or      c                               ;    i.e. zrot = current magnitude but dot product sign flipped
 286+ A781 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;    .
 287+ A784 C9                                   ret                                     ; else (a LT current abs z)
 288+ A785 B1           .calcNPitch2:           or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 289+ A786 32 49 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotZCounter),a             ;
 290+ A789 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 291+ A78A
 292+ A78A 3A 49 C0     calcNRoll:              ld      a,(UBnKRotZCounter)
 293+ A78D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 294+ A78F EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                    ; flip sign of dot product
 295+ A791 F6 05                                or      5
 296+ A793 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 297+ A796 C9                                   ret
 298+ A797
 299+ A797 4F                                   ld      c,a
 300+ A798 F6 03                                or      MISSILEMAXPITCH
 301+ A79A 3A 48 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKRotXCounter)
 302+ A79D C9                                   ret
 303+ A79E
 304+ A79E
 305+ A79E
 306+ A79E E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                    ; get ABS value
 307+ A7A0 47                                   ld      b,a
 308+ A7A1 3A F1 A1                             ld      a,(TacticsDotProduct2)          ; now we have the dot product abs value
 309+ A7A4                                      JumpIfALTNusng MISSILEMAXROLL+1, .calcNRoll2
 309+ A7A4 FE 04       >                        cp      MISSILEMAXROLL+1
 309+ A7A6 DA B0 A7    >                        jp		c, .calcNRoll2
 310+ A7A9 3E 03                                ld      a,MISSILEMAXROLL
 311+ A7AB B1                                   or      c
 312+ A7AC 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 313+ A7AF C9                                   ret
 314+ A7B0 B1           .calcNRoll2:            or      c                               ;     rot z = dot product with sign flipped
 315+ A7B1 32 48 C0                             ld      (UBnKRotXCounter),a
 316+ A7B4 C9                                   ret
 317+ A7B5
 318+ A7B5
 319+ A7B5 21 2A C0     CopyRotSideToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatSidevX+1
 320+ A7B8 C3 C4 A7                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 321+ A7BB
 322+ A7BB 21 36 C0     CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX+1
 323+ A7BE C3 C4 A7                             jp      CopyRotmatToTacticsMat
 324+ A7C1
 325+ A7C1 21 30 C0     CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat:ld      hl,UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1
 326+ A7C4              ; Coy rotation matrix high byte to trans rot mat, strip off sign and separate to rotmat byte 2
 327+ A7C4 11 0F A2     CopyRotmatToTacticsMat: ld      de,TacticsRotMatX
 328+ A7C7 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of x
 329+ A7C8 47                                   ld      b,a
 330+ A7C9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 331+ A7CB 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 332+ A7CC 13                                   inc     de
 333+ A7CD 78                                   ld      a,b
 334+ A7CE E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 335+ A7D0 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 336+ A7D1 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 337+ A7D2 23                                   inc     hl
 338+ A7D3 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of y
 339+ A7D4 7E           .processYElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of y
 340+ A7D5 47                                   ld      b,a
 341+ A7D6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 342+ A7D8 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 343+ A7D9 13                                   inc     de
 344+ A7DA 78                                   ld      a,b
 345+ A7DB E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 346+ A7DD 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 347+ A7DE 13                                   inc     de                  ; move to next rot mat element
 348+ A7DF 23                                   inc     hl
 349+ A7E0 23                                   inc     hl                  ; matrix high byte of z
 350+ A7E1 7E           .ProcessZElement:       ld      a,(hl)              ; matrix high byte of z
 351+ A7E2 47                                   ld      b,a
 352+ A7E3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 353+ A7E5 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat value
 354+ A7E6 13                                   inc     de
 355+ A7E7 78                                   ld      a,b
 356+ A7E8 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 357+ A7EA 12                                   ld      (de),a              ; set rot mat sign
 358+ A7EB C9                                   ret
 359+ A7EC
 360+ A7EC                                      IFDEF TACTICSDEBUG
 361+ A7EC              DebugTacticsCopy:
 362+ A7EC 2A 29 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
 363+ A7EF ED 5B 2B C0                          ld      de,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
 364+ A7F3 ED 4B 2D C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatSidevZ)
 365+ A7F7 22 4B A2                             ld      (TacticsSideX),hl
 366+ A7FA ED 53 4F A2                          ld      (TacticsSideY),de
 367+ A7FE ED 43 53 A2                          ld      (TacticsSideZ),bc
 368+ A802

 371+ A809 ED 4B 33 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ)
 372+ A80D 22 5B A2                             ld      (TacticsRoofX),hl
 373+ A810 ED 53 5F A2                          ld      (TacticsRoofY),de
 374+ A814 ED 43 63 A2                          ld      (TacticsRoofZ),bc

 378+ A81F ED 4B 39 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ)
