 386+ A82F 00 00        TacticsVarResult        DW 0
 387+ A831 CD BB A7     XX12EquTacticsDotNosev: call    CopyRotNoseToTacticsMat
 388+ A834 21 0F A2     XX12EquTacticsDotHL:    ld      hl,TacticsRotMatX; UBnkTransmatNosevX    ; ROTMATX HI
 389+ A837 7E           .CalcXValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; DE = RotMatX & Vect X
 390+ A838 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 391+ A839 3A 2B A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX)                  ; .
 392+ A83C 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 393+ A83D ED 30                                mul                                         ; .
 394+ A83F 7A                                   ld      a,d                                 ; S = A = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X)
 395+ A840 32 7D 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; .
 396+ A843 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 397+ A844 3A 2D A2     .CalcXSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)                ; B  = A = Sign VecX xor sign RotMatX
 398+ A847 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ; .
 399+ A848 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; .
 400+ A849 23           .MoveToY:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Y component
 401+ A84A 7E           .CalcYValue:            ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y)
 402+ A84B 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 403+ A84C 3A 2F A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY)                  ; .
 404+ A84F 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 405+ A850 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 406+ A852 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 407+ A853 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 408+ A855 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 409+ A856 3A 31 A2     .CalcYSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)                ; c = sign of y_sign * sidev_y
 410+ A859 AE                                   xor     (hl)                                ;
 411+ A85A 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ;
 412+ A85B 23           .MoveToZ:               inc     hl                                  ; Move on to Z component
 413+ A85C E5           .AddXandY:              push    hl                                  ; but save HL as we need that
 414+ A85D 3A 7D 7E                             ld      a,(varS)                            ; hl = Hi (RotMatX & Vect X) b= sign
 415+ A860 26 00                                ld      h,0                                 ; de = Hi (RotMatY & Vect Y) c= sign
 416+ A862 6F                                   ld      l,a                                 ;
 417+ A863 CD 77 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; a(sign) hl = sum
 418+ A866 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; b = sign of result
 419+ A867 22 2F A8                             ld      (TacticsVarResult),hl               ; save sub in TacticsVarResult
 420+ A86A E1           .CalcZValue:            pop     hl                                  ; get back to the rotation mat z
 421+ A86B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                              ; D = 0, E = Hi (RotMatZ & Vect Z)
 422+ A86C 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; .
 423+ A86D 3A 33 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ)                  ; .
 424+ A870 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; .
 425+ A871 ED 30                                mul     de                                  ; .
 426+ A873 5A                                   ld      e,d                                 ; .
 427+ A874 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; .
 428+ A876 23                                   inc     hl                                  ; move to sign byte
 429+ A877 3A 35 A2     .CalcZSign:             ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)
 430+ A87A AE                                   xor     (hl)
 431+ A87B 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; Set C to the sign of z_sign * sidev_z
 432+ A87C 2A 2F A8                             ld      hl, (TacticsVarResult)              ; CHL = x + y, BDE = z products
 433+ A87F CD 77 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ; so AHL = X y z products
 434+ A882 32 7D 7E                             ld      (varS),a                            ; for backwards compatibility
 435+ A885 7D                                   ld      a,l                                  ; .
 436+ A886 C9                                   ret
 437+ A887
 438+ A887 CD C1 A7     XX12EquTacticsDotRoofv: call    CopyRotRoofToTacticsMat
 439+ A88A C3 34 A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 440+ A88D
 441+ A88D CD B5 A7     XX12EquTacticsDotSidev: call    CopyRotSideToTacticsMat
 442+ A890 C3 34 A8                             jp      XX12EquTacticsDotHL
 443+ A893
 444+ A893 21 20 C0     CopyToTargetVector:     ld      hl,UBnKxlo
 445+ A896 11 1B A2                             ld      de,TacticsTargetX
 446+ A899 01 09 00                             ld      bc,9
 447+ A89C ED B0                                ldir
 448+ A89E C9                                   ret
 449+ A89F
 450+ A89F 2A 20 C0     CopyPosToVector:        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
 451+ A8A2 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 452+ A8A5                                      ;xor     $80
 453+ A8A5 22 2B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 454+ A8A8 32 2D A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 455+ A8AB
 456+ A8AB 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 457+ A8AE 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 458+ A8B1                                      ;xor     $80
 459+ A8B1 22 2F A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 460+ A8B4 32 31 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 461+ A8B7
 462+ A8B7 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
 463+ A8BA 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
 464+ A8BD                                      ;xor     $80
 465+ A8BD 22 33 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 466+ A8C0 32 35 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 467+ A8C3 C9                                   ret
 468+ A8C4
 469+ A8C4              SetPlayerAsTarget:      ZeroA
 469+ A8C4 AF          >                        xor a
 470+ A8C5 21 1B A2                             ld      hl,TacticsTargetX
 471+ A8C8 06 09                                ld      b, 3*3
 472+ A8CA 77           .ZeroLoop:              ld      (hl),a                              ; player is always at 0,0,0
 473+ A8CB 23                                   inc     hl
 474+ A8CC 10 FC                                djnz    .ZeroLoop
 475+ A8CE C9                                   ret
 476+ A8CF
 477+ A8CF CD C4 A8     CalcVectorToMyShip:     call    SetPlayerAsTarget
 478+ A8D2 CD 9F A8                             call    CopyPosToVector
 479+ A8D5                                      ;call    CopyToTargetVector
 480+ A8D5                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetX+2
 481+ A8D5                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetY+2
 482+ A8D5                                      ;FlipSignMem     TacticsTargetZ+2
 483+ A8D5 C9                                   ret
 484+ A8D6
 485+ A8D6 ED 5B 1B A2  CalcTargetVector:       ld      de,(TacticsTargetX)                        ; get target ship X
 486+ A8DA 3A 1D A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetX+2)                       ; and flip sign so we have missile - target
 487+ A8DD                                      FlipSignBitA
 487+ A8DD EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 488+ A8DF 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 489+ A8E0 2A 20 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                        ; get missile x
 490+ A8E3 3A 22 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 491+ A8E6 47                                   ld      b,a
 492+ A8E7 CD 77 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 493+ A8EA 22 2B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),hl
 494+ A8ED 32 2D A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 495+ A8F0 ED 5B 1E A2  .UpdateTargetingShipY:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetY)
 496+ A8F4 3A 20 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetY+2)
 497+ A8F7                                      FlipSignBitA
 497+ A8F7 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 498+ A8F9 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 499+ A8FA 2A 23 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)                        ; get missile x
 500+ A8FD 3A 25 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 501+ A900 47                                   ld      b,a
 502+ A901 CD 77 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 503+ A904 22 2F A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),hl
 504+ A907 32 31 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 505+ A90A ED 5B 21 A2  .UpdateTargetingShipZ:  ld      de,(TacticsTargetZ)
 506+ A90E 3A 23 A2                             ld      a,(TacticsTargetZ+2)
 507+ A911                                      FlipSignBitA
 507+ A911 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit
 508+ A913 4F                                   ld      c,a                                 ; get target ship x sign but * -1 as we are subtracting
 509+ A914 2A 26 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; get missile x
 510+ A917 3A 28 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                        ; get missile x sign
 511+ A91A 47                                   ld      b,a
 512+ A91B CD 77 8F                             call    ADDHLDESignBC                       ;AHL = BHL + CDE i.e. missile - target x
 513+ A91E 22 33 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),hl
 514+ A921 32 35 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 515+ A924 C9                                   ret
 516+ A925
 517+ A925              ;-- Now its scaled we can normalise
 518+ A925              ;-- Scale down so that h d &b are zero, then do once again so l e and c are 7 bit
 519+ A925              ;-- use 7 bit mul96 to ensure we don;t get odd maths
 520+ A925 2A 2B A2     NormalizeTactics:       ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 521+ A928 ED 5B 2F A2                          ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 522+ A92C ED 4B 33 A2                          ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 523+ A930 7C           .ScaleLoop:             ld      a,h
 524+ A931 B2                                   or      d
 525+ A932 B0                                   or      b
 526+ A933 28 0F                                jr      z,.DoneScaling
 527+ A935                                      ShiftHLRight1
 527+ A935 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 527+ A937 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 528+ A939                                      ShiftDERight1
 528+ A939 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 528+ A93B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 529+ A93D                                      ShiftBCRight1
 529+ A93D CB 38       >			   srl b
 529+ A93F CB 19       >			   rr  c
 530+ A941 C3 30 A9                             jp      .ScaleLoop
 531+ A944              .DoneScaling:           ShiftHLRight1                       ; as the values now need to be sign magnitued
 531+ A944 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 531+ A946 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 532+ A948                                      ShiftDERight1                       ; e.g. S + 7 bit we need an extra shift
 532+ A948 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 532+ A94A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 533+ A94C                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ; now values are in L E C
 533+ A94C CB 38       >			   srl b
 533+ A94E CB 19       >			   rr  c
 534+ A950 E5 D5 C5                             push    hl,,de,,bc                  ; save vecrtor x y and z nwo they are scaled to 1 byte
 535+ A953 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; hl = y(e) ^ 2
 536+ A954 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 537+ A956 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; .
 538+ A957 53                                   ld      d,e                         ; de = x(l) ^ 2
 539+ A958 ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 540+ A95A 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl = hl + de
 541+ A95B 51                                   ld      d,c                         ; de = y(c)^ 2 + x ^ 2
 542+ A95C 59                                   ld      e,c                         ; .
 543+ A95D ED 30                                mul     de                          ; .
 544+ A95F 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; hl =  y^ 2 + x ^ 2 + z ^ 2
 545+ A960 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; fix as hl was holding square
 546+ A961 CD 30 93                             call    asm_sqrt                    ; IYH = A = hl = sqrt (de) = sqrt (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2 + z ^ 2)
 547+ A964                                      ; add in logic if h is low then use lower bytes for all
 548+ A964 7D                                   ld      a,l                         ;
 549+ A965 FD 67                                ld      iyh,a                       ;
 550+ A967 57                                   ld      d,a                         ; D = sqrt
 551+ A968 C1                                   pop     bc                          ; retrive tacticsvectorz scaled
 552+ A969 79                                   ld      a,c                         ; a = scaled byte
 553+ A96A CD 49 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg          ; This rountine I think is wrong and retuins bad values
 554+ A96D 32 33 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ),a          ; z = normalised z
 555+ A970 D1                                   pop     de
 556+ A971 7B                                   ld      a,e
 557+ A972 FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 558+ A974 CD 49 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 559+ A977 32 2F A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY),a
 560+ A97A E1                                   pop     hl
 561+ A97B 7D                                   ld      a,l
 562+ A97C FD 54                                ld      d,iyh
 563+ A97E CD 49 9A                             call    AequAdivDmul967Bit;AequAdivDmul96Unsg
 564+ A981 32 2B A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX),a
 565+ A984                                      ; BODGE FOR NOW
 566+ A984                                     ; BODGE FOR NOW
 567+ A984                                      ZeroA                              ;; added to help debugging
 567+ A984 AF          >                        xor a
 568+ A985 32 2C A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorX+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 569+ A988 32 30 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorY+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 570+ A98B 32 34 A2                             ld      (TacticsVectorZ+1),a       ;; added to help debugging
 571+ A98E                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorX+2     ; now upper byte is sign only
 571+ A98E 3A 2D A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorX+2)
 571+ A991 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 571+ A993 32 2D A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorX+2),a
 572+ A996                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorY+2     ; (could move it to lower perhaps later if
 572+ A996 3A 31 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorY+2)
 572+ A999 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 572+ A99B 32 31 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorY+2),a
 573+ A99E                                      SignBitOnlyMem TacticsVectorZ+2     ;  its worth it)
 573+ A99E 3A 35 A2    >                        ld      a, (TacticsVectorZ+2)
 573+ A9A1 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 573+ A9A3 32 35 A2    >                        ld      (TacticsVectorZ+2),a
 574+ A9A6 C9                                   ret

 744+ A9A7              ;         if ship is not pointing at us from dot product ( < 160 , also > -32)
 745+ A9A7              ;            then jump to part 7
 746+ A9A7              ;            else if ship is pointing directly at us ( < 163 i.e. > -35)
 747+ A9A7              ;                    then fire laser at us (which reduces energy)
 748+ A9A7              ;                         cause laser damage to our ship (this will signal death is needed)
 749+ A9A7              ;                         decellerate by half as ship has lock on
 750+ A9A7              ;                         return
 751+ A9A7              ;                    else fire laser into space (which reduces energy)
 752+ A9A7              ;                 end if
 753+ A9A7              ;         end if
 754+ A9A7              ; .PART 7#
 755+ A9A7              ;        if ship is a msile targetting us
 756+ A9A7              ;           then ship turns towards us some more
 757+ A9A7              ;           else if z hi > =  3 or ( x hi or y hi > 1) , i.e. ship is far away
 758+ A9A7              ;                    then do random wiht bit 7 set
 759+ A9A7              ;                         if random < AI flag
 760+ A9A7              ;                            then   ship turned towards us
 761+ A9A7              ;                            else   ship turns away from us
 762+ A9A7              ;                         end if
 763+ A9A7              ;                end if
 764+ A9A7              ;           end if
 765+ A9A7              ;           calculate new roll, pitch and accelleration based on new targe vector
 766+ A9A7
 767+ A9A7
 768+ A9A7              ;        determine ship direction based on agression and type
 769+ A9A7              ;        set pitch and roll coutners
 770+ A9A7              ;        adjust speed depleding on relationship to us
 771+ A9A7              ; .PART 8 - new
 772+ A9A7              ;        if ship has ECM, another ECM is not active and missile targeted at it
 773+ A9A7              ;           if ship has enery of ECM energey cost + 1/8th total
 774+ A9A7              ;              if chance 25%
 775+ A9A7              ;                 then fire ECM
 776+ A9A7              ;
 777+ A9A7
 778+ A9A7
 779+ A9A7
 780+ A9A7
 781+ A9A7 2A 2B A2     ReduceTacticVectors:ld      hl, (TacticsVectorX)        ; pull XX15 into registers
 782+ A9AA ED 5B 2F A2                      ld      de, (TacticsVectorY)        ; .
 783+ A9AE ED 4B 33 A2                      ld      bc, (TacticsVectorZ)        ; .
 784+ A9B2 3A 2D A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorX+2)        ; .
 785+ A9B5 FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; iyh = X sign
 786+ A9B7 3A 31 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorY+2)        ; .
 787+ A9BA FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = Y sign
 788+ A9BC 3A 35 A2                         ld      a,(TacticsVectorZ+2)        ; .
 789+ A9BF DD 67                            ld      ixh,a                       ; ixh = z sign
 790+ A9C1 FD B4        .ScaleLoop:         or      iyh                         ; now check if upper has value
 791+ A9C3 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ; .
 792+ A9C5                                  ClearSignBitA                       ;  exluding sign bit
 792+ A9C5 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
 793+ A9C7 28 21                            jr      z,.DoneScaling              ; and exit loop if upper byte is only sign component
 794+ A9C9 FD 7C        .ScaledDownBy2:     ld      a,iyh
 795+ A9CB CB 2F                            sra     a
 796+ A9CD FD 67                            ld      iyh,a                       ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 797+ A9CF CB 1C                            rr      h                           ; Deal with X
 798+ A9D1 CB 1D                            rr      l                           ;
 799+ A9D3 FD 7D                            ld      a,iyl
 800+ A9D5 CB 2F                            sra     a                           ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 801+ A9D7 FD 6F                            ld      iyl,a
 802+ A9D9 CB 1A                            rr      d                           ; Deal with Y
 803+ A9DB CB 1B                            rr      e                           ;
 804+ A9DD DD 7D                            ld      a, ixl                      ; actually we can keep sign bit so just sr then rr
 805+ A9DF CB 2F                            sra     a
 806+ A9E1 DD 6F                            ld      ixl,a
 807+ A9E3 CB 18                            rr      b                           ; Deal with Z
 808+ A9E5 CB 19                            rr      c                           ;
 809+ A9E7 C3 C1 A9                         jp      .ScaleLoop
 810+ A9EA 7C           .DoneScaling:       ld      a,h
 811+ A9EB B2                               or      d
 812+ A9EC B0                               or      b
 813+ A9ED                                  SignBitOnlyA                        ; check if new sign bit has a value rotated in,
 813+ A9ED E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
 814+ A9EF 28 0C                            jr      z,.OKToNormalise
 815+ A9F1              .ShiftTo15Bit:      ShiftHLRight1                       ; one last shift to 15 bit we don't need
 815+ A9F1 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 815+ A9F3 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 816+ A9F5                                  ShiftDERight1                       ; to do sign bytes
 816+ A9F5 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 816+ A9F7 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 817+ A9F9                                  ShiftBCRight1                       ; as value must be 0
 817+ A9F9 CB 38       >			   srl b
 817+ A9FB CB 19       >			   rr  c
 818+ A9FD 7C           .OKToNormalise:     ld      a,h                         ; iyh now can only hold sign
 819+ A9FE FD B4                            or      iyh                         ; so by the end of here
 820+ AA00 67                               ld      h,a                         ;   hl = x
 821+ AA01 7A                               ld      a,d                         ;   de = y
 822+ AA02 FD B5                            or      iyl                         ;   bc = z
 823+ AA04 57                               ld      d,a                         ; all scaled to 15 bit + sign
 824+ AA05 78                               ld      a,b                         ;
 825+ AA06 DD B4                            or      ixh                         ;
 826+ AA08 47                               ld      b,a                         ;
 827+ AA09 22 3B A2                         ld      (TacticsNormX),hl
 828+ AA0C 22 3F A2                         ld      (TacticsNormY),hl
 829+ AA0F 22 43 A2                         ld      (TacticsNormZ),hl
 830+ AA12 C9                               ret
 831+ AA13                                 ; ***SIgn bits*** need to be in byte 3
 832+ AA13
# file closed: ./GameEngine/Tactics.asm

  21+ AA13              ; Success 1 = default drive, carry reset

 191+ AA34              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 192+ AA34              ;	Function	Read bytes from the open file
 193+ AA34              ;	In:		ix  = address to read into
 194+ AA34              ;			bc  = amount to read
 195+ AA34              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 196+ AA34              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 197+ AA34 B7           fRead:                  or   	a             ; is it zero?
 198+ AA35 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 199+ AA36 E5                                   push    hl
 200+ AA37 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix    	 ; load ix into hl and save hl for later
 201+ AA3A CF                                   rst	    $08
 202+ AA3B 9D                                   db	    F_READ
 203+ AA3C E1                                   pop	    hl
 204+ AA3D C9                                   ret
 205+ AA3E
 206+ AA3E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 207+ AA3E              ;	Function	Write bytes to the open file
 208+ AA3E              ;	In:		ix  = address to read from
 209+ AA3E              ;			bc  = amount to write
 210+ AA3E              ;	ret:		carry set = error
 211+ AA3E              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 212+ AA3E B7           fWrite:                 or   	a             ; is it zero?
 213+ AA3F C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 214+ AA40 E5                                   push	hl
 215+ AA41 DD E5 E1                             ld      hl,ix
 216+ AA44 CF                                   rst	    $08
 217+ AA45 9E                                   db	    F_WRITE
 218+ AA46 E1                                   pop	    hl
 219+ AA47 C9                                   ret
 220+ AA48
 221+ AA48              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 222+ AA48              ;	Function:	Close open file
 223+ AA48              ;	In:		a  = handle
 224+ AA48              ;	ret		a  = handle, 0 on error
 225+ AA48              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 226+ AA48 B7           fClose:		            or   	a             ; is it zero?
 227+ AA49 C8                                   ret  	z             ; if so return
 228+ AA4A CF                                   rst	    $08
 229+ AA4B 9B                                   db	    F_CLOSE
 230+ AA4C C9                                   ret

 261+ AA56              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 262+ AA56              ; Init the file system
 263+ AA56              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 264+ AA56 CD 13 AA     InitFileSystem:         call    GetDefaultDrive
 265+ AA59 C9                                   ret
 266+ AA5A
 267+ AA5A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 268+ AA5A              ; Function:	Load a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 269+ AA5A              ; In:		hl = file data pointer
 270+ AA5A              ;		    ix = address to load to
 271+ AA5A              ;           bc = filelength
 272+ AA5A              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 273+ AA5A CD 13 AA     FileLoad:	            call    GetDefaultDrive
 274+ AA5D C5 D5 F5                             push	bc,,de,,af
 275+ AA60                                      ; get file size
 276+ AA60 C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix			; store size, load address,
 277+ AA63 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl
 278+ AA66 06 01                                ld      b,FA_READ		; mode open for reading
 279+ AA68 CD 26 AA                             call    fOpen
 280+ AA6B 38 17                                jr	    c,.error_opening; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 281+ AA6D FE 00                                cp	    0				; was file handle 0?
 282+ AA6F 28 13                                jr	    z,.error_opening; of so there was an error opening.
 283+ AA71 DD E1 C1                             pop     bc,,ix          ; get load address back and size back
 284+ AA74 F5                                   push	af				; remember handle
 285+ AA75 CD 34 AA                             call	fRead			; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 286+ AA78 38 0C                                jr	    c,.error_reading
 287+ AA7A F1                                   pop	    af			    ; get handle back
 288+ AA7B CD 48 AA                             call	fClose			; close file
 289+ AA7E 38 07                                jr	    c,.error_closing
 290+ AA80 F1 D1 C1                             pop     bc,,de,,af      ; normal exit
 291+ AA83 C9                                   ret
 292+ AA84              ;
 293+ AA84              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 294+ AA84              ;
 295+ AA84 DD E1        .error_opening:         pop	ix
 296+ AA86 C1           .error_reading:		    pop	bc	; don't pop a, need error code
 297+ AA87
 298+ AA87              .error_closing:
 299+ AA87 C1           .NormalError:  	        pop	bc	; don't pop into A, return with error code
 300+ AA88 D1                                   pop	de
 301+ AA89 C1                                   pop	bc
 302+ AA8A C9                                   ret
 303+ AA8B
 304+ AA8B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 305+ AA8B              ; Function:	Save a whole file into memory	(confirmed working on real machine)
 306+ AA8B              ; In:		hl = file name
 307+ AA8B              ;		    ix = address to save from
 308+ AA8B              ;		    bc = size
 309+ AA8B              ; *******************************************************************************************************
 310+ AA8B CD 13 AA     FileSave:	            call    GetDefaultDrive		; need to do this each time?!?!?
 311+ AA8E C5 DD E5                             push	bc,,ix   			; store size& save address
 312+ AA91 E5 DD E1                             ld      ix,hl               ; get name into ix
 313+ AA94 06 0C                                ld      b,FA_OVERWRITE		; mode open for writing
 314+ AA96 CD 26 AA                             call    fOpen
 315+ AA99 38 12                                jr	    c,.error_opening	; carry set? so there was an error opening and A=error code
 316+ AA9B FE 00                                cp	    0			        ; was file handle 0?
 317+ AA9D 28 0E                                jr	    z,.error_opening	; of so there was an error opening.
 318+ AA9F DD E1 C1                             pop	    bc,,ix			    ; get lenght and save address back
 319+ AAA2 F5                                   push	af			        ; remember handle
 320+ AAA3 CD 3E AA                             call	fWrite			    ; read data from A to address IX of length BC
 321+ AAA6 38 04                                jr	c,.error
 322+ AAA8 F1                                   pop	af			            ; get handle back
 323+ AAA9 CD 48 AA                             call	fClose			    ; close file
 324+ AAAC C9           .error:                 ret
 325+ AAAD              ;
 326+ AAAD              ; On error, display error code an lock up so we can see it
 327+ AAAD              ;
 328+ AAAD DD E1 C1     .error_opening:         pop	bc,,ix                  ; don't pop a, need error code
 329+ AAB0 C9                                   ret

  19+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCTprint_boiler_text_l2:
  20+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  21+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCTBoilerTextLoop:
  22+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  23+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  24+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  25+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  26+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  27+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  28+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  29+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  30+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	inc			hl
  31+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  32+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  33+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  34+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT    MMUSelectLayer2
  35+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	call		l1_print_at
  36+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	pop			hl
  37+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	pop			bc
  38+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	djnz		BoilerTextLoop
  39+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCT	ret
  40+ AE2C
  41+ AE2C
  42+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT print_boiler_text:
  43+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT ; ">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
  44+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT .BoilerTextLoop:
  45+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
  46+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
  47+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  48+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
  49+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  50+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
  51+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  52+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  53+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	inc			hl
  54+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  55+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  56+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	ld			e,txt_status_colour
  57+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	push		bc
  58+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			de
  59+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	call		l1_print_at
  60+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			hl
  61+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	pop			bc
  62+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  63+ AE2C              ;:DEFUNCT 	ret
  64+ AE2C
  65+ AE2C              ;;DEFUNCTGetFuelLevel:           INCLUDE "Menus/get_fuel_level_inlineinclude.asm"

1066  B109                              ; NOTE play then equeue simplifies ligic, more chance slot free
1067  B109                              org $B1B1
1068  B1B1                  DISPLAY "Interrupt Handler Starts at",$
1069  B1B1              ; keeping the handler to a minimal size in order to make best use of
1070  B1B1              ; non pageable memory
1071  B1B1              IM2Routine:             IFDEF INTERRUPT_BLOCKER
1072  B1B1 ~                                            DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Enabled"
1073  B1B1 ~                                            ei
1074  B1B1 ~                                            reti
1075  B1B1                                      ELSE
1076  B1B1                                              DISPLAY "Interrupt Blocker Disabled"
1077  B1B1                                      ENDIF
1078  B1B1 F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
1078  B1B5 DD E5 FD E5
1079  B1B9 08                                   ex      af,af'
1080  B1BA D9                                   exx
1081  B1BB F5 C5 D5 E5                          push    af,,bc,,de,,hl
1082  B1BF 21 79 7E                             ld      hl,InterruptCounter
1083  B1C2 34                                   inc     (hl)                        ; cycles each interrupt
1084  B1C3                                      ;break
1085  B1C3 CD D7 B1     IM2SoundHandler:        call    IM2Sound                    ; This is a self modifying code address to change the actual sound vector if we are doing special music e.g. intro or docking
1086  B1C6 E1 D1 C1 F1                          pop    af,,bc,,de,,hl
1087  B1CA 08                                   ex      af,af'
1088  B1CB D9                                   exx
1089  B1CC FD E1 DD E1                          pop     af,,bc,,de,,hl,,ix,,iy
1089  B1D0 E1 D1 C1 F1
1090  B1D4 FB           .IMFinishup:            ei
1091  B1D5 ED 4D                                reti

1094  B1D7                  DISPLAY "Non Banked Code + Interrupt Handler Ends At", EndOfNonBanked

1096  B1D7
1097  B1D7              SaveMMU6:               MACRO
1098  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER
1099  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU6),a
1100  B1D7                                      ENDM
1101  B1D7
1102  B1D7              RestoreMMU6:            MACRO
1103  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU6)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1104  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_6_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1105  B1D7                                      ENDM
1106  B1D7
1107  B1D7              SaveMMU7:               MACRO
1108  B1D7 ~                                    GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1109  B1D7 ~                                    ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1110  B1D7                                      ENDM
1111  B1D7
1112  B1D7              RestoreMMU7:            MACRO
1113  B1D7 ~                                    ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1114  B1D7 ~                                    nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1115  B1D7                                      ENDM
1116  B1D7
1117  B1D7              IM2Sound:               SaveMMU7
1117  B1D7             >                        GetNextReg  MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1117  B1D7 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
1117  B1DA 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER
1117  B1DC ED 79       >            out (c),a
1117  B1DE 04          >            inc b
1117  B1DF ED 78       >            in a,(c)
1117  B1E1 32 08 B1    >                        ld      (SavedMMU7),a
1118  B1E4                                      MMUSelectSound
1118  B1E4 ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
1119  B1E8                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
1120  B1E8                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
1121  B1E8                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
1122  B1E8 CD 00 E0     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    SoundInterruptHandler       ; this does the work
1123  B1EB              .DoneInterrupt:         RestoreMMU7
1123  B1EB 3A 08 B1    >                        ld      a,(SavedMMU7)               ; now restore up post interrupt
1123  B1EE ED 92 57    >                        nextreg MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER,a       ; Restore MMU7
1124  B1F1 C9                                   ret
1125  B1F2
1126  B1F2

1127  B1F5 3E 57       >            ld a,MMU_SLOT_7_REGISTER

1128  B1FF                                      MMUSelectSound
1128  B1FF ED 91 57 64 >                     nextreg SoundMMU,		    BankSound
1129  B203                                      ; This is a self modifying code address to change the
1130  B203                                      ; actual sound vector if we are doing special music
1131  B203                                      ; e.g. intro or docking
1132  B203 CD 1B E4     .IM2SoundHandler:       call    PlayDanube                  ; this does the work

   2++C0C2              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C0C2 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C0C3 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C0C4 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C0C5 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C0C6 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C0C7 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C0C8 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C0C9 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C0CA 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C0CB E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C0CC EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C0CD 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C0CF C5                                   push		bc
  16++C0D0 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C0D1                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C0D1 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0D5 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0D8 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0D9 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0DA 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0DC C9                                   ret

  70+ C130              SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair:

  72+ C134 ED 5B 11 7F                          ld		de,(PresentSystemX)
  73+ C138 79                                   ld		a,c                             ; a = target x pos
  74+ C139 93                                   sub		e                               ; a = target x - present x
  75+ C13A F2 4B C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipX                      ; if > 0 skip next bit
  76+ C13D ED 44                                neg                                     ; c = a = abs a * 4
  77+ C13F CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  78+ C141 CB 27                                sla		a                               ; .
  79+ C143 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ;  .
  80+ C144 3E 80                                ld      a,src_x_centre                  ; c = a = centre screen - c
  81+ C146 91                                   sub     c                               ; .
  82+ C147 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; .
  83+ C148 C3 52 C1                             jp      .fixY                           ;. now do Y
  84+ C14B CB 27        .NoFlipX:               sla		a
  85+ C14D CB 27                                sla		a
  86+ C14F C6 80                                add		a,src_x_centre
  87+ C151 4F                                   ld      c,a
  88+ C152 78           .fixY:                  ld		a,b                             ; for Y its * 2
  89+ C153 92                                   sub		d
  90+ C154 F2 63 C1                             jp      p,.NoFlipY
  91+ C157 ED 44                                neg
  92+ C159 CB 27                                sla     a

 189+ C22D 00 00        PosScan1                DW      0
 190+ C22F 00 00        PosScan2                DW      0
 191+ C231              ; bc = row col, d = xlength e = y length
 192+ C231              ; Check logic simplies to , if 1 = bc and 2 = de:
 193+ C231              ; 12   X1            X2    OK         2 LT X1
 194+ C231              ; 1    X1  2         X2    FAIL       1 LT X1 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 195+ C231              ;      X1  12        X2    FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X1 && 2 LT X2
 196+ C231              ;      X1  1         X2 2  FAIL       1 GT X1 && 1 LT X2 && 2 GT X2
 197+ C231              ;      X1            X2 12 OK         1 GT X2
 198+ C231 16 07        FreeSlotCheck:          ld      d,7
 199+ C233 ED 30                                mul
 200+ C235 79                                   ld      a,c
 201+ C236 83                                   add     e
 202+ C237 30 02                                jr      nc,.NoOverflow
 203+ C239 3E FF        .Overflow:              ld      a,$FF
 204+ C23B 5F           .NoOverflow:            ld      e,a                     ; e now equals max length in pixels
 205+ C23C 78                                   ld      a,b
 206+ C23D C6 08                                add     8
 207+ C23F 57                                   ld      d,a                     ; e = max height

 218+ C25A 28 29                                jr      z,.NoBox
 219+ C25C 3A 2D C2     .CheckRow:              ld      a,(PosScan1)

 222+ C266 3A 2F C2                             ld      a,(PosScan2)

 389+ C3C2 3A EA 7E                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
 390+ C3C5 21 11 7F                             ld		hl,PresentSystemX
 391+ C3C8 96                                   sub		(hl)
 392+ C3C9 CB 27                                sla		a
 393+ C3CB CB 27                                sla		a								; * 4
 394+ C3CD C6 80                                add		src_x_centre
 395+ C3CF 32 19 C0                             ld		(local_name_col),a
 396+ C3D2 4F                                   ld		c,a
 397+ C3D3 3A EC 7E                             ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
 398+ C3D6 E6 01                                and		$01
 399+ C3D8 C6 02                                add		a,2
 400+ C3DA 57                                   ld		d,a
 401+ C3DB 1E D8                                ld		e,local_chart_star_colour
 402+ C3DD                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 402+ C3DD ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 403+ C3E1 CD 3E EE                             call	l2_draw_circle_fill
 404+ C3E4                                     ; call    src_get_name
 405+ C3E4 CD B3 C2                             call	src_label_ssytem
 406+ C3E7 E1           SRCtoofar:              pop     hl
 407+ C3E8 ED 34 08 00                          add     hl,8
 408+ C3EC E5                                   push    hl
 409+ C3ED DD E1                                pop     ix
 410+ C3EF 3A 80 7E                             ld		a,(XSAV)
 411+ C3F2 3D                                   dec		a
 412+ C3F3 FE 00                                cp		0
 413+ C3F5 C8                                   ret		z
 414+ C3F6 32 80 7E                             ld		(XSAV),a
 415+ C3F9 C3 79 C3                             jp		SRCCounterLoop
 416+ C3FC              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 417+ C3FC              draw_local_chart_menu:  InitNoDoubleBuffer
 417+ C3FC             >                            MMUSelectLayer1
 417+ C3FC ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
 417+ C400 CD 8F E0    >                            call	l1_cls
 417+ C403 3E 07       >                            ld		a,7
 417+ C405 CD AA E0    >                            call	l1_attr_cls_to_a
 417+ C408             >                            MMUSelectLayer2
 417+ C408 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 417+ C40C CD 0A E0    >                            call    asm_l2_double_buffer_off
 417+ C40F CD 0E E2    >                            call	l2_cls	; Get some space
 417+ C412             >                            MMUSelectSpriteBank
 417+ C412 ED 91 57 3C >					 nextreg SpritememMMU,	    BankSPRITE
 417+ C416 CD 6E E5    >                            call    sprite_cls_cursors
 418+ C419 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 419+ C41B 32 88 7E                             ld      (MenuIdMax),a
 420+ C41E                                      CopyPresentSystemToTarget               ; for short range we always start at present and cusor on present
 420+ C41E 2A 11 7F    >                        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 420+ C421 22 13 7F    >                        ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 421+ C424 01 01 01     SRCDrawbox:             ld		bc,$0101
 422+ C427 11 FD BE                             ld		de,$BEFD
 423+ C42A 3E C0                                ld		a,$C0
 424+ C42C                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 424+ C42C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 425+ C430 CD F9 E3                             call	l2_draw_box
 426+ C433 01 01 0A                             ld		bc,$0A01
 427+ C436 11 C0 FE                             ld		de,$FEC0
 428+ C439                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 428+ C439 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 429+ C43D CD 84 E4                             call	l2_draw_horz_line
 430+ C440 3E 0C        SRCStaticText:          ld		a,short_range_header
 431+ C442 CD B0 8E                             call	expandTokenToString
 432+ C445 06 01                                ld		b,1
 433+ C447 21 10 C0                             ld		hl,short_range_boiler_text
 434+ C44A CD C2 C0                             call	SRM_print_boiler_text
 435+ C44D CD 16 85     SRCSetUpChart:          call	copy_galaxy_to_system
 436+ C450 CD 65 C3                             call	plot_local_stars
 437+ C453 CD DD C0     .CircleandCrosshair:    call	SRM_draw_chart_circle_and_crosshair
 438+ C456 CD F9 C0                             call	SRM_draw_hyperspace_cross_hair
 439+ C459 C9                                   ret
 440+ C45A              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 441+ C45A 3A 55 80     local_chart_cursors:    ld     a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 442+ C45D                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 442+ C45D A7          >                        and     a
 442+ C45E C8          >                        ret     z
 443+ C45F 17                                   rla
 444+ C460 DC 78 C4                             call   c,src_UpPressed
 445+ C463 17                                   rla
 446+ C464 DC 95 C4                             call   c,src_DownPressed
 447+ C467 17                                   rla
 448+ C468 DC B4 C4                             call   c,src_LeftPressed
 449+ C46B 17                                   rla
 450+ C46C DC D1 C4                             call   c,src_RightPressed
 451+ C46F 17                                   rla
 452+ C470 DC F0 C4                             call   c,src_HomePressed
 453+ C473 17                                   rla
 454+ C474 DC FA C4                             call   c,src_RecenterPressed
 455+ C477 C9                                   ret
 456+ C478              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 457+ C478 3A 14 7F     src_UpPressed:          ld     a,(TargetSystemY)
 458+ C47B                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 458+ C47B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 458+ C47C CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 459+ C47F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 460+ C480 3A 12 7F                             ld      a,(PresentSystemY)
 461+ C483 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 462+ C484 FA 8C C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 463+ C487                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 463+ C487 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 463+ C489 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 464+ C48C 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 465+ C48D 3D                                   dec     a
 466+ C48E 32 14 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 467+ C491 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 468+ C494 C9                                   ret
 469+ C495              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 470+ C495 3A 12 7F     src_DownPressed:        ld     a,(PresentSystemY)
 471+ C498 47                                   ld      b,a
 472+ C499 3A 14 7F                             ld      a,(TargetSystemY)
 473+ C49C 4F                                   ld      c,a
 474+ C49D                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 128,src_BoundsLimit
 474+ C49D FE 80       >                        cp     128
 474+ C49F CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 475+ C4A2 90                                   sub     b
 476+ C4A3 FA AB C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 477+ C4A6                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 40,src_BoundsLimit
 477+ C4A6 FE 28       >                        cp     40
 477+ C4A8 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 478+ C4AB 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 479+ C4AC 3C                                   inc    a
 480+ C4AD 32 14 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemY),a
 481+ C4B0 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 482+ C4B3 C9                                   ret
 483+ C4B4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 484+ C4B4 3A 13 7F     src_LeftPressed:        ld      a,(TargetSystemX)           ; we can't move left if target is zero
 485+ C4B7                                      JumpIfAIsZero   src_BoundsLimit
 485+ C4B7 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 485+ C4B8 CA 0F C5    >                        jp	    z, src_BoundsLimit
 486+ C4BB 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save target as we will need it
 487+ C4BC 3A 11 7F                             ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 488+ C4BF 90                                   sub     b                           ; get the difference between present and target
 489+ C4C0 FA C8 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest           ; if target is right of present, we can go left
 490+ C4C3                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit  ; if no more than 20 then OK
 490+ C4C3 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 490+ C4C5 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 491+ C4C8 78           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,b
 492+ C4C9 3D                                   dec     a
 493+ C4CA 32 13 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 494+ C4CD CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 495+ C4D0 C9                                   ret
 496+ C4D1              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 497+ C4D1 3A 11 7F     src_RightPressed:       ld      a,(PresentSystemX)
 498+ C4D4 47                                   ld      b,a
 499+ C4D5 3A 13 7F                             ld      a,(TargetSystemX)
 500+ C4D8 4F                                   ld      c,a
 501+ C4D9                                      JumpIfAEqNusng 255,src_BoundsLimit
 501+ C4D9 FE FF       >                        cp     255
 501+ C4DB CA 0F C5    >                        jp      z,src_BoundsLimit
 502+ C4DE 90                                   sub     b
 503+ C4DF FA E7 C4                             jp      m,.SkipBoundsTest
 504+ C4E2                                      JumpIfAGTENusng 20,src_BoundsLimit
 504+ C4E2 FE 14       >                        cp     20
 504+ C4E4 D2 0F C5    >                        jp		nc,src_BoundsLimit
 505+ C4E7 79           .SkipBoundsTest:        ld      a,c
 506+ C4E8 3C                                   inc    a
 507+ C4E9 32 13 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),a
 508+ C4EC CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 509+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 510+ C4F0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 511+ C4F0 2A 11 7F     src_HomePressed:        ld      hl,(PresentSystemX)
 512+ C4F3 22 13 7F                             ld      (TargetSystemX),hl
 513+ C4F6 CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 514+ C4F9 C9                                   ret
 515+ C4FA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 516+ C4FA 3A FE 7E     src_RecenterPressed:    ld      a,(Galaxy)      ; DEBUG as galaxy n is not working
 517+ C4FD                                      MMUSelectGalaxyA
 517+ C4FD ED 92 57    >                     nextreg GalaxyDataMMU,     a
 518+ C500 ED 4B 13 7F                          ld      bc,(TargetSystemX)
 519+ C504 CD 70 FB                             call    find_nearest_to_bc
 520+ C507 ED 43 13 7F                          ld      (TargetSystemX),bc
 521+ C50B CD 30 C1                             call    SRM_update_hyperspace_cross_hair
 522+ C50E C9                                   ret
 523+ C50F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 524+ C50F AF           src_BoundsLimit:        xor     a
 525+ C510 C9                                   ret

  28+ C08E                  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C08E
   2++C08E              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C08E C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C08F 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C090 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C091 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C092 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C093 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C094 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C095 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C096 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C097 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C098 EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C099 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C09B C5                                   push		bc
  16++C09C D1                                   pop			de
  17++C09D                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C09D ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C0A1 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C0A4 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C0A5 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C0A6 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C0A8 C9                                   ret
  23++C0A9
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

 139+ C1D5 32 54 80    >                        ld      (TextInputMode),a
 140+ C1D8 C9                                       ret
 141+ C1D9
 142+ C1D9              gcDelayVal                  equ $0A
 143+ C1D9              gcBlinkVal                  equ $10
 144+ C1D9
 145+ C1D9
 146+ C1D9 10           gcCursorBlink               DB  gcBlinkVal
 147+ C1DA 20           gcCursorChar                DB  " "
 148+ C1DB 00           gcEndOfString               DB  0
 149+ C1DC 00 00 00...  gcInputText                 DS  31
 150+ C1FB 00 00 00 00                              DB  0,0,0,0,0
 150+ C1FF 00
 151+ C200 00 00 00...  gcBlank                     DS  32
 152+ C220
 153+ C220              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 154+ C220 11 08 B0     gc_display_find_text:   ld		de,galactic_find_position   ; Wipe input area on screen
 155+ C223 21 3C C0                             ld      hl,galactic_find_message
 156+ C226                                      MMUSelectLayer1
 156+ C226 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1

 159+ C22E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 160+ C22E 11 DC C1     gc_display_find_string: ld      de,gcInputText
 161+ C231                                      MMUSelectKeyboard
 161+ C231 ED 91 57 65 >                     nextreg KeyboardMMU,       BankKeyboard
 162+ C235 CD 3B E2                             call    keyboard_copy_input_to_de

 164+ C23B ED A0                                ldi                             ; Copy cursor to local
 165+ C23D 3A 38 E2                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 166+ C240 3C                                   inc     a
 167+ C241 47                                   ld      b,a
 168+ C242 3E 14                                ld      a,20
 169+ C244 90                                   sub     b
 170+ C245 47                                   ld      b,a
 171+ C246 3E 20                                ld      a," "
 172+ C248 12           .SpacePad:              ld      (de),a
 173+ C249 13                                   inc     de
 174+ C24A 10 FC                                djnz    .SpacePad
 175+ C24C AF                                   xor     a
 176+ C24D 12                                   ld      (de),a

 178+ C251 21 DC C1                             ld      hl,gcInputText
 179+ C254                                      MMUSelectLayer1

 181+ C25B C9                                   ret

 183+ C25C 3A D9 C1     blink_cursor:           ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)

 186+ C263 C0                                   ret     nz
 187+ C264 3E 10        .FlashCursor:           ld      a,gcBlinkVal
 188+ C266 32 D9 C1                             ld      (gcCursorBlink),a

 191+ C26E 28 06                                jr      z,.ChangeToStar

 194+ C275 C9                                   ret

 198+ C27C              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 199+ C27C              ; The main loop handles the find key
 200+ C27C              loop_gc_menu:           JumpIfMemTrue TextInputMode,AlreadyInInputMode  ;if we are in input mode then go directly there
 200+ C27C 3A 54 80    >                        ld      a,(TextInputMode)
 200+ C27F A7          >                        and     a
 200+ C280 CA A1 C2    >                        jp      z, AlreadyInInputMode
 201+ C283              .StartFindCheck:        MacroIsKeyPressed c_Pressed_Find                        ;Is F pressed
 201+ C283 3E 4E       >                        ld      a,c_Pressed_Find

 205+ C294 AF          >                        xor     a

 206+ C298 3E 10       >                        ld      a,gcBlinkVal

 207+ C29D CD 20 C2     .DisplayInputbar:       call    gc_display_find_text                    ; now prep the boiler plate input text
 208+ C2A0 C9                                   ret                                             ; and exit so next interation handles new input as we have to rescan keyboard
 209+ C2A1              ;Already in input mode post pressing find
 210+ C2A1              AlreadyInInputMode:     MMUSelectKeyboard

 212+ C2AC C2 B9 C2    >                        jp      nz, .blinkNoDelay

 213+ C2B3 CA C5 C2    >                        jp      z, .FindEnterPressed

 216+ C2BC                                      CallIfMemEqNusng    gcCursorBlink, gcBlinkVal, gc_display_find_string ; on blink we get a double update but we can live with that
 216+ C2BC 3A D9 C1    >                        ld      a,(gcCursorBlink)
 216+ C2BF FE 10       >                        cp      gcBlinkVal
 216+ C2C1 CC 2E C2    >                        call    z,gc_display_find_string

  42+ C070
  43+ C070              INM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C070
   2++C070              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C070 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C071 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C072 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C073 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C074 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C075 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C076 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C077 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C078 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C079 E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C07A EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C07B 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C07D C5                                   push		bc
  16++C07E D1                                   pop			de
  17++C07F                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C07F ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C083 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C086 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C087 C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C088 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C08A C9                                   ret
  23++C08B
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

  11++C145 06 2F        	ld	b,'0'-1
  12++C147              .Num2:

  14++C148 81           	add		a,c
  15++C149 38 FC        	jr		c,.Num2
  16++C14B 91           	sub 	c
  17++C14C C5           	push	bc
  18++C14D F5           	push	af
  19++C14E 79           	ld		a,c
  20++C14F FE FF        	cp		-1
  21++C151 CC 5A C1     	call	z,.InsertDot
  22++C154 78           	ld		a,b
  23++C155 12           	ld		(de),a
  24++C156 13           	inc		de
  25++C157 F1           	pop		af
  26++C158 C1           	pop		bc
  27++C159 C9           	ret

  30++C15C 12           	ld		(de),a

# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C2C5
   2++C2C5              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C2C5 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C2C6 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C2C7 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C2C8 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C2C9 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C2CA 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C2CB 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C2CC 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C2CD 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C2CE E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C2CF EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C2D0 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C2D2 C5                                   push		bc
  16++C2D3 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C2D4                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C2D4 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C2D8 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C2DB E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C2DC C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C2DD 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C2DF C9                                   ret
  23++C2E0

 303+ C4E3              ; HL = value to add on
 304+ C4E3              ; de = Unit of Measure

 307+ C4E6 28 03                                jr      z,.FoundEnd
 308+ C4E8 23                                   inc     hl
 309+ C4E9 18 F8                                jr      SDAddUoMtoHL
 310+ C4EB EB           .FoundEnd:              ex      de,hl
 311+ C4EC CD 78 C2                             call    SDCopyLoop
 312+ C4EF C9                                   ret
 313+ C4F0
 314+ C4F0              ; works on HL already being at end
 315+ C4F0              ; de = Unit of Measure

 317+ C4F1 EB                                   ex      hl,de
 318+ C4F2 CD 78 C2                             call    SDCopyLoop

 110+ C148 10 B0        .MKTclcn323:            djnz .MKTclcn321
 111+ C14A 3A 7F C1                             ld a,(.MKTclcn32z)
 112+ C14D C6 30                                add A,'0'
 113+ C14F FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 114+ C152 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 115+ C156 C9                                   ret
 116+ C157 01 00 00 00  .MKTclcn32t             dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 116+ C15B 0A 00 00 00
 116+ C15F 64 00 00 00
 116+ C163 E8 03 00 00
 116+ C167 10 27 00 00
 117+ C16B A0 86 01 00                          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 117+ C16F 40 42 0F 00
 117+ C173 80 96 98 00
 117+ C177 00 E1 F5 05
 117+ C17B 00 CA 9A 3B
 118+ C17F 00 00        .MKTclcn32z             ds 2
 119+ C181 00 00        .MKTclcn32zIX           ds 2
 120+ C183              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 121+ C183              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
 122+ C183 01 F0 D8     MPM_DispHLtoDE:         ld	bc,-10000
 123+ C186 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 124+ C189 01 18 FC                             ld	bc,-1000
 125+ C18C CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 126+ C18F 01 9C FF                             ld	bc,-100
 127+ C192 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 128+ C195 0E F6                                ld	c,-10
 129+ C197 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 130+ C19A 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 131+ C19C 3E 2F        MPM_Num1:	            ld	a,'0'-1
 132+ C19E 3C           .Num2:	                inc	a
 133+ C19F 09                                   add	hl,bc
 134+ C1A0 38 FC                                jr	c,.Num2
 135+ C1A2 ED 42                                sbc	hl,bc
 136+ C1A4 12                                   ld	(de),a
 137+ C1A5 13                                   inc	de
 138+ C1A6 C9                                   ret
 139+ C1A7              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 140+ C1A7 26 00        MPM_DispAtoDE:          ld h,0
 141+ C1A9 6F                                   ld l,a
 142+ C1AA C3 83 C1                             jp MPM_DispHLtoDE
 143+ C1AD              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 144+ C1AD 26 00        MPM_DispPriceAtoDE:     ld h,0
 145+ C1AF 6F                                   ld l,a
 146+ C1B0 01 9C FF                             ld	bc,-100
 147+ C1B3 CD C3 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 148+ C1B6 0E F6                                ld	c,-10
 149+ C1B8 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 150+ C1BB 3E 2E                                ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
 151+ C1BD 12                                   ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
 152+ C1BE 13                                   inc		de						; with just an inc De
 153+ C1BF 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 154+ C1C1 18 D9                                jr		MPM_Num1
 155+ C1C3 3E 2F        .NumLeadBlank1:	        ld	a,'0'-1
 156+ C1C5 3C           .NumLeadBlank2:	        inc	a
 157+ C1C6 09                                   add	hl,bc
 158+ C1C7 38 FC                                jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
 159+ C1C9 FE 30                                cp	'0'
 160+ C1CB 20 02                                jr	nz,.DontBlank
 161+ C1CD 3E 20        .Blank:                 ld	a,' '
 162+ C1CF ED 42        .DontBlank:	            sbc	hl,bc
 163+ C1D1 12                                   ld	(de),a
 164+ C1D2 13                                   inc	de
 165+ C1D3 C9                                   ret
 166+ C1D4              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 167+ C1D4 FE 00        MPM_DispQtyAtoDE:       cp	0
 168+ C1D6 28 30                                jr	z,.NoStock
 169+ C1D8 26 00                                ld h,0
 170+ C1DA 6F                                   ld l,a
 171+ C1DB 01 9C FF                             ld	bc,-100
 172+ C1DE CD F7 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 173+ C1E1 FE 20        .WasLead0:              cp      ' '
 174+ C1E3 20 09                                jr      nz,.NotHundredsZero
 175+ C1E5 0E F6                                ld	c,-10
 176+ C1E7 CD F7 C1                             call	.NumLeadBlank1
 177+ C1EA 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 178+ C1EC 18 AE                                jr		MPM_Num1
 179+ C1EE 0E F6        .NotHundredsZero:       ld	c,-10
 180+ C1F0 CD 9C C1                             call	MPM_Num1
 181+ C1F3 0E FF                                ld	c,-1
 182+ C1F5 18 A5                                jr		MPM_Num1
 183+ C1F7 3E 2F        .NumLeadBlank1:	        ld	a,'0'-1
 184+ C1F9 3C           .NumLeadBlank2:	        inc	a
 185+ C1FA 09                                   add	hl,bc
 186+ C1FB 38 FC                                jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
 187+ C1FD FE 30                                cp	'0'
 188+ C1FF 20 02                                jr	nz,.DontBlank
 189+ C201 3E 20        .Blank:                 ld	a,' '
 190+ C203 ED 42        .DontBlank:	            sbc	hl,bc
 191+ C205 12                                   ld	(de),a
 192+ C206 13                                   inc	de
 193+ C207 C9                                   ret
 194+ C208 3E 20        .NoStock:               ld	a,' '
 195+ C20A 12                                   ld	(de),a
 196+ C20B 13                                   inc	de
 197+ C20C 12                                   ld	(de),a
 198+ C20D 13                                   inc	de
 199+ C20E 3E 2D                                ld	a,'-'
 200+ C210 12                                   ld	(de),a
 201+ C211 13                                   inc de
 202+ C212 C9                                   ret
 203+ C213              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 204+ C213              MPM_print_boiler_text:  INCLUDE "Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm"
# file opened: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
   1++C213
   2++C213              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C213 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C214 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C215 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C216 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C217 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C218 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C219 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C21A 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C21B 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C21C E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C21D EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C21E 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C220 C5                                   push		bc
  16++C221 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C222                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C222 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C226 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C229 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C22A C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C22B 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C22D C9                                   ret
  23++C22E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm
 205+ C22E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 247+ C28B F5           PrintMarketItem:        push     af

 249+ C28F 57                                   ld      d,a                 ; .

 251+ C292 ED 30                                mul                         ; .
 252+ C294 53                                   ld      d,e                 ; .

 396+ C43C 3E 4C        mkt_DownPressed:        ld      a,c_Pressed_CursorDown
