1275+ FC28 21 95 F5     l2_draw_6502_line:      ld      hl,x1                           ; copy from currnet position to 6502 variables
1276+ FC2B 11 E5 F0                             ld      de,XX1510
1277+ FC2E 01 08 00                             ld      bc,4*2
1278+ FC31 ED B0                                ldir
1279+ FC33 CD D5 F2                             call    LL145_6502                      ; perform 6502 version
1280+ FC36 D8                                   ret     c                               ; returns if carry is set as its a no draw
1281+ FC37 21 00 00     .CopyBackResults:       ld      hl,0
1282+ FC3A 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl
1283+ FC3D 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl
1284+ FC40 22 99 F5                             ld      (x2),hl
1285+ FC43 22 9B F5                             ld      (y2),hl
1286+ FC46 3A E5 F0                             ld      a,(XX1510)
1287+ FC49 32 95 F5                             ld      (x1),a
1288+ FC4C 4F                                   ld      c,a
1289+ FC4D 3A E6 F0                             ld      a,(XX1510+1)
1290+ FC50 32 97 F5                             ld      (y1),a
1291+ FC53 47                                   ld      b,a
1292+ FC54 3A E7 F0                             ld      a,(XX1510+2)
1293+ FC57 32 99 F5                             ld      (x2),a
1294+ FC5A 5F                                   ld      e,a
1295+ FC5B 3A E8 F0                             ld      a,(XX1510+3)
1296+ FC5E 32 9B F5                             ld      (y2),a
1297+ FC61 57                                   ld      d,a
1298+ FC62 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
1299+ FC64                                      ClearCarryFlag
1299+ FC64 B7          >                        or a
1300+ FC65 C9                                   ret
1301+ FC66                                 ;     call    l2_draw_clipped_line
1302+ FC66              ;                        call    l2_draw_diagonal                ; ">l2_draw_diagonal, bc = y0,x0 de=y1,x1,a=color) Thsi version performs a pre sort based on y axis"
1303+ FC66              ;................................................................
1304+ FC66 00 00        result                  dw      0
1305+ FC68              ;    swap = 0;
1306+ FC68              ;    if (y1 > y2)
1307+ FC68 2A 97 F5     l2_draw_elite_line:     ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 > y2)
1308+ FC6B ED 5B 9B F5                          ld      de,(y2)                         ; .
1309+ FC6F CD 3C 98                             call    CompareHLDESgn                  ; .
1310+ FC72 DA 78 FC                             jp      c,.NoSwapCoords                 ;
1311+ FC75              ;        swapp1p2();
1312+ FC75 CD D6 F5     .SwapCoords:            call    SwapCoords                      ;       swap them so y1 <= y2
1313+ FC78 2A 95 F5     .NoSwapCoords:          ld      hl,(x1)                         ; hl = x1
1314+ FC7B ED 5B 99 F5                          ld      de,(x2)                         ; de = x2
1315+ FC7F ED 4B 97 F5                          ld      bc,(y1)                         ; bc = y1
1316+ FC83 DD 2A 9B F5                          ld      ix,(y2)                         ; ix = y2
1317+ FC87              .CheckForVertical:
1318+ FC87              .CheckForHorizontal:
1319+ FC87 FD 26 80                             ld      iyh,128                         ; iyh = xx13 = 128
1320+ FC8A              ;    xx13 = 128;
1321+ FC8A              ;    if (x2 >= 0 && x2 <= 255 && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= 127)
1322+ FC8A 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ; if (x2 >= 0 && x2 <= 255 && y2 >= 0 && y2 <= 127)
1323+ FC8B DD B4                                or      ixh                             ; .  [if x2 and y2 > 255 goto point2clip]
1324+ FC8D 20 09                                jr      nz,.Point2Clip                  ; .  .
1325+ FC8F DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl                           ; .  [if y2 low > 127 goto point2clip]
1326+ FC91 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ; .  .
1327+ FC93 20 03                                jr      nz,.Point2Clip                  ; .  .
1328+ FC95              ;        xx13 = 0;
1329+ FC95 FD 26 00     .Point2NoClip:          ld      iyh,0                           ;       iyh = xx13 = 0
1330+ FC98              ;    if (x1 >= 0 && x1 <= 255 && y1 >= 0 && y1 <= 127)
1331+ FC98 7C           .Point2Clip:            ld      a,h                             ; if (x1 >= 0 && x1 <= 255 && y1 >= 0 && y1 <= 127)
1332+ FC99 B0                                   or      b                               ; . [ if x1 or y1 > 255 goto clip needed]
1333+ FC9A C2 AB FC                             jp      nz,.ClipNeeded                  ; .
1334+ FC9D CB 79                                bit     7,c                             ; . [ if y1 low > 127 goto clip needed]
1335+ FC9F C2 AB FC                             jp      nz,.ClipNeeded                  ; .
1336+ FCA2              ;        if (xx13 != 0)
1337+ FCA2 FD 7C        .ClipPoint1:            ld      a,iyh                           ;       if (xx13 = 0)
1338+ FCA4 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1339+ FCA5 CA A2 FD                             jp      z,.ClipComplete                 ;               clipping not needed so treat as done an ddraw the line
1340+ FCA8 FD 26 40                             ld      iyh,64                          ;       else xx13 = 64 (xx13 /2 but if xx13 is 0 it never hits here so can just set to 64)
1341+ FCAB              ;.......................LL138
1342+ FCAB FD 7C        .ClipNeeded:            ld      a,iyh                           ; if (xx13 == 128)
1343+ FCAD CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ; . [ jump if bit 7 is not set so <> 128]
1344+ FCAF CA E8 FC                             jp      z,.xx13Not128                   ; .
1345+ FCB2 7C           .xx13Is128:             ld      a,h                             ;       if (x1 < 0 && x2 < 0)
1346+ FCB3 A2                                   and     d                               ;       . [ x1 and x2 high bits 7 are both set then its off to the left]
1347+ FCB4 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1348+ FCB5 78                                   ld      a,b                             ;       if (y1 < 0 && y2 < 0)
1349+ FCB6 DD A4                                and     ixh                             ;       . [ y1 and y2 high bits 7 are both set then its off the top]
1350+ FCB8 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1351+ FCB9 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ;       if (x1 > 255  && x2 > 255)
1352+ FCBA CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       . [test if x1 is negative and if so skip]
1353+ FCBC C2 CB FC                             jp      nz,.x1x2LessThan256             ;       .
1354+ FCBF A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if x1 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1355+ FCC0 CA CB FC                             jp      z,.x1x2LessThan256              ;       .
1356+ FCC3 7A                                   ld      a,d                             ;       . [test if x2 is negative]
1357+ FCC4 CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       .
1358+ FCC6 C2 CB FC                             jp      nz,.x1x2LessThan256             ;       . < can simplify with with an xor test to detect if opposite signs first >
1359+ FCC9 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if x2 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1360+ FCCA C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               return
1361+ FCCB 78           .x1x2LessThan256:       ld      a,b                             ;       if (y1 > 127  && y2 > 127)
1362+ FCCC CB 7F                                bit     7,a                             ;       . [test if y1 is negative]
1363+ FCCE C2 E8 FC                             jp      nz,.y1y2LessThan128             ;       .
1364+ FCD1 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y1 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1365+ FCD2 CA E8 FC                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1366+ FCD5 CB 79                                bit     7,c                             ;       . [ if y1 low bit 7 is set then its > 127]
1367+ FCD7 CA E8 FC                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1368+ FCDA DD 7C                                ld      a,ixh                           ;       . [test if y2 is negative]
1369+ FCDC A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1370+ FCDD FA E8 FC                             jp      m,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1371+ FCE0 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y2 is not negative then if high has any value its > 256]
1372+ FCE1 CA E8 FC                             jp      z,.y1y2LessThan128              ;       .
1373+ FCE4 DD 7D                                ld      a,ixl                           ;       .
1374+ FCE6 A7                                   and     a                               ;       . [ if y2 low bit 7 is set then its > 127]
1375+ FCE7 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               return
1376+ FCE8              ;.......................LL115
1377+ FCE8              .xx13Not128:                        // check right point
1378+ FCE8 EB           .y1y2LessThan128:       ex      de,hl                           ; delta_x = x2 - x1;
1379+ FCE9                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1379+ FCE9 B7          >                        or a
1380+ FCEA ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1381+ FCEC 22 BF F5                             ld      (delta_x),hl                    ; redundant as its in DE TODO OPTIMISE
1382+ FCEF EB                                   ex      de,hl                           ; de = delta_x for next bit
1383+ FCF0 DD E5 E1     .DyEquY2MinusY1:        ld      hl,ix                           ; delta_y = y2 - y1;
1384+ FCF3                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1384+ FCF3 B7          >                        or a
1385+ FCF4 ED 42                                sbc     hl,bc                           ; .
1386+ FCF6 22 C1 F5                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; . [ so now de = dx and hl = dy]
1387+ FCF9 FD 2E 80                             ld      iyl,128                         ; assuming sign is iyl is positive dx dy
1388+ FCFC CB 7A        .SignDeltaXY:           bit     7,d                             ; if delta x is negative (delta y will always be positive)
1389+ FCFE CA 0A FD                             jp      z,.DeltaXPositive               ; .
1390+ FD01 FD 2E 00     .DeltaXNegative:        ld      iyl,0                           ;       so we set sign to 0
1391+ FD04                                      macronegate16de                         ;       and set delta x to |delta x|
1391+ FD04 AF          >					xor 	a
1391+ FD05 93          >                    sub 	e
1391+ FD06 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1391+ FD07 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1391+ FD08 92          >                    sub 	d
1391+ FD09 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1392+ FD0A ED 53 BF F5  .DeltaXPositive:        ld      (delta_x),de                    ;       .
1393+ FD0E              ;.......................Scale down DY and DY to 7 bit
1394+ FD0E 7C           .ScaleDXDY:             ld      a,h                             ; scale down so that dx and dx are < 256
1395+ FD0F B2                                   or      d                               ; .
1396+ FD10 CA 1E FD                             jp      z,.ScaleDXDYHighDone            ; .
1397+ FD13                                      ShiftDERight1                           ; .
1397+ FD13 CB 3A       >			   srl d
1397+ FD15 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
1398+ FD17                                      ShiftHLRight1                           ; .
1398+ FD17 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1398+ FD19 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1399+ FD1B C3 0E FD                             jp      .ScaleDXDY                      ; .
1400+ FD1E 7B           .ScaleDXDYHighDone:     ld      a,e                             ; because of signed maths we will scale down to 7 bits to be safe
1401+ FD1F B5                                   or      l                               ; .
1402+ FD20 F2 2B FD                             jp      p,.LowScaleDone                 ; .
1403+ FD23                                      ShiftDERight1                           ; .
1403+ FD23 CB 3A       >			   srl d
1403+ FD25 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
1404+ FD27                                      ShiftHLRight1                           ; .
1404+ FD27 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1404+ FD29 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1405+ FD2B              ;.......................Work out slope and gradient - later on we will work with deltax beign abs
1406+ FD2B ED 53 BF F5  .LowScaleDone:          ld      (delta_x),de                    ; save adjusted dx and dy back
1407+ FD2F 22 C1 F5                             ld      (delta_y),hl                    ; .
1408+ FD32 55                                   ld      d,l                             ; now d = dy e = dx
1409+ FD33 ED 53 C3 F5                          ld      (delta_y_x),de                  ; save for diagnostics
1410+ FD37              .SetUpTSlope:           ZeroA                                   ; Initialise tSlope to 0
1410+ FD37 AF          >                        xor a
1411+ FD38 32 CD F5                             ld      (tSlope),a                      ; .
1412+ FD3B 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; a = dx
1413+ FD3C                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, .deltaxGTEdeltaY     ; if dx < dy
1413+ FD3C BA          >                        cp     d
1413+ FD3D D2 50 FD    >                        jp		nc,.deltaxGTEdeltaY
1414+ FD40 43           .deltaXLTdeltaY:        ld      b,e                             ;       bc = dx $00
1415+ FD41 0E 00                                ld      c,0                             ;       .
1416+ FD43 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = $00 dy
1417+ FD44 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1418+ FD46 CD 0F 96                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;       bc = bc / de  (dx * 256 / dy)
1419+ FD49 ED 43 CB F5                          ld      (gradient),bc                   ;       in reality this is 8 bit little endian
1420+ FD4D C3 61 FD                             jp      .donedxdycheck                  ;       .
1421+ FD50                                                                              ; else
1422+ FD50 42           .deltaxGTEdeltaY:       ld      b,d                             ;       bc = dy << 0
1423+ FD51 0E 00                                ld      c,0                             ;       .
1424+ FD53 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       de = 0dx
1425+ FD55 CD 0F 96                             call    Floor_DivQ                      ;       bc = bc / de (dy * 256 / dx)
1426+ FD58 ED 43 CB F5                          ld      (gradient),bc                   ;       in reality this is 8 bit little endian
1427+ FD5C 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set tslope to -1
1428+ FD5E 32 CD F5                             ld      (tSlope),a                      ;       .
1429+ FD61              .donedxdycheck:                 // CHECK CORRECT POINT
1430+ FD61              ;.......................Clipping point 1
1431+ FD61                                      ;break
1432+ FD61 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                           ; if xx13 = 0 or xx13 = 128 (values can be 0, 128, 64 later we can optimise to see if its <> 64)
1433+ FD63 A7                                   and     a                               ; . [xx13 = 0  enter the block]
1434+ FD64 CA 6A FD                             jp      z,.xx13is0or128                 ; .
1435+ FD67 F2 8B FD                             jp      p,.xx13not0or128                ; . [xx13 <> 128 then skip block]
1436+ FD6A CD A8 FD     .xx13is0or128:          call    ClipLL118Elite                  ;       clip point 1
1437+ FD6D FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh                           ;       if xx13 <> 0
1438+ FD6F A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1439+ FD70 CA 87 FD                             jp      z,.ImmediateDraw                ;       .
1440+ FD73 3A 96 F5                             ld      a,(x1+1)                        ;               if (if (x1 <0 || x1 > 255 || y1 <0 || y1 > 127)) return
1441+ FD76 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1442+ FD77 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [x1 high is negative then return]
1443+ FD78 C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if x1 high is not zero, x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1444+ FD79 3A 98 F5                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ;               . [a = x1 high]
1445+ FD7C A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1446+ FD7D F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 negative return]
1447+ FD7E C0                                   ret     nz                              ;               . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1448+ FD7F 3A 97 F5                             ld      a,(y1)                          ;               . [a = y1 low]
1449+ FD82 A7                                   and     a                               ;               .
1450+ FD83 F8                                   ret     m                               ;               . [if y1 > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1451+ FD84 C3 8B FD                             jp      .SkipCheckP1OnScreen            ;               else goto SkipCheckP1OnScreen
1452+ FD87              .ImmediateDraw:         IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
1453+ FD87 CD A3 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line            ;        else if we get here we only needed to clip one point so draw the line
1454+ FD8A                                      ENDIF
1455+ FD8A C9                                   ret                                     ;             and we are done
1456+ FD8B              .xx13not0or128:
1457+ FD8B CD D6 F5     .SkipCheckP1OnScreen:   call    SwapCoords                      ; swap point 1 and point 2 so we can now process P2
1458+ FD8E CD A8 FD                             call    ClipLL118Elite                  ; clip P2
1459+ FD91 3A 96 F5                             ld      a,(x1+1)                        ; if (x1 <0 || x1 > 255 || y1 <0 || y1 > 127) return
1460+ FD94 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1461+ FD95 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if x1 negative return]
1462+ FD96 C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if x1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1463+ FD97 3A 98 F5                             ld      a,(y1+1)                        ; . [a = y1 high]
1464+ FD9A A7                                   and     a                               ;
1465+ FD9B F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 negative return]
1466+ FD9C C0                                   ret     nz                              ; . [if y1 > 255 return (above will have sorted negative test on bit 7)]
1467+ FD9D 3A 97 F5                             ld      a,(y1)                          ; . [a = y1 low]
1468+ FDA0 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1469+ FDA1 F8                                   ret     m                               ; . [if y1 low > 127 then low byte would appear as negative in bit 7]
1470+ FDA2              .ClipComplete:
1471+ FDA2              .xx13is0or128Draw:      IFDEF SPLITORLINEX
1472+ FDA2 CD A3 F6                             call    l2_draw_clipped_line            ; if we get here we only needed to clip one point/have done all slipping needed
1473+ FDA5                                      ENDIF
1474+ FDA5 C9                                   ret
1475+ FDA6              ;................................................................
1476+ FDA6 00 00        ClipSign                dw      0
1477+ FDA8              ClipLL118Elite:        ;break
1478+ FDA8 2A 95 F5     .checkX1IsNegative      ld      hl,(x1)                         ; if x1 is negative
1479+ FDAB CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1480+ FDAD CA CC FD                             jp      z,.x1GTE0                       ; .
1481+ FDB0 3E FF        .x1LT0:                 ld      a,255                           ;       clip sign = -1
1482+ FDB2 32 A6 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1483+ FDB5 CD 34 FE                             call    CalcLL120                       ;       calc ll120
1484+ FDB8 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       x1 = 0
1485+ FDBB 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1486+ FDBE 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;       y1 = y1 + result
1487+ FDC1 ED 5B 66 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]
1488+ FDC5 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1489+ FDC6 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1490+ FDC9 C3 E9 FD                             jp      .checkY1IsNegative              ;       .
1491+ FDCC 7C           .x1GTE0:                ld      a,h                             ; else
1492+ FDCD A7                                   and     a                               ;       if x1 > 255
1493+ FDCE CA E9 FD                             jp      z,.checkY1IsNegative            ;       .
1494+ FDD1                                      ZeroA                                   ;               sign must be 0 for postive adjustment
1494+ FDD1 AF          >                        xor a
1495+ FDD2 32 A6 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;               .
1496+ FDD5 CD 34 FE                             call    CalcLL120                       ;               Calc LL120
1497+ FDD8 21 FF 00                             ld      hl,255                          ;               x1 = 255
1498+ FDDB 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;               .
1499+ FDDE 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ;               y1 = y1 + result
1500+ FDE1 ED 5B 66 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;               . [and save in hl for optimisation processing y1]
1501+ FDE5 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;               .
1502+ FDE6 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;               .
1503+ FDE9                                                                              ; end if
1504+ FDE9 2A 97 F5     .checkY1IsNegative:     ld      hl,(y1)                         ; if (y1 <0) [if we don;t need to clip x1 then we need to load hl with y1 as it never got loaded]
1505+ FDEC CB 7C                                bit     7,h                             ; .
1506+ FDEE CA 0A FE                             jp      z,.checkY1LT128                 ; .
1507+ FDF1 3E FF                                ld      a,255                           ;       set sign to -1 for calc
1508+ FDF3 32 A6 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ;       .
1509+ FDF6 CD 81 FE                             call    CalcLL123                       ;       calc LL123
1510+ FDF9 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ;       x1 = x1 + result
1511+ FDFC ED 5B 66 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ;       .
1512+ FE00 19                                   add     hl,de                           ;       .
1513+ FE01 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ;       .
1514+ FE04 21 00 00                             ld      hl,0                            ;       y1 = 0
1515+ FE07 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ;       .
1516+ FE0A 7C           .checkY1LT128:          ld      a,h                             ; finished if y < 128
1517+ FE0B A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1518+ FE0C C2 12 FE                             jp      nz,.mopUpY1                     ; . [jump to mop up if y1 high <> 0, wehave already dealt with negatvies so don't need to consider that]
1519+ FE0F 7D                                   ld      a,l                             ; . [now check y1 low and return if y1 low > 127]
1520+ FE10 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1521+ FE11 F0                                   ret     p                               ; . [ if y1 low was positive then we are done as it means y1 < 128]
1522+ FE12 11 80 00     .mopUpY1:               ld      de,128                          ; y1 = y1 - 128
1523+ FE15                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; .
1523+ FE15 B7          >                        or a
1524+ FE16 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                           ; .
1525+ FE18 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1526+ FE1B                                      ZeroA                                   ; set clip sign to 0
1526+ FE1B AF          >                        xor a
1527+ FE1C 32 A6 FD                             ld      (ClipSign),a                    ; to get to here if y1 < 0, y is set to 0, if its < 128 then it never reaches here, so y1 must be > 128 to get here
1528+ FE1F CD 81 FE                             call    CalcLL123                       ; calc LL123
1529+ FE22 2A 95 F5                             ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1 = x1 + result
1530+ FE25 ED 5B 66 FC                          ld      de,(result)                     ; .
1531+ FE29 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; .
1532+ FE2A 22 95 F5                             ld      (x1),hl                         ; .
1533+ FE2D 21 7F 00                             ld      hl,127                          ; y1 = 127
1534+ FE30 22 97 F5                             ld      (y1),hl                         ; .
1535+ FE33 C9                                   ret
1536+ FE34
1537+ FE34 2A 95 F5     CalcLL120:              ld      hl,(x1)                         ; x1= |x1|
1538+ FE37                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1538+ FE37 CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1538+ FE39 CA 42 FE    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1538+ FE3C AF          >					xor 	a
1538+ FE3D 95          >					sub 	l
1538+ FE3E 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1538+ FE3F 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1538+ FE40 94          >					sub 	h
1538+ FE41 67          >					ld 		h,a
1538+ FE42             >.alreadyABS:
1539+ FE42 3A CD F5                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if (tslope == 0)
1540+ FE45 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1541+ FE46 C2 65 FE                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1542+ FE49 55           .tSlopeZero:            ld      d,l                             ;       d = x1 & 255
1543+ FE4A 3A CB F5                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1544+ FE4D 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;
1545+ FE4E ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = x1 & 255 * gradient
1546+ FE50 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = x1 * gradient /256
1547+ FE51 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1548+ FE53 3A A6 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1549+ FE56 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1550+ FE57 CA 60 FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeZeroDone               ;       .
1551+ FE5A              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16de                         ;               result = - result
1551+ FE5A AF          >					xor 	a
1551+ FE5B 93          >                    sub 	e
1551+ FE5C 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1551+ FE5D 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1551+ FE5E 92          >                    sub 	d
1551+ FE5F 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1552+ FE60 ED 53 66 FC  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),de                     ;
1553+ FE64 C9                                   ret                                     ;
1554+ FE65              .tSlopeNonZero:         ;ld      a,(gradient)                    ; else  c = gradient
1555+ FE65                                      ;ld      c,a                             ;       .
1556+ FE65                                      ;ld      a,l                             ;       a = x1 & 255
1557+ FE65                                      ;call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = a * 256/c
1558+ FE65
1559+ FE65 ED 5B CB F5                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1560+ FE69 45                                   ld      b,l
1561+ FE6A 0E 00                                ld      c,0
1562+ FE6C                                      ;; CORRECTED TO LADO INTO B ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1563+ FE6C CD 0F 96                             call    Floor_DivQ
1564+ FE6F
1565+ FE6F 3A A6 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1566+ FE72 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1567+ FE73 CA 7C FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;       .
1568+ FE76              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16bc                         ;               result = - result
1568+ FE76 AF          >					xor 	a
1568+ FE77 91          >                    sub 	c
1568+ FE78 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1568+ FE79 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1568+ FE7A 90          >                    sub 	b
1568+ FE7B 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1569+ FE7C ED 43 66 FC  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),bc
1570+ FE80 C9                                   ret
1571+ FE81              ;.......................LL123
1572+ FE81              CalcLL123:              ;break
1573+ FE81 2A 97 F5                             ld      hl,(y1)                         ; hl = |y1|
1574+ FE84                                      macroAbsHL                              ; .
1574+ FE84 CB 7C       >                    bit     7,h
1574+ FE86 CA 8F FE    >                    jp      z,.alreadyABS
1574+ FE89 AF          >					xor 	a
1574+ FE8A 95          >					sub 	l
1574+ FE8B 6F          >					ld 		l,a
1574+ FE8C 9F          >					sbc 	a,a
1574+ FE8D 94          >					sub 	h
1574+ FE8E 67          >					ld 		h,a
1574+ FE8F             >.alreadyABS:
1575+ FE8F 3A CD F5                             ld      a,(tSlope)                      ; if tSlope = 0
1576+ FE92 A7                                   and     a                               ; .
1577+ FE93 C2 B1 FE                             jp      nz,.tSlopeNonZero               ; .
1578+ FE96              .tSlopeZero:           ; ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       c = gradient
1579+ FE96              ;                        ld      c,a                             ;       .
1580+ FE96              ;                        ld      a,l                             ;       hl = y1 (which is now abs and < 256)
1581+ FE96              ;                        call    DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC             ;       bc = A * 256 / c
1582+ FE96 ED 5B CB F5                          ld      de,(gradient)                   ; BC = BC / DE
1583+ FE9A 44 4D                                ld      bc,hl                           ; HL = BC % DE
1584+ FE9C CD 0F 96                             call    Floor_DivQ
1585+ FE9F 3A A6 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1586+ FEA2 A7                                   and     a                               ;       .
1587+ FEA3 CA AC FE                             jp      z, .tSlopeZeroDone              ;       .
1588+ FEA6              .tSlopeZeroNegate:      macronegate16bc                         ;               result = -result
1588+ FEA6 AF          >					xor 	a
1588+ FEA7 91          >                    sub 	c
1588+ FEA8 4F          >                    ld 		c,a
1588+ FEA9 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1588+ FEAA 90          >                    sub 	b
1588+ FEAB 47          >                    ld 		b,a
1589+ FEAC ED 43 66 FC  .tSlopeZeroDone:        ld      (result),bc                     ;       . save result in either case
1590+ FEB0 C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1591+ FEB1 55           .tSlopeNonZero:         ld      d,l                             ; else  d = |y1| low
1592+ FEB2 3A CB F5                             ld      a,(gradient)                    ;       e = gradient
1593+ FEB5 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ;       .
1594+ FEB6 ED 30                                mul     de                              ;       de = l * gradient
1595+ FEB8 5A                                   ld      e,d                             ;       de = l * gradient /256
1596+ FEB9 16 00                                ld      d,0                             ;       .
1597+ FEBB 3A A6 FD                             ld      a,(ClipSign)                    ;       if clipsign != 0
1598+ FEBE A7                                   and     a                               ;
1599+ FEBF CA C8 FE                             jp      z,.tSlopeNonZeroDone            ;
1600+ FEC2              .tSlopeNonZeroNegate:   macronegate16de                         ;               result = -result
1600+ FEC2 AF          >					xor 	a
1600+ FEC3 93          >                    sub 	e
1600+ FEC4 5F          >                    ld 		e,a
1600+ FEC5 9F          >                    sbc 	a,a
1600+ FEC6 92          >                    sub 	d
1600+ FEC7 57          >                    ld 		d,a
1601+ FEC8 ED 53 66 FC  .tSlopeNonZeroDone:     ld      (result),de                     ;       . save result in either case
1602+ FECC C9                                   ret                                     ;       .
1603+ FECD
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_any_line.asm
1235  FECD                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm
   1+ FECD              ; ClearLines (LL155)
   2+ FECD              ;   y = 0
   3+ FECD              ; 	XX20 = UbnkEdgeHeapSize
   4+ FECD              ;   exit if XX20 < 4
   5+ FECD              ;   ++y
   6+ FECD              ;   do
   7+ FECD              ;		X1 = XX19(Y) ;	Y1 = XX19(++Y) ;	X2 = XX19(++Y);	Y2 = XX19(++Y)
   8+ FECD              ;   	call DrawLine (x1,y1 to x2,y2) two's compliment (we will do 0)
   9+ FECD              ;		++y
  10+ FECD              ;	until Y > XX20
  11+ FECD
  12+ FECD              clearLines:
  13+ FECD              layer2_clearLines:
  14+ FECD 3A EA C3     LL155cl:                ld		a,(UbnkLineArrayLen)
  15+ FED0 47                                   ld		b,a
  16+ FED1 21 30 C2                             ld		hl,UbnkLineArray
  17+ FED4 C5           clearLinesLoop:         push	bc
  18+ FED5 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  19+ FED6 23                                   inc		hl
  20+ FED7 4F                                   ld		c,a
  21+ FED8 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  22+ FED9 23                                   inc		hl
  23+ FEDA 47                                   ld		b,a
  24+ FEDB 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  25+ FEDC 23                                   inc		hl
  26+ FEDD 5F                                   ld		e,a
  27+ FEDE 7E                                   ld		a,(hl)
  28+ FEDF 23                                   inc		hl
  29+ FEE0 57                                   ld		d,a
  30+ FEE1 3E E3                                ld		a,COLOUR_TRANSPARENT		; we erase here
  31+ FEE3 E5                                   push	hl
  32+ FEE4 CD 68 F5                             call    l2_draw_any_line
  33+ FEE7 E1                                   pop		hl
  34+ FEE8 C1                                   pop		bc
  35+ FEE9 10 E9                                djnz	clearLinesLoop
  36+ FEEB C9                                   ret
  37+ FEEC
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/clearLines-LL155.asm
1236  FEEC                  INCLUDE "./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm
   1+ FEEC              ; ******************************************************************************
   2+ FEEC              ;
   3+ FEEC              ;	Draw a pixel line from (x0,y0) defined in (COORDS) - the current plot
   4+ FEEC              ;	coordinate, to the relative distance points (x0+x,y0+y).
   5+ FEEC              ;
   6+ FEEC              ;	Design & programming by Gunther Strube,	Copyright (C) InterLogic 1995
   7+ FEEC              ;
   8+ FEEC              ;	The (COORDS+0)	pointer contains the current y coordinate, (COORDS+1) the
   9+ FEEC              ;	current x coordinate. The main program should reset the (COORDS) variables
  10+ FEEC              ;	before using line drawing.
  11+ FEEC              ;
  12+ FEEC              ;	The routine checks the range of specified coordinates which is the
  13+ FEEC              ;	boundaries of the graphics area (256x64	pixels).
  14+ FEEC              ;	If a boundary error occurs the routine exits automatically.	This may be
  15+ FEEC              ;	useful if you are trying to draw a line longer than allowed. Only the
  16+ FEEC              ;	visible part will be drawn.
  17+ FEEC              ;
  18+ FEEC              ;	The hardware graphics memory is organized as (0,0) in the top left corner.
  19+ FEEC              ;
  20+ FEEC              ;	The plot routine is	defined by an address pointer	in IX.
  21+ FEEC              ;
  22+ FEEC              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
  23+ FEEC              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
  24+ FEEC              ;		IX =	pointer to plot routine that uses HL = (x,y)	of plot coordinate.
  25+ FEEC              ;
  26+ FEEC              ;	OUT:	None.
  27+ FEEC              ;
  28+ FEEC              ;	Registers	used	by routine:
  29+ FEEC              ;		   N	:	B, loop counter
  30+ FEEC              ;		   i	:	line	balance variable
  31+ FEEC              ;		   x	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  32+ FEEC              ;		   y	:	H/L,	horisontal, vertical distance	variables
  33+ FEEC              ;	  (x0,y0)	:	(h,l)
  34+ FEEC              ;	  direc_x	:	d, horisontal step increment
  35+ FEEC              ;	  direc_y	:	e, vertical step increment
  36+ FEEC              ;		 ddx	:	b, horisontal step increment
  37+ FEEC              ;		 ddy	:	c, vertical step increment
  38+ FEEC              ;
  39+ FEEC              ;		DE, A work registers.
  40+ FEEC              ;
  41+ FEEC              ; The algorithm in pseudo-code:
  42+ FEEC              ;
  43+ FEEC              ;	direc_x =	SGN x: direc_y	= SGN y
  44+ FEEC              ;	x = ABS x: y =	ABS y
  45+ FEEC              ;
  46+ FEEC              ;	if x	>= y
  47+ FEEC              ;		if x+y=0 then return
  48+ FEEC              ;		H = x
  49+ FEEC              ;		L = y
  50+ FEEC              ;		ddx = direc_x
  51+ FEEC              ;		ddy = 0
  52+ FEEC              ;	else
  53+ FEEC              ;		H = y
  54+ FEEC              ;		L = x
  55+ FEEC              ;		ddx = 0
  56+ FEEC              ;		ddy = direc_y
  57+ FEEC              ;	endif
  58+ FEEC              ;
  59+ FEEC              ;	B = H
  60+ FEEC              ;	i = INT(B/2)
  61+ FEEC              ;	FOR N=B TO 1 STEP -1
  62+ FEEC              ;		i = i + L
  63+ FEEC              ;		if i	< H
  64+ FEEC              ;			ix =	ddx
  65+ FEEC              ;			iy =	ddy
  66+ FEEC              ;		else
  67+ FEEC              ;			i = i - H
  68+ FEEC              ;			ix =	direc_x
  69+ FEEC              ;			iy =	direc_y
  70+ FEEC              ;		endif
  71+ FEEC              ;		x0 =	x0 +	ix
  72+ FEEC              ;		y0 =	y0 +	iy
  73+ FEEC              ;		plot	(x0,y0)
  74+ FEEC              ;	NEXT	N
  75+ FEEC              ;
  76+ FEEC              ;
  77+ FEEC              ;	Registers	changed after return:
  78+ FEEC              ;		..BCDEHL/IXIY/af......	same
  79+ FEEC              ;		AF....../..../..bcdehl	different
  80+ FEEC              ;
  81+ FEEC 00 00        line_gfx_coords         dw  0
  82+ FEEE
  83+ FEEE              LineHLtoDE:
  84+ FEEE 7C           TestMaxY:               ld	a,h ; were h = y or l = y?
  85+ FEEF FE C0                                cp	192
  86+ FEF1 30 26                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y0	coordinate out	of range
  87+ FEF3 7A                                   ld	a,d
  88+ FEF4 FE C0                                cp	192
  89+ FEF6 30 21                                jr	nc, exit_line		; y1	coordinate out	of range
  90+ FEF8 22 EC FE                             ld	(line_gfx_coords),hl		; the starting	point is now default
  91+ FEFB E5                                   push	hl
  92+ FEFC D5                                   push	de
  93+ FEFD 6C                                   ld	l,h				; L = x0
  94+ FEFE 62                                   ld	h,d				; H = x1
  95+ FEFF 7C           distanceX:		        ld	a,h
  96+ FF00 95                                   sub	l
  97+ FF01 6F                                   ld	l,a
  98+ FF02 26 00                                ld	h,0
  99+ FF04 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceXDone
 100+ FF06 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 101+ FF08 D1           distanceXDone:          pop	de
 102+ FF09 E3                                   ex	(sp),hl			; L = y0
 103+ FF0A 63                                   ld	h,e				; H = y1
 104+ FF0B 7C           distanceY:		        ld	a,h
 105+ FF0C 95                                   sub	l
 106+ FF0D 6F                                   ld	l,a
 107+ FF0E 26 00                                ld	h,0
 108+ FF10 30 02                                jr	nc, distanceYDone
 109+ FF12 26 FF                                ld	h,-1
 110+ FF14 D1           distanceYDone:          pop	de
 111+ FF15 EB                                   ex	de,hl			; h.dist.	= HL, v.dist. = DE
 112+ FF16 CD 1A FF                             call	DrawLineRelative			; draw line...
 113+ FF19 C9           exit_line:              ret
 114+ FF1A
 115+ FF1A              ; ***************************************************************************
 116+ FF1A              ;
 117+ FF1A              ;	IN:	HL =	move	relative x horisontal points (maximum +/- 255).
 118+ FF1A              ;		DE =	move	relative y vertical	points (maximum +/-	255).
 119+ FF1A              ;
 120+ FF1A              ; OUT: h - l distance in	HL
 121+ FF1A              ;
 122+ FF1A
 123+ FF1A D5           DrawLineRelative:       push	de
 124+ FF1B E5                                   push	hl
 125+ FF1C D9                                   exx
 126+ FF1D E1                                   pop	hl					; get relative	horisontal movement
 127+ FF1E CD 95 FF                             call	sgn
 128+ FF21 57                                   ld	d,a					; direc_x	= SGN(x) installed d = +/-1 for horizontal update
 129+ FF22 CD A2 FF                             call	absValue
 130+ FF25 45                                   ld	b,l					; x = ABS(x)
 131+ FF26 E1           DrawLineGetVertRelative:pop	hl					; get relative	vertical movement
 132+ FF27 CD 95 FF                             call	sgn
 133+ FF2A 5F                                   ld	e,a					; direc_y	= SGN(y) installed  = +/-1 for vertical update
 134+ FF2B CD A2 FF                             call	absValue
 135+ FF2E 4D                                   ld	c,l					; y = ABS(y) so now bc = dxdy
 136+ FF2F              ; so by here BC = dx dy HL in increment/decrement x y
 137+ FF2F C5                                   push	bc
 138+ FF30 D9                                   exx
 139+ FF31 E1                                   pop	hl					; H = absolute	x dist., L = absolute y distance
 140+ FF32 7C                                   ld	a,h
 141+ FF33 BD                                   cp	l
 142+ FF34 38 0A                                jr	c, x_smaller_y		; if	x >=	y
 143+ FF36 B4           areXandYZero:           or	h					;	if x+y = 0
 144+ FF37 28 5B                                jr	z, exit_draw		;		return
 145+ FF39 D9           y_lessorequal_x:        exx						;	else
 146+ FF3A 42                                   ld	b,d					;		ddx = direc_x
 147+ FF3B 0E 00                                ld	c,0					;		ddy = 0
 148+ FF3D D9                                   exx
 149+ FF3E 18 08                                jr	init_drawloop		; else
 150+ FF40 7C           x_smaller_y:	        ld	a,h
 151+ FF41 65                                   ld	h,l					;	H = y
 152+ FF42 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	L = x
 153+ FF43 D9                                   exx
 154+ FF44 06 00                                ld	b,0					;	ddx = 0
 155+ FF46 4B                                   ld	c,e					;	ddy = direc_y
 156+ FF47 D9                                   exx
 157+ FF48 44           init_drawloop:	        ld	b,h
 158+ FF49 4C                                   ld	c,h					; B = H
 159+ FF4A CB 39                                srl	c					; i = INT(B/2)
 160+ FF4C              										; FOR N=B	TO 1	STEP	-1
 161+ FF4C 79           drawloop:		        ld	a,c
 162+ FF4D 85                                   add	a,l
 163+ FF4E 38 09                                jr	c, i_greater		;	i + L > 255  (i > H)
 164+ FF50 BC                                   cp	h
 165+ FF51 30 06                                jr	nc, i_greater		;	if i	< H
 166+ FF53 4F                                   ld	c,a					;		i = i + L
 167+ FF54 D9                                   exx
 168+ FF55 C5                                   push	bc				;		ix =	ddx:	iy =	ddy
 169+ FF56 D9                                   exx
 170+ FF57 18 05                                jr	check_plot			;	else
 171+ FF59 94           i_greater:		        sub	h					;		i = i - H
 172+ FF5A 4F                                   ld	c,a
 173+ FF5B D9                                   exx
 174+ FF5C D5                                   push	de				;		ix =	direc_x: iy = direc_y
 175+ FF5D D9                                   exx						;	endif
 176+ FF5E E3           check_plot:		        ex	(sp),hl				;	preserve H,L distances on stack
 177+ FF5F EB                                   ex	de,hl				;	D,E = ix,	iy
 178+ FF60 2A EC FE                             ld	hl,(line_gfx_coords)
 179+ FF63 7D                                   ld	a,l
 180+ FF64 83                                   add	a,e					;
 181+ FF65 6F                                   ld	l,a					;	y0 =	y0 +	iy (y0 is	checked by plot)
 182+ FF66 7A                                   ld	a,d
 183+ FF67 3C                                   inc	a
 184+ FF68 84                                   add	a,h
 185+ FF69 38 04                                jr	c, check_range		;	check out	of range
 186+ FF6B 28 26                                jr	z, range_error		;	Fz=1	& Fc=0 denotes	x0 <	0
 187+ FF6D 18 02                                jr	plot_point
 188+ FF6F 20 22        check_range:            jr	nz, range_error	;	Fz=0	& Fc=1 denotes	x0 >	255
 189+ FF71
 190+ FF71 3D           plot_point:             dec	a
 191+ FF72 C5                                   push	bc
 192+ FF73 F5                                   push	af
 193+ FF74 47                                   ld	    b,a					;	x0 =	x0 +	ix
 194+ FF75 4D                                   ld		c,l
 195+ FF76 3A B5 E2                             ld		a,(line_gfx_colour)
 196+ FF79 ED 43 EC FE                          ld      (line_gfx_coords),bc
 197+ FF7D                                      l2_plot_macro; call	l2_plot_pixel:
 197+ FF7D 78          >                        ld      a,b
 197+ FF7E             >                        JumpIfAGTENusng 192 ,.NoPlot
 197+ FF7E FE C0       >                        cp     192
 197+ FF80 D2 8C FF    >                        jp		nc,.NoPlot
 197+ FF83 69          >                        ld      l,c
 197+ FF84 CD 68 E0    >                        call    asm_l2_row_bank_select
 197+ FF87 67          >                        ld      h,a
 197+ FF88 3A B5 E2    >                        ld      a,(line_gfx_colour)
 197+ FF8B 77          >                        ld      (hl),a
 197+ FF8C             >.NoPlot:
 198+ FF8C F1                                   pop		af
 199+ FF8D C1                                   pop		bc
 200+ FF8E E1           plot_RET:		        pop	hl					;	restore H,L distances...
 201+ FF8F 10 BB                                djnz	drawloop		; NEXT N
 202+ FF91 18 01                                jr	exit_draw
 203+ FF93
 204+ FF93 E1           range_error:	        pop	hl					; remove H,L distances...
 205+ FF94 C9           exit_draw:		        ret
 206+ FF95
 207+ FF95
 208+ FF95              ; ******************************************************************************
 209+ FF95              ;
 210+ FF95              ;	SGN (Signum value) of 16	bit signed integer.
 211+ FF95              ;
 212+ FF95              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 213+ FF95              ;	OUT:		A = result: 0,1,-1 (if zero, positive, negative)
 214+ FF95              ;
 215+ FF95              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 216+ FF95              ;	..BCDEHL/IXIY	same
 217+ FF95              ;	AF....../....	different
 218+ FF95              ;
 219+ FF95 7C           sgn:				    ld	a,h
 220+ FF96 B5                                   or	l
 221+ FF97 C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is zero, return 0...
 222+ FF98 CB 7C                                bit	7,h
 223+ FF9A 20 03                                jr	nz, negative_int
 224+ FF9C 3E 01                                ld	a,1
 225+ FF9E C9                                   ret
 226+ FF9F 3E FF        negative_int:		    ld	a,-1
 227+ FFA1 C9                                   ret
 228+ FFA2
 229+ FFA2
 230+ FFA2              ; ******************************************************************************
 231+ FFA2              ;
 232+ FFA2              ;	ABS (Absolute value) of 16 bit signed integer.
 233+ FFA2              ;
 234+ FFA2              ;	IN:		HL =	integer
 235+ FFA2              ;	OUT:		HL =	converted	integer
 236+ FFA2              ;
 237+ FFA2              ;	Registers	changed after return:
 238+ FFA2              ;	A.BCDE../IXIY	same
 239+ FFA2              ;	.F....HL/....	different
 240+ FFA2              ;
 241+ FFA2 CB 7C        absValue:			    bit	7,h
 242+ FFA4 C8                                   ret	z				; integer	is positive...
 243+ FFA5 D5                                   push	de
 244+ FFA6 EB                                   ex	de,hl
 245+ FFA7 21 00 00                             ld	hl,0
 246+ FFAA BF                                   cp	a				; Fc	= 0,	may not be used...
 247+ FFAB ED 52                                sbc	hl,de			; convert	negative integer
 248+ FFAD D1                                   pop	de
 249+ FFAE C9                                   ret
 250+ FFAF
# file closed: ./Layer2Graphics/l2_draw_line_v2.asm

1246  E0BA                  INCLUDE "./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm"
# file opened: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
   1+ E0BA              ; "l1 print char a = character, de = Ypixel Xchar of print"
   2+ E0BA D5 E5        l1_print_char:          push	de,,hl
   3+ E0BC ED 94                                pixelad								; hl = address of de
   4+ E0BE E5                                   push	hl							; save hl for loop
   5+ E0BF 26 00                                ld		h,0
   6+ E0C1 6F                                   ld		l,a
   7+ E0C2 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 2
   8+ E0C3 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 4
   9+ E0C4 29                                   add		hl,hl						; * 8 to get byte address
  10+ E0C5 ED 34 00 3C                          add		hl,charactersetaddr			; hl = address of rom char
  11+ E0C9 EB                                   ex		de,hl						; save address into de
  12+ E0CA E1                                   pop		hl							; get back hl for loop
  13+ E0CB 06 08                                ld		b,8							; do 8 rows
  14+ E0CD 1A           .PrintCharLoop:         ld		a,(de)						; row byte
  15+ E0CE 13                                   inc		de							; next byte
  16+ E0CF 77                                   ld		(hl),a						; poke to screen
  17+ E0D0 ED 93                                pixeldn								; Down 1 row
  18+ E0D2 10 F9                                djnz	.PrintCharLoop				; loop for 8 bytes
  19+ E0D4 E1 D1                                pop		de,,hl					    ; restore hl
  20+ E0D6 C9                                   ret
  21+ E0D7
  22+ E0D7              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  23+ E0D7              ; now skips ascii code < 32 but moves on cursor by 1 char
  24+ E0D7              l1_print_at:
  25+ E0D7 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
  26+ E0D8 FE 00                                cp		0
  27+ E0DA C8                                   ret		z
  28+ E0DB                                      CallIfAGTENusng " ", l1_print_char
  28+ E0DB FE 20       >                        cp      " "
  28+ E0DD D4 BA E0    >                        call	nc,l1_print_char
  29+ E0E0 23                                   inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  30+ E0E1 7B                                   ld		a,e
  31+ E0E2 C6 08                                add		a,8
  32+ E0E4 5F                                   ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  33+ E0E5 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
  34+ E0E7              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;pop		de                      ; TODO LOOOKS TO BE A ROGUE POPDE
  35+ E0E7 C9                                   ret
  36+ E0E8
  37+ E0E8              ;l1_print_at_wrap:
  38+ E0E8              ;; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
  39+ E0E8              ;	ld      iyh,e
  40+ E0E8              ;.PrintLoop:
  41+ E0E8              ;	ld		a,(hl)
  42+ E0E8              ;	cp		0
  43+ E0E8              ;	ret		z
  44+ E0E8              ;.CountWordCharLen
  45+ E0E8              ;; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
  46+ E0E8              ;; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
  47+ E0E8              ;; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
  48+ E0E8              ;
  49+ E0E8              ;
  50+ E0E8              ;    push    iy
  51+ E0E8              ;    call	l1_print_char
  52+ E0E8              ;    pop     iy
  53+ E0E8              ;	inc		hl							; move 1 message character right
  54+ E0E8              ;	ld		a,e
  55+ E0E8              ;    cp      238
  56+ E0E8              ;    jr      nc,.NextLine
  57+ E0E8              ;	add		a,8
  58+ E0E8              ;	ld		e,a							; move 1 screen character right
  59+ E0E8              ;	jr		.PrintLoop
  60+ E0E8              ;.Clearstackandfinish:
  61+ E0E8              ;	pop		de
  62+ E0E8              ;	ret
  63+ E0E8              ;.NextLine:
  64+ E0E8              ;    ld      a,(hl)
  65+ E0E8              ;    cp      " "
  66+ E0E8              ;    ld      e,iyh
  67+ E0E8              ;    ld      a,d
  68+ E0E8              ;    add     a,8
  69+ E0E8              ;    ld      d,a
  70+ E0E8              ;    jr		.PrintLoop
  71+ E0E8
  72+ E0E8              ; Counts next word at hl, uses e and forces a wrap if it would over flow puts value in c
  73+ E0E8 E5           L1LenWordAtHL:          push    hl
  74+ E0E9 D5                                   push    de
  75+ E0EA 7E           .CountLoop:             ld      a,(hl)
  76+ E0EB FE 00                                cp      0
  77+ E0ED 28 0F                                jr      z,.CountDone
  78+ E0EF FE 20                                cp      32
  79+ E0F1 28 0B                                jr      z,.CountDone
  80+ E0F3 7B                                   ld      a,e
  81+ E0F4 C6 08                                add     a,8
  82+ E0F6 5F                                   ld      e,a
  83+ E0F7 FE EE                                cp      238
  84+ E0F9 30 07                                jr      nc,.TooLong
  85+ E0FB 23                                   inc     hl
  86+ E0FC 18 EC                                jr      .CountLoop
  87+ E0FE D1           .CountDone:             pop     de
  88+ E0FF E1                                   pop     hl
  89+ E100 AF                                   xor     a
  90+ E101 C9                                   ret
  91+ E102 D1           .TooLong                pop     de
  92+ E103 E1                                   pop     hl
  93+ E104 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  94+ E106 C9                                   ret
  95+ E107
  96+ E107 7E           L1PrintWordAtHL:        ld      a,(hl)
  97+ E108 FE 00                                cp      0
  98+ E10A C8                                   ret     z
  99+ E10B FE 20                                cp      32
 100+ E10D 28 0F                                jr      z,.ItsASpace
 101+ E10F FD E5                                push    iy
 102+ E111 CD BA E0                             call	l1_print_char
 103+ E114 FD E1                                pop     iy
 104+ E116 7B                                   ld      a,e
 105+ E117 C6 08                                add     a,8
 106+ E119 5F                                   ld      e,a
 107+ E11A 23                                   inc     hl
 108+ E11B C3 07 E1                             jp      L1PrintWordAtHL
 109+ E11E 23           .ItsASpace:             inc     hl      ;  Just a bodge for now
 110+ E11F 7B                                   ld      a,e
 111+ E120 C6 08                                add     a,8
 112+ E122 5F                                   ld      e,a
 113+ E123 C9                                   ret
 114+ E124
 115+ E124
 116+ E124              ; "l1 PrintAt, pixel row, whole char col, DE = yx, HL = message Addr"
 117+ E124              ; Now has full word level wrapping
 118+ E124 FD 63        l1_print_at_wrap:       ld      iyh,e
 119+ E126 7E           .PrintLoop:             ld		a,(hl)
 120+ E127 FE 00                                cp		0
 121+ E129 C8                                   ret		z
 122+ E12A CD E8 E0     .CountWordCharLen:      call    L1LenWordAtHL
 123+ E12D FE FF                                cp      $FF
 124+ E12F 28 06                                jr      z,.WrapNextLine
 125+ E131 CD 07 E1     .NotTooLong:            call    L1PrintWordAtHL
 126+ E134              ; Need to change to word wrap, so it will loop through string as before
 127+ E134              ; but read up until a null or space, take the character count * 8 for pixels
 128+ E134              ; if that is > 238 then force a premature line wrap
 129+ E134 18 F0                                jr		.PrintLoop
 130+ E136              .Clearstackandfinish:   ;op		de
 131+ E136 C9                                   ret
 132+ E137              .WrapNextLine:
 133+ E137 FD 5C        .NextLine:              ld      e,iyh
 134+ E139 7A                                   ld      a,d
 135+ E13A C6 08                                add     a,8
 136+ E13C 57                                   ld      d,a
 137+ E13D 18 E7                                jr		.PrintLoop
 138+ E13F
 139+ E13F
# file closed: ./Layer1Graphics/layer1_print_at.asm
1247  E13F                  DISPLAY "Bank ",BankLAYER1," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-LAYER1Addr), " - BankLAYER1"
1248  E13F              ; Bank 59  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1249  E13F              ; In the first copy of the banks the "Non number" labels exist. They will map directly in other banks
1250  E13F              ; as the is aligned and data tables are after that
1251  E13F              ; need to make the ship index tables same size in each to simplify further
1252  E13F                  SLOT    ShipModelsAddr
1253  E13F                  PAGE    BankShipModels1
1254  E13F              	ORG     ShipModelsAddr, BankShipModels1
1255  E000                  INCLUDE "./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm"
# file opened: ./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm
   1+ E000              MShipBankTable          MACRO
   2+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels1
   3+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels2
   4+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels3
   5+ E000 ~                                    DW      BankShipModels4
   6+ E000                                      ENDM
   7+ E000              ; For ship number A fetch
   8+ E000              ;           the adjusted ship number in B , C = original number
   9+ E000              ;           bank number in A for the respective ship based on the ship table
  10+ E000              MGetShipBankId:         MACRO   banktable
  11+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,0
  12+ E000 ~                                    ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
  13+ E000 ~            .ShiftLoop:             srl     a
  14+ E000 ~                                    srl     a
  15+ E000 ~                                    srl     a
  16+ E000 ~                                    srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
  17+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
  18+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,c
  19+ E000 ~                                    ld      d,b
  20+ E000 ~                                    ld      e,16
  21+ E000 ~                                    mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
  22+ E000 ~                                    sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
  23+ E000 ~            .SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
  24+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
  25+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
  26+ E000 ~            ;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
  27+ E000 ~                                    ld      hl,banktable                        ; a= bank index
  28+ E000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  29+ E000 ~                                    add     hl,a
  30+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
  31+ E000 ~                                    ClearCarryFlag
  32+ E000 ~                                    ret
  33+ E000                                      ENDM
  34+ E000
  35+ E000              McopyVertsToUniverse:   MACRO
  36+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(VerticesAddyAddr)       ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  37+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullVerticies
  38+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  39+ E000 ~                                    ld			a,(VertexCtX6Addr)
  40+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  41+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  42+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  43+ E000 ~                                    ret
  44+ E000                                      ENDM
  45+ E000
  46+ E000              McopyEdgesToUniverse:   MACRO
  47+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(EdgeAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  48+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullEdges
  49+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  50+ E000 ~                                    ld			a,(LineX4Addr)
  51+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  52+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  53+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  54+ E000 ~                                    ret
  55+ E000                                      ENDM
  56+ E000
  57+ E000              McopyNormsToUniverse:   MACRO
  58+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,(FaceAddyAddr)          ; now the pointers are in Ubnk its easy to read
  59+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullNormals
  60+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,0
  61+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
  62+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,a
  63+ E000 ~                                    ex          de,hl                       ; dma transfer goes de -> hl i.e. opposite of ldir
  64+ E000 ~                                    call        memcopy_dma
  65+ E000 ~                                    ret
  66+ E000                                      ENDM
  67+ E000
  68+ E000              ; Passes in ship nbr in A and bank is part of MACRO
  69+ E000              MCopyShipToUniverse:    MACRO       banklabel
  70+ E000 ~                                    ld          hl,UBnkShipModelBank
  71+ E000 ~                                    ld          (hl),banklabel
  72+ E000 ~                                    push        af
  73+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,iyl
  74+ E000 ~                                    ld          (UBnKShipModelId),a
  75+ E000 ~                                    pop         af
  76+ E000 ~                                    ld          (UBnKShipModelNbr),a
  77+ E000 ~            .GetHullDataLength:     ld          hl,ShipModelSizeTable
  78+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a
  79+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a                        ; we won't multiply by 2 as GetInfo is a general purpose routines so would end up x 4
  80+ E000 ~                                    ld          c,(hl)
  81+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
  82+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,(hl)                      ; bc now equals length of data set
  83+ E000 ~            .GetHullDataAddress:    ld          hl,ShipModelTable
  84+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a
  85+ E000 ~                                    add         hl,a                        ; now hl = address of ship data value
  86+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,(hl)
  87+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
  88+ E000 ~                                    ld          h,(hl)
  89+ E000 ~                                    ld          l,a                         ; now hl = address of ship hull data
  90+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,UBnkHullCopy             ; Universe bank
  91+ E000 ~                                    ld          bc,ShipDataLength
  92+ E000 ~                                    ldir
  93+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyVertsToUniv
  94+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyEdgesToUniv
  95+ E000 ~                                    call        CopyNormsToUniv
  96+ E000 ~            .ClearName:             ld          hl,StartOfUnivName
  97+ E000 ~                                    ld          a," "
  98+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,16
  99+ E000 ~            .fillLoop:              ld          (hl),a
 100+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
 101+ E000 ~                                    djnz        .fillLoop
 102+ E000 ~            .SetName:               ld          a,(UBnKShipModelId)
 103+ E000 ~                                    call        ShipIndexToAddress
 104+ E000 ~                                    ld          de,StartOfUnivName
 105+ E000 ~                                    ld          b,16
 106+ E000 ~            .CopyLoop:              ld          a,(hl)
 107+ E000 ~                                    cp          0
 108+ E000 ~                                    jr          z,.CopyDone
 109+ E000 ~                                    ld          (de),a
 110+ E000 ~                                    inc         hl
 111+ E000 ~                                    inc         de
 112+ E000 ~                                    djnz        .CopyLoop
 113+ E000 ~            .CopyDone:              ret
 114+ E000                                      ENDM
 115+ E000
 116+ E000              MCopyBodyToUniverse:    MACRO       copyRoutine
 117+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,13
 118+ E000 ~                                    call        copyRoutine
 119+ E000 ~                                    ret
 120+ E000                                      ENDM
 121+ E000
 122+ E000
 123+ E000              MCopyShipIdToUniverse:  MACRO
 124+ E000 ~                                    call        GetShipModelId
 125+ E000 ~                                    MMUSelectShipBankA
 126+ E000 ~                                    ld          a,b
 127+ E000 ~                                    jp          CopyShipToUniverse
 128+ E000                                      ENDM
# file closed: ./Data/ShipModelMacros.asm

# file opened: ./Data/ships/Adder.asm
   1++E166 00           Adder:	                DB $00                              ; Number of cargo canisters released when destroyed
   2++E167 C4 09                                DW 50 * 50                          ; Ship's targetable area LoHi
   3++E169 F1 E1                                DW AdderEdges                       ; Edge Data
   4++E16B 74                                   DB AdderEdgesSize                   ; Size of Edge Data
   5++E16C 00                                   DB $00                              ; Gun Vertex Byte offset
   6++E16D 16                                   DB $16                              ; Explosion Count
   7++E16E 12                                   DB AdderVertSize / 6                ; Vertex Count /6
   8++E16F 6C                                   DB AdderVertSize                    ; Vertex Count
   9++E170 1D                                   DB AdderEdgesCnt                    ; Edges Count
  10++E171 28 00                                DW $0028                            ; Bounty LoHi
  11++E173 3C                                   DB AdderNormalsSize                 ; Face (Normal) Count
  12++E174 17                                   DB $17                              ; Range when it turns to a dot
  13++E175 48                                   DB $48                              ; Energy Max
  14++E176 18                                   DB $18                              ; Speed Max
  15++E177 65 E2                                DW AdderNormals                     ; Normals

   2++F180 90 7E                                DW $7E90                      ; Ship's targetable area LoHi

   4++F184 88                                   DB DodoEdgesSize              ; Size of Edge Data

   7++F187 18                                   DB DodoVertSize /6            ; Vertex Count /6

   9++F189 22                                   DB DodoEdgesCnt               ; Edges Count

  14++F18F 00                                   DB $00                        ; Speed Max

   1++C1F3
   2++C1F3              ;">print_boilder_text hl = text structure, b = message count"
   3++C1F3 C5           .BoilerTextLoop:        push		bc			; Save Message Count loop value
   4++C1F4 4E                                   ld			c,(hl)		; Get Row into b
   5++C1F5 23                                   inc			hl
   6++C1F6 46                                   ld			b,(hl)		; Get Col into b
   7++C1F7 23                                   inc			hl
   8++C1F8 5E                                   ld			e,(hl)		; Get text address Lo into E
   9++C1F9 23                                   inc			hl
  10++C1FA 56                                   ld			d,(hl)		; Get text address Hi into E
  11++C1FB 23                                   inc			hl
  12++C1FC E5                                   push		hl			; Save present HL to stack as this is the address for the next message
  13++C1FD EB                                   ex			de,hl		; now hl = address of text data
  14++C1FE 1E FF                                ld			e,txt_status_colour
  15++C200 C5                                   push		bc
  16++C201 D1                                   pop			de
  17++C202                                      MMUSelectLayer1
  17++C202 ED 91 57 3A >					 nextreg L1memMMU,		    BankLAYER1
  18++C206 CD D7 E0                             call		l1_print_at
  19++C209 E1                                   pop			hl
  20++C20A C1                                   pop			bc
  21++C20B 10 E6                                djnz		.BoilerTextLoop
  22++C20D C9                                   ret
  23++C20E
# file closed: ./Menus/print_boiler_text_inlineInclude.asm

1285  E00F              GetShipBank2Id:         MGetShipBankId ShipBankTable2
1285  E00F 06 00       >                        ld      b,0
1285  E011 4F          >                        ld      c,a                                 ; c= original ship id
1285  E012 CB 3F       >.ShiftLoop:             srl     a
1285  E014 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1285  E016 CB 3F       >                        srl     a
1285  E018 CB 3F       >                        srl     a                                   ; divide by 16
1285  E01A 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = bank nbr
1285  E01B 79          >                        ld      a,c
1285  E01C 50          >                        ld      d,b
1285  E01D 1E 10       >                        ld      e,16
1285  E01F ED 30       >                        mul                                         ; de = 16 * bank number (max is about 15 banks)
1285  E021 93          >                        sub     e                                   ; a= actual model id now
1285  E022 50          >.SelectedBank:          ld      d,b                                 ; save current bank number
1285  E023 47          >                        ld      b,a                                 ; b = adjusted ship nbr
1285  E024 7A          >                        ld      a,d                                 ; a = bank number
1285  E025             >;.. Now b = bank and a = adjusted ship nbr
1285  E025 21 62 E0    >                        ld      hl,ShipBankTable2                        ; a= bank index
1285  E028 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1285  E02A ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
1285  E02C 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)                              ; a = actual bank now
1285  E02D             >                        ClearCarryFlag
1285  E02D B7          >                        or a
1285  E02E C9          >                        ret
