 323+ E0F7
 324+ E0F7              MIsKeyPressed:          MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 325+ E0F7 ~                                    MMUSelectKeyboard
 326+ E0F7 ~                                    ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 327+ E0F7 ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 328+ E0F7 ~                                    JumpIfAIsZero   misstarget
 329+ E0F7                                      ENDM
 330+ E0F7
 331+ E0F7
 332+ E0F7 21 00 E0     init_keyboard:          ld		hl,Keys                         ; no key s are pressed by default
 333+ E0FA 11 37 00                             ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen               ;
 334+ E0FD 3E 00                                ld		a,0                             ;
 335+ E0FF CD 17 7D                             call	memfill_dma                     ;
 336+ E102 C9                                   ret                                     ;
 337+ E103
 338+ E103
 339+ E103
 340+ E103 DD 21 37 E0  scan_keyboard:          ld		ix,RawKeys                      ; hl = table of raw IO port readings
 341+ E107 21 41 E0                             ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 342+ E10A 0E 08                                ld		c,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 343+ E10C 11 00 E0                             ld      de,Keys                         ; ix = table of key states from raw read
 344+ E10F 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 345+ E110 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 346+ E112 DD 77 00                             ld      (ix+0),a                        ; save raw scan
 347+ E115 DD 23                                inc     ix
 348+ E117 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 349+ E118 06 05        .ProcessInputBits:      ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 350+ E11A 1F           .ProcessBitsLoop:       rra                                     ; shit bit 0 into carry
 351+ E11B 30 08                                jr      nc,.SetKeyPressed               ; low bit means it was pressed
 352+ E11D FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a
 353+ E11F                                      ZeroA
 353+ E11F AF          >                        xor a
 354+ E120 C3 2D E1                             jp      .SetKey
 355+ E123 20 0B                                jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 356+ E125 FD 6F        .SetKeyPressed:	        ld      iyl,a                           ; save current input byte
 357+ E127 1A                                   ld      a,(de)                          ; get current keystate
 358+ E128 FE 02                                cp      2
 359+ E12A 28 02                                jr      z,.AlreadyHeld
 360+ E12C 3C                                   inc     a                               ; and increment by 1 as its moved from previous state
 361+ E12D 12           .SetKey:                ld		(de),a				  	        ; save key Pressed state
 362+ E12E FD 7D        .AlreadyHeld:           ld      a,iyl                           ; and retrieve the current input byte
 363+ E130 13           .SkipKeySet:	        inc		de								; move to next key
 364+ E131 10 E7                                djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 365+ E133 0D                                   dec     c                               ; thats one row of bits all processed
 366+ E134 20 D9                                jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 367+ E136              .ReadExtend0:           GetNextReg EXTENDED_KEYS_0_REGISTER
 367+ E136 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 367+ E139 3E B0       >            ld a,EXTENDED_KEYS_0_REGISTER
 367+ E13B ED 79       >            out (c),a
 367+ E13D 04          >            inc b
 367+ E13E ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 368+ E140 32 3F E0                             ld      (RawKeys+8),a                      ; save to extended slot
 369+ E143 06 08                                ld      b,8
 370+ E145 21 28 E0                             ld      hl,Keys + VK_SEMI
 371+ E148 17           .ProcessExtend0:        rla                                     ; shift bits left into carry for extended keys
 372+ E149 30 04                                jr      nc,.SetExtend0KeyPressed
 373+ E14B              .Extend0NotPressed:     ZeroA
 373+ E14B AF          >                        xor a
 374+ E14C C3 55 E1                             jp      .SetExtend0Key
 375+ E14F 7E           .SetExtend0KeyPressed:  ld      a,(hl)
 376+ E150 FE 02                                cp      2
 377+ E152 28 02                                jr      z,.Extend0AlreadyHeld
 378+ E154 3C                                   inc     a
 379+ E155 77           .SetExtend0Key:         ld      (hl),a
 380+ E156 23           .Extend0AlreadyHeld:    inc     hl
 381+ E157 10 EF                                djnz    .ProcessExtend0
 382+ E159              .ReadExtend1:           GetNextReg EXTENDED_KEYS_1_REGISTER
 382+ E159 01 3B 24    >            ld bc,$243B
 382+ E15C 3E B1       >            ld a,EXTENDED_KEYS_1_REGISTER
 382+ E15E ED 79       >            out (c),a
 382+ E160 04          >            inc b
 382+ E161 ED 78       >            in a,(c)
 383+ E163 32 40 E0                             ld      (RawKeys+9),a                      ; save to extended slot
 384+ E166 06 08                                ld      b,8
 385+ E168 21 30 E0                             ld      hl,Keys + VK_DELETE
 386+ E16B 17           .ProcessExtend1:        rla                                     ; shift bits left into carry for extended keys
 387+ E16C 30 04                                jr      nc,.SetExtend1KeyPressed
 388+ E16E              .Extend1NotPressed:     ZeroA
 388+ E16E AF          >                        xor a
 389+ E16F C3 78 E1                             jp      .SetExtend1Key
 390+ E172 7E           .SetExtend1KeyPressed:  ld      a,(hl)
 391+ E173 FE 02                                cp      2
 392+ E175 28 02                                jr      z,.Extend1AlreadyHeld
 393+ E177 3C                                   inc     a
 394+ E178 77           .SetExtend1Key:         ld      (hl),a
 395+ E179 23           .Extend1AlreadyHeld:    inc     hl
 396+ E17A 10 EF                                djnz    .ProcessExtend1
 397+ E17C C9                                   ret
 398+ E17D
 399+ E17D
 400+ E17D
 401+ E17D              GetKeyStateAddressDE:   MACRO
 402+ E17D ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 403+ E17D ~                                    add     hl,a
 404+ E17D ~                                    ld      e,(hl)
 405+ E17D ~                                    inc     hl
 406+ E17D ~                                    ld      d,(hl)                          ; now de = address in keypress list
 407+ E17D                                      ENDM
 408+ E17D
 409+ E17D              GetKeyStateAddressHL:   MACRO
 410+ E17D ~                                    ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 411+ E17D ~                                    add     hl,a
 412+ E17D ~                                    ld      a,(hl)
 413+ E17D ~                                    inc     hl
 414+ E17D ~                                    ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 415+ E17D ~                                    ld      l,a
 416+ E17D                                      ENDM
 417+ E17D
 418+ E17D
 419+ E17D              ;;old debug codeCurrentX            DB 0
 420+ E17D              ;;old debug codeCurrentY            DB 0
 421+ E17D              ;;old debug code
 422+ E17D              ;;old debug codedisplayKeyStatus:       xor         a
 423+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 424+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          hl,RawKeys
 425+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(hl)
 426+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        and         %00011111
 427+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          b,5
 428+ E17D              ;;old debug code.displayLoop:           push        bc,,hl
 429+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        rra
 430+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        jr          c,.displayNoPress
 431+ E17D              ;;old debug code.displayPress:          push        af
 432+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 433+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 434+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 435+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 436+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'*'
 437+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 438+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 439+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 440+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 441+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 442+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 443+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 444+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 445+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ret
 446+ E17D              ;;old debug code.displayNoPress:        push        af
 447+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 448+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          e,a
 449+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentY)
 450+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          d,a
 451+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,'O'
 452+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 453+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 454+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          a,(CurrentX)
 455+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        add         a,8
 456+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld          (CurrentX),a
 457+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        pop         af
 458+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        pop         bc,,hl
 459+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        djnz        .displayLoop
 460+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ret
 461+ E17D              ;;old debug code
 462+ E17D              ;;old debug codedisplayDownStatus:      ld  a,(Keys+      KeyCode_CursorUp)
 463+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        cp  0
 464+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayNoUp
 465+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        cp  1
 466+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        jr      z,.displayUp
 467+ E17D              ;;old debug code.displayHeld:           ld      de,8*15
 468+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"*"
 469+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 470+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 471+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ret
 472+ E17D              ;;old debug code.displayUp:             ld      de,8*15
 473+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"+"
 474+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 475+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 476+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ret
 477+ E17D              ;;old debug code.displayNoUp:             ld      de,8*15
 478+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ld      a,"O"
 479+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        MMUSelectLayer1
 480+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        call        l1_print_char
 481+ E17D              ;;old debug code                        ret
 482+ E17D              ;;old debug code
 483+ E17D
 484+ E17D
 485+ E17D              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan, waits until key gets to state 1, if it was already held then#
 486+ E17D              ; it will have to be let go to reset of 0 and scan again
 487+ E17D              ; Deprecated as not used as yet
 488+ E17D              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_press:   GetKeyStateAddressHL
 489+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 490+ E17D              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 491+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 492+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 493+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 494+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfANENusng  1,.wait_loop             ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 495+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 496+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        ret
 497+ E17D              ;;;;;;; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping does this with keyboard scan waits until key gets to state 2
 498+ E17D              ;;;;;;wait_for_key_a_held:    GetKeyStateAddressDE
 499+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 500+ E17D              ;;;;;;.wait_loop:             call    scan_keyboard
 501+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 502+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        push    hl
 503+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)
 504+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng  2, .wait_loop
 505+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        pop     hl
 506+ E17D              ;;;;;;                        ret
 507+ E17D
 508+ E17D              ; Gets the current keystate of the c_Pressed Key in a register
 509+ E17D              get_key_a_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 509+ E17D 21 49 E0    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 509+ E180 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 509+ E182 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 509+ E183 23          >                        inc     hl
 509+ E184 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 509+ E185 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 510+ E186 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 511+ E187 C9                                   ret
 512+ E188
 513+ E188              ; sets they keystate of c pressed key in a register to 1 (pressed)
 514+ E188              ; This will be used by auto dock
 515+ E188              force_key_press:        GetKeyStateAddressHL                    ; read key locations
 515+ E188 21 49 E0    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 515+ E18B ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 515+ E18D 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 515+ E18E 23          >                        inc     hl
 515+ E18F 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 515+ E190 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 516+ E191 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 517+ E193 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 518+ E194 C9                                   ret
 519+ E195
 520+ E195              is_key_up_state:        GetKeyStateAddressHL
 520+ E195 21 49 E0    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 520+ E198 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 520+ E19A 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 520+ E19B 23          >                        inc     hl
 520+ E19C 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 520+ E19D 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 521+ E19E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 522+ E19F FE 00                                cp      0
 523+ E1A1 C9                                   ret
 524+ E1A2
 525+ E1A2              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 526+ E1A2              is_key_pressed:         GetKeyStateAddressHL
 526+ E1A2 21 49 E0    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 526+ E1A5 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 526+ E1A7 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 526+ E1A8 23          >                        inc     hl
 526+ E1A9 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 526+ E1AA 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 527+ E1AB 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 528+ E1AC FE 01                                cp      1                               ; we cant just test bit 0 as this may have been held long
 529+ E1AE C9                                   ret
 530+ E1AF
 531+ E1AF              ; returns nz is set if c_ key is held, if key was held then keystate would be 2 or 3, i.e. bit 1 set
 532+ E1AF              is_key_held:            GetKeyStateAddressHL
 532+ E1AF 21 49 E0    >                        ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 532+ E1B2 ED 31       >                        add     hl,a
 532+ E1B4 7E          >                        ld      a,(hl)
 532+ E1B5 23          >                        inc     hl
 532+ E1B6 66          >                        ld      h,(hl)                          ; now hl = address in keypress list
 532+ E1B7 6F          >                        ld      l,a
 533+ E1B8 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 534+ E1B9 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 535+ E1BB C9                                   ret
 536+ E1BC
 537+ E1BC              ; checks to see if any key is pressed in the key table
 538+ E1BC 21 00 E0     is_any_key_pressed:     ld      hl,Keys
 539+ E1BF 01 28 00                             ld      bc,40
 540+ E1C2 3E 01                                ld      a,1
 541+ E1C4 ED B1                                cpir                                    ; search for the value 1
 542+ E1C6 28 03                                jr      z,.KeyPressed                   ; if a key was pressed then handle press
 543+ E1C8                                      SetAFalse
 543+ E1C8 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 544+ E1CA C9                                   ret
 545+ E1CB 3E 27        .KeyPressed:            ld      a,39                            ; so c will be how many keys still to scan
 546+ E1CD 91                                   sub     c                               ; so a = 40 - c to get to result
 547+ E1CE C9                                   ret
 548+ E1CF
 549+ E1CF 21 00 E0     is_any_key_held:        ld      hl,Keys
 550+ E1D2 06 28                                ld      b,40
 551+ E1D4 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 552+ E1D6 7E           .KeyReadLoop:           ld      a,(hl)
 553+ E1D7 E6 02                                and     Bit1Only                        ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 554+ E1D9 C2 E3 E1                             jp      nz,.KeyPressed
 555+ E1DC 23                                   inc     hl
 556+ E1DD 0C                                   inc     c
 557+ E1DE 10 F6                                djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 558+ E1E0                                      SetAFalse
 558+ E1E0 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 559+ E1E2 C9                                   ret
 560+ E1E3 79           .KeyPressed:            ld      a,c
 561+ E1E4 C9                                   ret
 562+ E1E5
 563+ E1E5
 564+ E1E5 21 41 E0     WaitForNoKey:           ld      hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 565+ E1E8 06 08                                ld		b,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 566+ E1EA 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 567+ E1EB DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 568+ E1ED E6 1F                                and     %00011111
 569+ E1EF FE 1F                                cp      %00011111
 570+ E1F1 20 F2                                jr      nz ,WaitForNoKey
 571+ E1F3 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 572+ E1F4 10 F4                                djnz    .PortReadLoop
 573+ E1F6 C9                                   ret
 574+ E1F7
 575+ E1F7 F5 D5 C5 E5  WaitForAnyKey:          push    af,,de,,bc,,hl
 576+ E1FB CD E5 E1                             call    WaitForNoKey
 577+ E1FE 21 41 E0     .waitKeyLoop:           ld		hl,KeyAddrTab                   ; de = table of IO ports to read
 578+ E201 06 08                                ld		b,8                             ; 8 ports to ready
 579+ E203 7E           .PortReadLoop:          ld		a,(hl)							; Set up port to read as (hl)$FE
 580+ E204 DB FE                                in		a,($FE)							; read port to a
 581+ E206 E6 1F                                and     %00011111
 582+ E208 FE 1F                                cp      %00011111
 583+ E20A C2 14 E2                             jp      nz,.WaitComplete
 584+ E20D C0                                   ret     nz
 585+ E20E 23                                   inc		hl                              ; and ready for next read
 586+ E20F 10 F2                                djnz    .PortReadLoop
 587+ E211 C3 FE E1                             jp      .waitKeyLoop
 588+ E214 E1 C1 D1 F1  .WaitComplete:          pop     af,,de,,bc,,hl
 589+ E218 C9                                   ret
 590+ E219
 591+ E219
 592+ E219 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 593+ E237 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 594+ E238 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 595+ E239 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 596+ E23A 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 597+ E23B              InputLimit              EQU 20
 598+ E23B
 599+ E23B 21 19 E2     keyboard_copy_input_to_de:  ld      hl,InputString
 600+ E23E 3A 38 E2                                 ld      a,(InputCursor)
 601+ E241 FE 00                                    cp      0
 602+ E243 28 05                                    jr      z,.NoString
 603+ E245 4F                                       ld      c,a
 604+ E246 06 00                                    ld      b,0
 605+ E248 ED B0                                    ldir
 606+ E24A 3E 00        .NoString                   ld      a,0
 607+ E24C 12                                       ld      (de),a
 608+ E24D C9                                       ret
 609+ E24E
 610+ E24E AF           initInputText:          xor     a
 611+ E24F 32 38 E2                             ld      (InputCursor),a
 612+ E252                                      SetMemFalse EnterPressed
 612+ E252 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 612+ E254 32 39 E2    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 613+ E257                                      SetMemFalse InputChanged
 613+ E257 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 613+ E259 32 3A E2    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 614+ E25C 21 19 E2                             ld      hl,InputString
 615+ E25F 06 1E                                ld      b,30
 616+ E261 77           .wipeloop:              ld      (hl),a
 617+ E262 23                                   inc     hl
 618+ E263 10 FC                                djnz    .wipeloop
 619+ E265 C9                                   ret
 620+ E266
 621+ E266              InputName:              SetMemFalse InputChanged
 621+ E266 3E FF       >                        ld      a,$FF
 621+ E268 32 3A E2    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 622+ E26B CD BC E1                             call    is_any_key_pressed
 623+ E26E FE FF                                cp      $FF
 624+ E270 C8                                   ret     z
 625+ E271 4F           .KeyPressed:            ld      c,a
 626+ E272 3A 38 E2                             ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 627+ E275 FE 14                                cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 628+ E277 28 0B                                jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 629+ E279 21 BF E0                             ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 630+ E27C 79                                   ld      a,c
 631+ E27D ED 31                                add     hl,a
 632+ E27F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 633+ E280 FE 41                                cp      "A"
 634+ E282 30 09                                jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 635+ E284              ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 636+ E284 FE 23        .DeleteOrEnterOnly      cp      "#"                             ; if space was  pressed (mapped to Hash in ASCII table))
 637+ E286 28 31                                jr      z,.SpacePressed                 ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 638+ E288 FE 3E                                cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 639+ E28A 28 17                                jr      z,.EnterPressed
 640+ E28C C9                                   ret
 641+ E28D 47           .AlphaPressed:          ld      b,a
 642+ E28E 3A 38 E2                             ld      a,(InputCursor)
 643+ E291 4F                                   ld      c,a
 644+ E292 21 19 E2                             ld      hl,InputString
 645+ E295 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 646+ E297 78                                   ld      a,b
 647+ E298 70                                   ld      (hl),b
 648+ E299 79                                   ld      a,c
 649+ E29A 21 38 E2                             ld      hl,InputCursor
 650+ E29D 34                                   inc     (hl)
 651+ E29E                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 651+ E29E AF          >                        xor     a
 651+ E29F 32 3A E2    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 652+ E2A2 C9                                   ret
 653+ E2A3 3A 38 E2     .EnterPressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)
 654+ E2A6 21 19 E2                             ld      hl,InputString
 655+ E2A9 ED 31                                add     hl,a
 656+ E2AB                                      ZeroA
 656+ E2AB AF          >                        xor a
 657+ E2AC 77                                   ld      (hl),a
 658+ E2AD                                      SetMemTrue EnterPressed
 658+ E2AD AF          >                        xor     a
 658+ E2AE 32 39 E2    >                        ld      (EnterPressed),a
 659+ E2B1                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 659+ E2B1 AF          >                        xor     a
 659+ E2B2 32 3A E2    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 660+ E2B5 CD F7 E0                             call    init_keyboard           ; Flush keyboard status so futher inputs don't auto read the enter key as a second press
 661+ E2B8 C9                                   ret
 662+ E2B9 3A 38 E2     .SpacePressed:          ld      a,(InputCursor)         ; Space = delete
 663+ E2BC FE 00                                cp      0                       ; if input is zero length then can not delete
 664+ E2BE C8                                   ret     z
 665+ E2BF 3D                                   dec     a                       ; move back one and update cursor pos
 666+ E2C0 32 38 E2                             ld      (InputCursor),a         ;
 667+ E2C3 21 19 E2                             ld      hl,InputString          ; now update end of line to null
 668+ E2C6 ED 31                                add     hl,a                    ; .
 669+ E2C8                                      ZeroA                           ; .
 669+ E2C8 AF          >                        xor a
 670+ E2C9 77                                   ld      (hl),a                  ; .
 671+ E2CA                                      SetMemTrue InputChanged
 671+ E2CA AF          >                        xor     a
 671+ E2CB 32 3A E2    >                        ld      (InputChanged),a
 672+ E2CE C9                                   ret
 673+ E2CF
 674+ E2CF              TargetMissileTest:      AnyMissilesLeft
 674+ E2CF 3A 1E 7F    >                        ld      a,(NbrMissiles)
 674+ E2D2 A7          >                        and     a
 675+ E2D3                                      JumpIfZero      .ClearTargetting
 675+ E2D3 CA EA E2    >                        jp	z,.ClearTargetting
 676+ E2D6                                      IsMissileLaunchFlagged                      ; if we are comitted to launch
 676+ E2D6 3A AE 81    >                        ld      a,(MissileTargettingFlag)
 676+ E2D9 E6 80       >                        and     $80
 677+ E2DB C8                                   ret             z                           ; then don't scan as it will be cleared on launch
 678+ E2DC 3E 16        .ScanForKey:            ld              a,c_Pressed_TargetMissle    ; if not pressed we are done
 679+ E2DE CD A2 E1                             call            is_key_pressed              ; .
 680+ E2E1 C0                                   ret             nz                          ; .
 681+ E2E2 3A AE 81     .TargetPressed:         ld              a,(MissileTargettingFlag)   ; get flag back
 682+ E2E5                                      JumpIfAEqNusng  StageMissileNotTargeting, .SetTargetting
 682+ E2E5 FE FF       >                        cp     StageMissileNotTargeting
 682+ E2E7 CA F0 E2    >                        jp      z,.SetTargetting
 683+ E2EA              .ClearTargetting:       ClearMissileTargetting
 683+ E2EA 3E FF       >                        ld      a,StageMissileNotTargeting
 683+ E2EC 32 AE 81    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 684+ E2EF C9                                   ret
 685+ E2F0              .SetTargetting:         SetMissileTargetting
 685+ E2F0 3E FE       >                        ld      a,StageMissileTargeting
 685+ E2F2 32 AE 81    >                        ld      (MissileTargettingFlag),a
 686+ E2F5 C9                                   ret
 687+ E2F6
 688+ E2F6 AF           MovementKeyTest:        xor     a
 689+ E2F7 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 690+ E2FA 3A 88 7E                             ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 691+ E2FD E6 FC                                and     $FC
 692+ E2FF 20 26                                jr      nz,CursorKeys
 693+ E301 2A 57 E0     ClimbDiveKeys:          ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)                 ; Check for Climb
 694+ E304 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 695+ E305                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanDiveKey
 695+ E305 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 695+ E306 CA 14 E3    >                        jp	    z, ScanDiveKey
 696+ E309 3A 55 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 697+ E30C F6 80                                or      CursorClimb
 698+ E30E 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 699+ E311 C3 4A E3                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 700+ E314 2A 55 E0     ScanDiveKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)                  ; Check for Dive
 701+ E317 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 702+ E318                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 702+ E318 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 702+ E319 CA 4A E3    >                        jp	    z, ScanLeftKey
 703+ E31C 3A 55 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 704+ E31F F6 40                                or      CursorDive
 705+ E321 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 706+ E324 C3 4A E3                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 707+ E327 2A 93 E0     CursorKeys:             ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)              ; Check cursor keys
 708+ E32A 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 709+ E32B                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanCursorDownKey
 709+ E32B A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 709+ E32C CA 3A E3    >                        jp	    z, ScanCursorDownKey
 710+ E32F 3A 55 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 711+ E332 F6 80                                or      CursorClimb
 712+ E334 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 713+ E337 C3 4A E3                             jp      ScanLeftKey
 714+ E33A 2A 95 E0     ScanCursorDownKey:      ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 715+ E33D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 716+ E33E                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanLeftKey
 716+ E33E A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 716+ E33F CA 4A E3    >                        jp	    z, ScanLeftKey
 717+ E342 3A 55 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 718+ E345 F6 40                                or      CursorDive
 719+ E347 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 720+ E34A 2A 51 E0     ScanLeftKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 721+ E34D 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 722+ E34E                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRightKey
 722+ E34E A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 722+ E34F CA 5B E3    >                        jp	    z, ScanRightKey
 723+ E352 3A 55 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 724+ E355 F6 20                                or      CursorLeft
 725+ E357 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 726+ E35A C9                                   ret
 727+ E35B 2A 53 E0     ScanRightKey:           ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 728+ E35E 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 729+ E35F                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanHomeKey
 729+ E35F A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 729+ E360 CA 6C E3    >                        jp	    z, ScanHomeKey
 730+ E363 3A 55 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 731+ E366 F6 10                                or      CursorRight
 732+ E368 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 733+ E36B C9                                   ret
 734+ E36C 2A 71 E0     ScanHomeKey:            ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 735+ E36F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 736+ E370                                      JumpIfAIsZero ScanRecentreKey
 736+ E370 A7          >                        and     a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 736+ E371 CA 7D E3    >                        jp	    z, ScanRecentreKey

 739+ E379 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 740+ E37C C9                                   ret

 742+ E380 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
 743+ E381                                      ReturnIfAIsZero
 743+ E381 A7          >                        and     a
 743+ E382 C8          >                        ret     z
 744+ E383 3A 55 80                             ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 745+ E386 F6 04                                or      CursorRecenter
 746+ E388 32 55 80                             ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a

1567  E38C                                  DISPLAY "Keyboard ",BankKeyboard," - Bytes free ",/D, $2000 - ($-KeyboardAddr), " - BankKeyboard"
1568  E38C                                  ASSERT $-KeyboardAddr <8912, Bank code leaks over 8K boundary
1569  E38C              ; Bank 101  -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1570  E38C                                  SLOT    SoundAddr
1571  E38C                                  PAGE    BankSound
1572  E38C                                  ORG SoundAddr, BankSound
1573  E000                                  INCLUDE "./Hardware/sound.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/sound.asm
   1+ E000
   2+ E000              ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   3+ E000              ;--- Equates for sounds
   4+ E000              ;       DEFINE          USETIMER 1
   5+ E000                     DEFINE          DANUBEATTACK 1
   6+ E000                                      IFDEF   USETIMER
   7+ E000 ~            SOUNDSTEPLENGTH             EQU     25
   8+ E000                                      ENDIF
   9+ E000
  10+ E000
  11+ E000              WriteTurboControlA:     MACRO
  12+ E000 ~                                    ld      bc,TURBO_SOUND_NEXT_CONTROL
  13+ E000 ~                                    out     (c),a
  14+ E000                                      ENDM
  15+ E000
  16+ E000              WriteTurboRegisterA:    MACRO   value
  17+ E000 ~                                    WriteTurboControlA
  18+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,$BF
  19+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,value
  20+ E000 ~                                    out     (c),a
  21+ E000                                      ENDM
  22+ E000
  23+ E000              WriteTurboRegister:     MACRO   register,value
  24+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,register
  25+ E000 ~                                    WriteTurboControlA
  26+ E000 ~                                    ld      b,$BF
  27+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,value
  28+ E000 ~                                    out     (c),a
  29+ E000                                      ENDM
  30+ E000
  31+ E000              WriteAToTurboRegister:  MACRO   register
  32+ E000 ~                                    ex      af,af'
  33+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,register
  34+ E000 ~                                    WriteTurboControlA
  35+ E000 ~                                    ld      b, $BF
  36+ E000 ~                                    ex      af,af'
  37+ E000 ~                                    out     (c),a
  38+ E000                                      ENDM
  39+ E000
  40+ E000              SelectAY:               MACRO   chipNbr
  41+ E000 ~                                    ld      a,TURBO_MANDATORY | TURBO_LEFT | TURBO_RIGHT | chipNbr
  42+ E000 ~                                    WriteTurboControlA
  43+ E000                                      ENDM
  44+ E000
  45+ E000              ;--- Interrupt handler, moved from main code
  46+ E000 3A 75 7E     SoundInterruptHandler:  ld      a,(DELTA)
  47+ E003 21 06 B1                             ld      hl,LAST_DELTA
  48+ E006 BE                                   cp      (hl)
  49+ E007 C4 37 E2     .SpeedChange:           call    nz, UpdateEngineSound
  50+ E00A 3A 78 7E     .NoSpeedChange:         ld      a,(SoundFxToEnqueue)        ; Check for new sound
  51+ E00D FE FF                                cp      $FF
  52+ E00F C4 4C E1                             call    nz,EnqueSound
  53+ E012              .NoNewSound:            IFDEF   USETIMER
  54+ E012 ~                                        ld      hl,SoundChannelTimer
  55+ E012                                      ENDIF
  56+ E012 11 D2 E2                             ld      de,SoundChannelSeq
  57+ E015 06 08                                ld      b,8
  58+ E017 1A           .ResetLoop:             ld      a,(de)                  ; we only update active channels
  59+ E018 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  60+ E01A 28 0A                                jr      z,.NextCounter
  61+ E01C                                      IFDEF   USETIMER
  62+ E01C ~                                        dec     (hl)                    ; so update channel timer
  63+ E01C ~                                        jr      nz,.NextCounter         ; if its not zero then continue
  64+ E01C                                      ENDIF
  65+ E01C 3E 08                                ld      a,8                     ; a now = channel to play
  66+ E01E 90                                   sub     a,b
  67+ E01F                                      IFDEF   USETIMER
  68+ E01F ~                                        push    bc,,de,,hl              ; save state
  69+ E01F                                      ELSE
  70+ E01F C5 D5                                    push    bc,,de
  71+ E021                                      ENDIF
  72+ E021 CD A7 E1                             call    PlaySound               ; play sound
  73+ E024                                      IFDEF   USETIMER
  74+ E024 ~                                        pop     bc,,de,,hl              ; restore state so de = correct timer & hl = correct channel, b = coutner
  75+ E024                                      ELSE
  76+ E024 D1 C1                                    pop     bc,,de              ; restore state so de = correct timer & hl = correct channel, b = coutner
  77+ E026                                      ENDIF
  78+ E026              ; If it went negative new sound update
  79+ E026                                      IFDEF   USETIMER
  80+ E026 ~            .ResetTimer:                ld      a,SOUNDSTEPLENGTH       ; as we fallin to this it will auto update counter
  81+ E026 ~                                        ld      (hl),a                  ; so may take it out of playsound routine
  82+ E026                                      ENDIF
  83+ E026              .NextCounter:
  84+ E026                                      IFDEF   USETIMER
  85+ E026 ~                                        inc     hl
  86+ E026                                      ENDIF
  87+ E026 13                                   inc     de
  88+ E027 10 EE                                djnz    .ResetLoop
  89+ E029 C9                                   ret
  90+ E02A
  91+ E02A
  92+ E02A              ; On entering here a = AY chip to select
  93+ E02A 21 BF FF     DefaultAYChip:          ld      hl,$FFBF            ; h = turbo control, l = turbo register
  94+ E02D 0E FD                                ld      c,$FD               ; bc = h$FD or l$FD
  95+ E02F 11 0E 00                             ld      de,$000E            ; d = value 0, e = counter
  96+ E032 F6 FC                                or      TURBO_MANDATORY | TURBO_LEFT | TURBO_RIGHT
  97+ E034 44                                   ld      b,h                 ; now select chip and set to stereo
  98+ E035 ED 79                                out     (c),a               ; .
  99+ E037 1D           .DefaultLoop:           dec     e                   ; loop down we set E 1 higher
 100+ E038 CA 44 E0                             jp      z,.Complete         ; On zero we complete, we
 101+ E03B 44                                   ld      b,h                 ; Set register to 0
 102+ E03C ED 59                                out     (c),e               ; .
 103+ E03E 45                                   ld      b,l                 ; .
 104+ E03F ED 51                                out     (c),d               ; .
 105+ E041 C3 37 E0     .DefaultDone:           jp      .DefaultLoop        ; and loop
 106+ E044 44           .Complete:              ld      b,h                 ; we set fine tone to 0
 107+ E045 ED 59                                out     (c),e               ; though as volume is 0
 108+ E047 45                                   ld      b,l                 ; it doesn't really
 109+ E048 ED 51                                out     (c),d               ; matter
 110+ E04A C9                                   ret
